When you place the Holy Stone, it will absorb the lives of the nearby demons automatically.{nl}Defeat the demons that have already had their life absorbed.
You can obtain Vicious Essences from the demons.{nl}You can purify these essences at the Altar of Purification, which is down from here.
Oh, they will find out if you are not confident enough. {nl}So it's better to fight the demons to gain some self confidence before using the scroll.
Epigraphist Raymond
This isn't the only monument.{nl}There's a fine monument at Irody Square.
I wonder who mourned that traitor? Don't you think there would be a different reason?
Surprisingly, this looks fine.{nl}We should get ready to restore it.
His monument is cased with a terrible magic because he was a traitor.{nl}We should use that magic instead.
If we received support, then we would have hired mercenaries.{nl}Studying about the traitor doesn't mean that we praise the traitor, so I don't understand why{nl}we lost support.
Thanks.{nl}Achat must have been drawn to the magic power cast upon the monument.
It's kind of curious that something that looks like a tree stump would be interested in {nl}stone plates.
I am sorry, but we can't find the one that we needed among the fragments you brought.{nl}I hope it has not already been eaten.

If we burn the Tree Ambulo, do you think we can find the stone pieces that they swallowed?{nl}I stacked four piles of firewood over there, light them up and push the Tree Ambulo in {nl}when the wood is burning.
Be careful though.{nl}It will be dangerous if a flaming Tree Ambulo runs into the camp.
Treasure Hunter Eden
I am a treasure hunter, not a monster hunter.{nl}I don't want this place to become my grave, having fought monsters.
I've collected all the fragments Raymond requested. {nl}Bring them back to Raymond.
Eden told you to give this to me?{nl}Hmm. It will take some time to restore it.{nl}
Can you take these restored tombstone fragments to my assistant at Irody Square?{nl}I think something good will happen when we finish restoring it.
Epigraphist Schmid
This... Our master did it!{nl}Give it to me, please.
Not yet. A little more.{nl}I think I just need to do a little bit more.
Necromancer Drasius
Please put the sacrifices in the jar at Dumbliu Pond.{nl}The summoned spirit will come to me if you succeed.
It depends on how one uses necromancy.{nl}It could be good or bad depending on what Necromancer has in his mind.
The experiment failed? I am so sorry.{nl}I should research more here to find out what went wrong.
Monument of Lydia Schaffen
My name is Lydia Schaffen.{nl}For the reasons that I have endured this deep burden of sadness, I am now going to tell the truth {nl}about Ruklys on this land.
There is no more charcoal besides what you have, so don't use it too freely.
I didn't know she studied with Ruklys, the traitor.{nl}Shoot. I've almost used up all the charcoal.
Eventually, Ruklys failed.{nl}He was destroyed by those who were jealous of him.{nl}He left to the goddess by my hands.
What was Lydia Schaffen's relationship with Ruklys?{nl}I am not astute enough to understand.
I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will, I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.
The stage that Ruklys had reached was astonishing.{nl}But, his noble mission was too difficult to be accomplished on this land.
Since I am on a long journey, my luggage is not heavy.{nl}It's better to buy anything from local shops.
Any archer would want to have good arrowheads.{nl}I will show you how to find good arrowheads, so how about you help me some?
They aren't very quick, so this shouldn't be hard for you to do.{nl}I'm sure of it.
Thanks. These are still hot to the touch.{nl}Aren't they nice?
Wandering Spirit
Our platoon received orders to take care of a Unicorn.{nl}The details should be in the Operation Orders...
Operation Order
How to lure a Unicorn.{nl}1. Collect Zolem Stones from Zolems{nl}2. Set the stones around Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins.
Guard Leaper
This operation had failed several years ago.{nl}Where did you get this anyway?{nl}
I understand. Please take the Unicorn's Horn to that girl over there.{nl}Her brother went missing after that tragedy.
Girl
I told him not to go...
It was really terrible.{nl}I was lucky since I almost was dispatched.
If you have trouble pulling it over to the burning wood, just kick it in hard.
I need the flame of Infroburk at the Shiluma Altar Site.{nl}Get close to the back of that monster and heat these arrowheads.
I was trying to get something for myself while I had this signed contract with Raymond.{nl}But, now I have nothing besides stone fragments.
It'll be clear to you what's on Ruklys' memorial after you've restored it.
Great. {nl}Please leave activating the altar to me and go meet Vaidas at Himnas Chapel.
Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the {nl}extra energy to endure longer.
Good. This will be enough.
It feels so good to see them flying.{nl}But, they are too noisy so I need to study more.
I have never seen a stone filled with this much holiness.{nl}Thank you very much for giving it so much effort.
The demons' attacks are stronger than we expected.{nl}If we are able to defeat Glizardon, then it will be easier to defeat them.
Follower Vaidutis
I came to say that Gesti went up to the 2nd floor, and I let my guard down. {nl}I would have been in big trouble if not for you.
I studied the barrier at the gate, but the power of the basement altar is insufficient. {nl}Could you supply me with Power Crystals from the Corylus?
Maybe the goddess knew it'd fail and that's why she said to wait for the Revelator. {nl}At least we hurt Gesti some, so that's good.
Well done. {nl} Making the Light Crystal with this will be enough power to break the barrier.
Prepare yourself before bringing the Light Crystal to the gate. {nl}It can attract powerful monsters.
I think I'll stay here to stop the demons from entering the basement.
It is an honor to fight with you, Revelator. {nl} Could you drive the demons from this area while Follower Algis investigates?
If you don't mind, can you get Eyes of Madness from Rodelins?{nl}They are handy when you want to hide yourself from demons.
I don't want those filthy things to be near me either.{nl}But, it's worse to face against those demons alone.
Thanks.{nl}I will share them with the other brothers before the demons find out.
You are indeed the Revelator.{nl}Now, we can concentrate on protecting the altar.
Don't worry, the barrier at the main entrance to the 1st floor can be offset by the church's {nl}power. That's what the altars are for. {nl}
Let's take care of the Unknocker first. {nl}I'll lure the Unknocker, giving you a chance to attack it.
I want to request to you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd.{nl}They are demon sisters and they give us headaches.
Be careful, I almost got attacked as well.{nl}They are really violent.
Good job. {nl}Their babbling laughter seems to have stopped.
I am thinking of creating confusion by charading as a demon.{nl}Could you gather some cloth from Pawndel and Pawnd after defeating them?
It's a bit blasphemous, but we don't have much choice.
Well done. {nl}It will probably be difficult for them to trust each other from now on. {nl}
I'm thinking of converting the demons using the power of the altar. {nl}The converted demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}
But before that, it's important for us to understand the demons. {nl}Collect some demon souls for me.
I remember the first time I converted the demons. {nl}I pray for their poor souls.
Good job. {nl}If there are any good demons left, the goddess will look after them.
The Central Altar that suppresses the power of the demons suddenly stopped. {nl}Could you take a look at what's going on?
Strange, it was definitely working.
It was an ambush. {nl}We would have been in big trouble without your help.
You need the Seal of Space in order to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl}It's hidden in the Sventove Central Altar, but I just hope it's not too late.
Many structures in the Tenet Church are placed to ward against the demons. {nl}Each one in itself is a small barrier that contributes to a huge barrier. {nl}
The most powerful barrier is on the 2nd floor. {nl}I heard that it can exert the greatest force when the Divine Sphere is there.
Gesti has made the first move. {nl}It will be difficult to approach her secretly.
We must change our plan. {nl}First, we'll need to go observe Gesti's actions. {nl}
Let's start by retaking the Bell Tower.
From here, we can see what Gesti is up to.
Alright, bring back the Seal of Space from the Sventove Central Altar. {nl}Can you do this?
You must realize that the revelation is hidden in the sanctuary. {nl}The Seal of Space is the single key that will get you to the sanctuary. {nl}
Not only can the Seal of Space get you to the sanctuary within the Tenet Church, {nl}it'll allow you to enter any location where the goddess have hid before.
The Seal of Space can only be used by the Revelator, so she won't be able to find the revelation {nl}right away. {nl}
But the enemy is the Demon Queen herself. Even the Paladin Master couldn't defeat her.{nl}We have to use the powers of the destroyed altar.
We can't do anything about the destroyed altar, but the fragments still have power. {nl}Gather the pieces and insert them into the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.
When you are done, I will be able to restrict Gesti through the power of the Divine Sphere and {nl}the church. It may be for a short while but that's the best option we have.
So you activated the Malda Altar? {nl}Now it will be safe to stay here for the time being. Good work.
Demons are going around the second floor searching every corner. {nl}Activating the Auka Altar will divert their attention.
I'm relieved you're beside me. {nl}I think it was a good thing that Laima chose you.
Thank you for your hardwork. {nl}When this is over, I plan to gather all brothers and drive them away at once.
I'll ring a bell to let you know when Gesti gets close to you, so please listen for it.
So you found the Seal of Space. {nl}Use the crest on the pillar beside me to go to the sanctuary. {nl}It is prepared for the Revelator only.
May the blessings of the goddess be with you.
So Gesti just ran away. {nl}Fine. Since you got the revelation, we've completed the mission. {nl}

So you are in search of Goddess Saule...{nl}The Iridescent Valley spoken of in the revelation {nl}should begin at Grassy Brookside located north of here.{nl}I bid thee farewell. I shall pray for the goddesses' blessings to be upon your path.
When you find the revelation, tell the Paladin Master of the story you've been through so far. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.
Seems like Gesti has not notice yet. {nl}We better prepare the Divine Sphere.
All preparations have been made. {nl} The barriers of the church will soon weaken Gesti. {nl}
Gesti will be enough for you to handle once she's weakened. {nl}When Gesti is cornered, I will make the final strike with the Divine Sphere.
These are pieces of the barrier at Mazas Rest Place. {nl}Do not worry. There are ways to recover the barrier, so I'm sure it will be alright.
I didn't know the demons would use summoning circles to come through. {nl} I suggest removing them all before they siege us.
Even with this many demons, you still managed to make it through. {nl}You may be the Revelator, but that's still impressive. {nl}
It's the revelation. {nl}Cherish it and do not show it to anyone else. {nl}
Come on. Go to the Paladin Master. {nl}He will tell you the way you must go.
I asked my precious friend Algis to go to the Tenet Church. {nl}I won't lose to Gesti, but it is important to have some back up plan just in case.
This Divine Sphere was the weapon used against Gesti at Emerald Bluff.{nl}It has been passed down since the first Paladin.{nl}
In the kingdom, there are several valuable weapons aside from this Divine Sphere. {nl}Those weapons saved many lives on Medzio Diena four years ago.
Starting from now, I will focus on the Divine Sphere.{nl}In the meantime, please use your skills so that nothing can disturb me.
Sorry. My abilities weren't good enough. {nl}Gesti has now realized that the Holy Relic is not the revelation, and is probably heading {nl}straight to the church. {nl}
But this old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl}Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}
Go. The Tenet Church is at the Fallen Tree Garden.{nl}Stop Gesti from gaining the revelation at all costs.
It is too much for me to handle alone without any help from the other brothers. {nl}I'd better use the Malda Altar. {nl}
Nearby demons will be branded when the Malda Altar is activated.{nl}Defeat the demons once they are branded.
We still have a lot to do here.{nl}The goddess told us to never give up.
The world still needs more experience. {nl}We probably wouldn't have made it this far without the help of the goddess.
Activating the Tree Guard Post Barrier is taking longer than I thought. {nl}We have no time, let's charge it with demon souls instead.
All souls are pure. So even if it's a demon's soul, it can still provide some divine power.
So the Tree Guard Post Barrier has been charged with demon souls, huh. {nl}It still needs some final touches for completion, but I'll take care of it from here. {nl}Great job.
It's amazing you can use the barrier like that. {nl}Even the Paladins did not know about that. {nl}
I am exhausted. I'd like to rest a little.{nl}Would you take care of the demons nearby to give me some time to recover?
Holding off against this many enemies is by itself a great feat. {nl}It's all thanks to the Paladin Master.
Even though he's still young, Kenneth is amazing. {nl}I think we can trust him a little more.
I have received an urgent message from the Watchers.{nl}A gigantic demon monster is coming this way.{nl}Quickly, follow me.{nl}
Biteregina, which used to live in the deep forest, has appeared here.{nl}It even built a hive at the upper side of Rojus Plateau. Since it's dangerous, can you defeat it?
Thank you so much!{nl}How did it come from such a far forest?{nl}Strange, huh?
I can't do anything since the Seedmias are attacking us from every direction.{nl}Can you defeat them?
I really hope those Seedmias don't hit me on the head with those flower buds. {nl}They look horrible.
I received a mysterious charm from the elders that will brainwash Pantos to stand on our side.{nl}Are you up for a challenge?{nl}
According to the elders, we are done with those Pantos.{nl}We can't continue the relationship anymore.
This barrier is impossible to open from the outside. {nl}Fortunately, the entrance to the basement looks secure. {nl}
However, it's too dangerous to enter the basement with the Divine Sphere. {nl}I'll wait here so you go to the 1st floor through the basement and open the barrier. {nl}
You have done what no other could easily do.{nl}The goddess must be proud of you.
I would like to say that my faith is like a first-class blade that can cut through these demons, {nl}but in reality it isn't that simple. I hope you'll help us some.
They must be defeated on sight.{nl}How are we supposed to protect the church otherwise?
Defeat the demons around the Tree Guard Post Barrier. {nl}The souls of those demons should be able to fill its divine powers a little. I'm counting on you!
Very good. Flowers in the fields should act like flowers in the fields.{nl}Don't you think so?
We are the people following the Paladin Master.{nl}We will defeat the people who disobey the goddess.{nl}
Everyone has their reasons for following him.{nl}Some of them received benefits from him and some of them were already Paladins like Algis.
Maybe the goddess knew it would happen and that's why she waited for the savior.{nl}I feel like I put a big burden on your shoulders.{nl}
Hasten your pursuit of Gesti.{nl}Tenet Church is in the Fallen Tree Garden.
This is the plan that has been passed on for hundreds of years since the first Paladin.{nl}We shall not fail this plan.
Please fit the pieces together at Ruklys' memorial in front of me while I prepare the rubbings.{nl}With you working with us, this should be easy. {nl}
I will follow you soon. Just a moment.
After we finish the rubbings, we can say farewell to this place.{nl}Can you help me a bit more?
The capital may already be in ruins, but I will protect Klaipeda.
To place all your might towards a devastating strike against any enemy who threaten{nl}the kingdom. That is how Highlanders fight in battle. {nl}
Good work. {nl}Honestly, I had my doubts, but the results seem to be fine. {nl}You just need to tell it like that to Kayetonas in Flower hill.
It looks like even the Auka Altar lost its powers. {nl}There were stories about its powers wiping out dozens of demons in the past.
It's hard to watch the Egnomes running around the Atgaila Chapel.{nl}Please clean up the Egnomes.
Many of the Paladin's treasures are also here. Do not let them fall into the hands of the demons.
After using the charm on the Pantos, hit them several times.{nl}Try that on the Pantos in Levanda Habitat.
Isn't this city amazing? I want to stay here if I can.{nl}But, I prefer going to other places with my horse.
The space movement magic circle will take you to your preferred floor in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the field anymore. Let's go and find out.
I hope the monsters haven't broken the magic circle yet.
Damn.{nl}They broke it. It is unfixable.
When you activate the device which sets barriers, monsters won't be able to come in.{nl}The supply device for demons' power is broken, but we can input the power with other methods.
I hope that crazy magician, Antares, won't disturb us.
He set a trap so well.{nl}I didn't like him even he was conscious.
We have to be careful from here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.
He was a great magician before.{nl}But, his ideology was too dangerous.
Oh my goodness, why now...{nl}

The reason why he was imprisoned here was because he badly wanted the concentrated demons' power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower when the power which was concentrated for hundreds of years explode at once?
Gabija is important, but the tower is more dangerous.{nl}Antares may be engaged in something by now.
There are two valves here that control the power device.{nl}The first valve is at the lab room so let's go and destroy it now.
Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.

Antares has done research on the flow of the demons' power for a long time.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere...
The research materials should be here somewhere...
This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.
Let's go find the last valve at the central control room.{nl}When we destroy this, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
Please set this stone and defeat the monsters around.{nl}We can collect the energy to recharge the Barrier Device.
A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.
Ah, that's right. Let's also prepare defensive magic in case something happens.{nl}There was magic written in Antare's materials that we can use when there are explosions.
I think I could manage to do something if I had Fallenlem cores.{nl}I haven't lost my knowledge of magic, I am merely unable to use it.
Good. We can use it one more time.{nl}
Let's go find the second valve on the central control room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
The Jewel of Prominence is somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have gone wrong when Antares exploded a while ago.
Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.
What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very instable.
Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. It seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
And me.. I feel dizzy..
If we stay like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
By the way, how do I know about the stabilizing device?{nl}I've never been to the 4th floor..
Okay.. My memories keep coming back..{nl}
Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
The Jewel of Prominence has stopped going crazy.{nl}But, in order to fully stabilize it, we need the Essence of Flame from the fireplace at the middle of the tower.
It's almost done. Yes..
You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to fully stabilize it so let's go to the Laboratory.
I hope the device is still okay...
Good! We can activate the device now.
You are the Revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Mage Tower.
Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive any help.
There is a way to prevent it, but only you can do it.{nl}I beg of you to come to Karsta Hall Site at Crystal Brook.
This is the entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all my power somehow.{nl}
I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?
All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are our last hope. Let's go in.
Gabija did not hide herself.{nl}She just coudnl't come forward because she had to protect the tower from demons.{nl}
I heard Agailla Flurry went because she coun't find a successor. {nl}I heard it was for something important.. But I don't know what it is.
Medzio Diena could strike again, whether at your kingdom or my hometown. {nl}The one responsible for such a plague would be someone worthy of my sword.
Owyn
Reinforcement? We could really use your strength!{nl}Please defeat the monsters nearby.
All the other magicians have either died or ran away.{nl}Goddess Gabija is the only one protecting the tower right now.
The demons have attacked before, but this battle is taking longer than usual.{nl}I read about Helgasercle from a book. Maybe she has appeared again..
As a follower of the great Flurry, I can't back away just yet!
Oh, You're definitely the Revelator.{nl}You were on a roll!
Can we have another go, with the same momentum?{nl}I will take care of the other monsters, you go focus on those troublesome Drakes.
Those monsters are not as strong when we fight together!
Now I feel safe.{nl}I will be okay by myself from here. Thanks!{nl}{nl}
Cordelier
Black Coal Powder.. With that, we can unleash the seal that is written on this recipe.{nl}But I can't just find it. I am sorry, but could you bring me that powder?
Isn't it better to just scratch the powder from the monsters nearby?
Thanks!{nl}Now, I better get ready to unleash the seal.
Oh no... I forgot I need the Eternal Ember.{nl}I should have also requested this of you before.. Can you please get that for me?{nl}
I should have requested this of you all at once.{nl}I'm sorry, I make mistakes all the time.
Could it be Ginklas? I hope it's just a bookshelf falling down in the reading room.{nl}Could you check the bookshelf, please?
I've never seen a monster who could cause this much vibration.
It was indeed Ginklas. You are so amazing!{nl}Because of you, I had enough time to prepare my magic.
Sealed Stone
I am much more than you could ever imagine.{nl}I wish to be released from these restraints. Please defeat the nearby monitors.
Defeat the monitors.{nl}There's an Eye of Surveillance on Blindlems and Beleggs.
I shall be released soon.
I can't tell you my name. {nl}Please defeat the monitors and release the seal on me.{nl}
Amazing. You possess great power.
My soul is ripped apart and locked within Soul Stones.{nl}Help me free by defeating the Slime Watcher.
Another me from somewhere else led you to this place. {nl}Now, I can be released.
But, if I get released like this, I will be split into pieces.{nl}
The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Ark.
The Holy Ark that I was sealed within is broken, and the observers have taken those pieces.
Now, I can be released.
As long as there are Eyes of Surveillance, I can't be released from my restraints.{nl}Please defeat the monitors and release me.
I am tied to a contract.{nl}I seem to be free, but am not really free.
I was sealed when my sprit was ripped off by a high class demon.{nl}Please defeat Infroroktors for me. I promise I will not be a burden to you.
Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Infroroktor.
This is way better without the monitors.
Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Fallenlem.
His creations should have voices to ask with, and ears to listen. {nl}
The pieces from my other self are able to call you now.{nl}Now, I can be released.
My body is restrained. The Armas are mocking me.{nl}Please teach them some manners.
You should give them a lesson so that they'll behave properly.
You dealt with them well. {nl}I shall entrust you with the task of releasing this seal.
Please unleash this seal on me.{nl}When you gather the essences of restraints from the observers, this seal will break.
You will know when the time comes.
Suspicious Table
There's a Golem near here.{nl}I am too scared to go out. Please help me.
This won't come out.
Thanks.{nl}I will stay here until it becomes safe, and then run away.
Furry Odd
Pleased to meet you. {nl}I am Furry Odd. I am a magician specialized in object variation.{nl}
I see the Revelator is here to help the goddess.{nl}While you do so, can you help me collect Variation Mediators from the monsters?
The magicians that ran away?{nl}What can we do.. For them, their lives are more important than the Goddess Gabija.{nl}I don't think they are cowards. They are just hopeless.
Thanks. You are so reliable.
We have enough Mediators now so we can go defeat the remaining monsters.{nl}Do you want to come along?
You are so great.{nl}I hope our magicians can be just as good as you.
There's a problem.{nl}I think I saw a Yonazolem inside the Machinery Room... I can't handle it by myself.{nl}
I will take care of other monsters. Could you take care of Yonazolem, please?
I am not strong enough to face Yonazolem.{nl}It's fortunate that you are here.
Thank you so much for helping me. It's so good that you are here.{nl}May the goddess bless you!
I can't stand it anymore. Please save me from the restraints.{nl}I will be released when you defeat the observers nearby.
The time to retrieve my body and spirit is near.
I can't stand it anymore.{nl}Please destroy the monitors that imprison me.{nl}
So I guess I can be released now.
I promise. That there will be something in the future.
Simon Shaw
We have to stop Bearkaras, but there are so many monsters.{nl}Can you help us?
Now it's time to get revenge!
You are so great. {nl}Now we will be able to face against it.
I will go to the Small Hall to chase after Bearkaras, so please take care of the surrounding monsters.{nl}I am counting on you!
There's no way I can defeat Bearkaras myself...{nl}Sorry you have to see me like this...
Bearkaras is still near here.{nl}You are our last hope. We are counting on you.
It was a good decision to trust you.{nl}I am more motivated because of you.
The contract needs to continues. Please release me.{nl}As those observers fall down, my spirit becomes free.
It is too soon to tell.
It wasn't a long time ago, but it was frightening for me.
Now only the last piece is left.{nl}
The last spirit is in the monitor Stone Whale.{nl}My spirit will be free when he gets defeated.
My body was ripped apart, humiliated... I can't forgive that..
Quickly... We should continue the contract.{nl}
I am Demon Lord Hauberk.{nl}I have become a pillar residing in the seal of this tower{nl}after having my soul ripped apart by Helgasercle.
I will leave now to find my remaining pieces.{nl}We will meet again someday in the future.
I'm glad to hear that you will help.{nl}I want you to get back the Flame Charm I set inside Black Drakes.
Don't ever think of blocking its axe head-on.{nl}You will be crushed into a pulp.
You should go to the Great Cathedral to follow the revelation,{nl}But, unfortunately, you are not skillful enough.
Train more at the entrace of Katin Forest. {nl}Believe that you will get your victory at the end.
Let's meet at Technical Room 1. {nl}Ah, it will be better if you could get the Blackened Essence from monsters.
Look at this busted cable car. The damage is pretty serious. {nl}
It's obviously the work of the Grummer and Zignuts from the Cholras Winding Road. {nl}Give them a taste of your skills while I fix this.
This would not have happened if the elders had listened to what the young men said. {nl}But what's done is already done. What can we do about it now?
Good work. These are the parts the Pantos stole. {nl}I never imagined I'd be seeing them again like this.
Watcher Molly
The Pantos were not always such violent monsters. {nl}There must be a way to change them back. {nl}
I want you to give the Baby Pantos at Nuosalus Trail some Plateau Sugar Beets.{nl}Perhaps then they will remember something and come to me?
I really feel sorry for them. {nl}No matter how troubled the world is, they weren't like that before.
Alright. Thank you very much! {nl}Do you see that damaged cable car over there? I used to ride that when I was a kid.
Thank you! You've saved me and my friends from spending more than half of our lives {nl}just protecting the cable car. {nl}
As I'm the only one who can fix the cable car, I'll take a look. {nl}Oh, of course, thanks for your help.
Please bring me the Mali seeds in the way to Labure roads. {nl}They would be a good source of magic for the shaman dolls. {nl} {nl}
It's fun. {nl}Some straws, seeds, and a bit of rope and those kinds of things can go around as if they are alive.
Watcher Molly
It's been a bit frightening ever since Simorph appeared around here.{nl}Witnessing the Pantos becoming this corrupted is no different.
Won't you help me purify Labure road? {nl}The shaman doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.
The corruption is extensive, but I think Labure Road has it worst. {nl}Maybe it's spreading through the roots?
Look at these gentle Pantos. It's insane that we have to make the Pantos our enemies {nl}when the demons are charging in.
We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl}It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl}Bring it to me.
If you can persuade Capria, the Pantos should be tamed. Capria is the leader of the Pantos. {nl}
Let's follow the Baby Pantos. They will surely lead the way to Capria.
I wish Capria will understand us. {nl}We must do whatever it takes.
It got angry as soon as it saw the Baby Pantos? {nl}So the plan really did not work.
I worked very hard to fix the cable car, but I'm still worried about the Poata. {nl}A monster of that size could destroy the cable car.
Our guards love to fight.{nl}Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}I wonder if we should be like this when the demons waiting to march in.
The Poata also destroyed the cable car at Nepavy Grassland. {nl}But it's not like we can guard it all the time. {nl}
Even if we stay on guard, a fight with the Poata? {nl}That's not easy.

You require a cable car in order to cross over to Leaf Veil Plateau from Silverstream Gorge.{nl}It is said that they used to go across by riding a basket fastened to rope.{nl}If you ask me, a cable car is bad enough.
We're here to protect the Holy Land from the demons.{nl}It must be worse than expected if the Paladin Master is at Leaf Veil Plateau.{nl}
I keep worrying about my brother at Emerald Bluff. {nl}I hope that he's alright.{nl}
This place has a very sacred meaning to us. {nl}And we have a calling as Watchers, to protect this place. {nl}
It has been protected for generations, since the day when we promised the first Paladin that {nl}we would protect it. And now that the demons have invaded, it is time to keep that promise.
The Pantos changed and became wild after Medzio Diena, four years ago. {nl}Before that, we didn't really mind each other and even joked around together. {nl}
I really wonder what has become of this sacred land?
The Caprias were the first to change after the incident four years ago. {nl}And then the Pantos.. now only the babies are left.
Our family has been protecting this sacred land for a long time.{nl}Please cooperate with us to keep the reverent atmosphere here.{nl}- Watcher
Thank you for helping out. {nl}You've reduced my workload quite a bit.
I'll have to make do with the dolls I have left.{nl}I can't complain when everyone else is risking their lives at Emerald Bluff, now can I?
We used to be on good terms with the Pantos. {nl}These days, we're constantly at each other's throats.
I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}The dolls for spells. Isn't it exciting?
Thank you. {nl}We might be able to go get more when more young men arrive.
I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil forces. {nl}I'm going to break it through the shaman doll. Want to give it a try?
We can't do anything until Basil restores the shaman doll perfectly. {nl}Unless for special situations like this, we can use, um, nothing.
It would have been a disaster if the Wild Carnivore had legs.{nl}I'm glad it was killed beforehand.
I heard we promised the first Paladin three things in return for saving our family. {nl}

To help build the Tenet Church, {nl}to appoint the Watchers to safeguard the sacred land covering the Holy Relic, {nl}and lastly, to protect each other together when the great danger arises that was foretold. {nl}
I do not know what curse it was. {nl}There's got to be a record within the Tenet Church.
Our Shaman dolls are different from Bokor's Shaman dolls. {nl}
You don't need to be a Bokor to use it. {nl}It moves by itself to attack, or something like that.
The demons could have used their hands to make it easier to fight. {nl}Maybe they are after the Holy Relic. {nl}
Since the Holy Relic was hidden deep underground, {nl}who could have known that plants would be the reason for the world's overturn?
You may use a bit of force if words aren't enough. {nl}We can't grow any further from each other anymore.
You can summon the shaman doll with this summon scroll. {nl}
If possible, defeat the Carnivore too. {nl}It was contaminated by evil energy and I can't stand watching it anymore.
Soil the Poata's nest at Margas Hill, and it will show up. {nl}
Liaison Official Colin
Rexipher? {nl}I've never heard this name before. {nl}
It's been a while since they've withdrawn from Dense Mist Plateau because it is not worth researching.
Royal Mausoleum Desk
One does not simply try to obtain the secrets and precious wisdom of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}When the time comes and you are ready, you will be able to attain them.{nl}
Bring me the Bloodstone.{nl}It's not too late yet. You can still make it in time.
Make sure that you come back within the time frame.
Don't yield your resolution to confront opportunity with preparation.
Since you told me about my brother's death, I'd like reward you.{nl}It's something I saved for when my brother and I could journey again, but I don't need it anymore.
Isn't that Drake Horn?{nl}You're going to sell all of them?{nl}
No. It's too precious to be used that way. {nl}With this much amount, we could even make Drake's Epaulet.{nl}I will give you the recipe. Are you interested in making it?
With this key, we can open the treasure chest.{nl}But, you will need to look for the chest yourself.
Crafting is only possible during rest mode. {nl}You know this already right?
If it weren't for you, I would have continued believing that my brother was alive and {nl}well somewhere. You can't say you are not responsible for this.
Well made.{nl}You will definitely need it sometime in the future.
For now, I will hold on to it.{nl}When you need it, don't forget to come and take it from me. I will give it to you when {nl}the time comes.
You sure know a lot of people. {nl}Every class master at Klaipeda and Fedimian knows your name.{nl}
Do you want to bet on this? {nl}Answer every questions laid out at the Mage Tower.
The magicians on the 1st to 4th floors of the Mage Tower each offer a quiz that you can take.{nl}I will give you a small present if you can solve them all.
Wow, you came up here! You are incredible.{nl}Well that's it for questions, should we do something else?
It's nothing special. {nl}If you can completely collect the scattered pages of the book at the Laboratory on the 3rd floor, {nl}I will approve that as you answered the question.
That book is very important to me so I can't just leave this place.
Yes. That's correct! This is it.{nl}
The Thaumaturge Master told me to give it to you.{nl}If you hadn't done it, I would have kept it for myself.. Such a pity.
I heard your story before.{nl}You did a tremendous job at the Mage Tower right?{nl}
That's why I have a favor to ask you.{nl}
There is this pumpkin with lizard inside it. {nl}I heard it's somewhere... I am sure you will find it.
Thank you. This is an wondrous jewel.{nl}It is rare that a Sadhu is interested in contemporary objects.
That proves that it is an important object.
Unknown being
So somebody has dared to confront me.{nl}Tell me the secret number. I can't say anything unless you tell me the number.
You're a brave guy. {nl}There are five clues in 1st Mine Lot . {nl}No need to hurry. It will take a long time.
You found them. {nl} Then I'll start from now.
I'll give you a riddle. {nl} It is something you must do, have done most, and will have to do. {nl} Show your answer in action.
Good work. {nl} You will be rewarded with proper compensation.
What do you think are the factors that affect outcomes?{nl}If you just focus on attacking, then you may receive more damages.
If you ask me what the strongest weapon is, my answer would be my faith. Faith to an ally that {nl}you can truly rely on.
A Thaumaturge does not get stronger just by learning.{nl}You should experience it yourself.
Understanding of the origin of all things becomes the power of the Elementalists.{nl}Wind, water, fire, earth. The strongest power is drawn from the simplest of forms.
Stealth, detection, trap installation. {nl}Scouts are masters of search and observation.
We Sadhus are always on an eternal journey. {nl}When our journeys in this world come to an end, we continue it, in the afterlife.
Nothing is unfair in real battles.{nl}You've gotta do anything to win. Don't you think so?
We should find it quickly...{nl}It may be an end to the Mage Tower.
I don't mind people learning my skills if I receive reasonable rewards.{nl}In truth, I will welcome them.{nl}Although, I won't chase after them to teach them.
But, yeah. {nl}Asking me to teach in the military is just too much ..{nl}Could it be another problem?
Welcome! What do you need?{nl}The stuffs I have are not like old days, but I tried my best to prepare them.
Old Man
You must have seen many artifacts since coming to this city.{nl}Yet in our long history, heroes are but a fraction of the dusts.
Especially Ruklys, one of Maven's disciple... I pity him.
There's an interesting story behind that gigantic Goddess statue.{nl}It's in a book called the
Silver of Fedimian
, you should read it if you get the chance.
The spear in itself is a weapon of pure destruction.{nl}It is the best weapon anyone can easily learn and master.
Golem, that's awesome. {nl} And you remember what I taught you?
As I thought, Revelators view things differently. {nl}Though you seem to be different from the other Revelators...
You looked so cool when you defeated the Golem. {nl}Where did you learn to do that?
I'm grateful for your help. {nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you in Klaipeda, so go find him.
I firmly believe that the goddess will return someday. No doubt about it. {nl}We have to believe it. If we do not believe in the goddess then who will?
Please hurry and support the Miners' Village. {nl}Someone like you will be of great help.
I heard the stories. So you defeated the Vubbe Fighter, huh? {nl}That's incredible.
I was anxiously watching from a distance, but that fight was really awesome.
Frankly, I'm scared. {nl}The Miners' Village, and now the Eastern Woods... Even Klaipeda is becoming dangerous.
Although I've been very concerned about Miners' Village, {nl}at least you've calmed me down a bit, thanks.
Healer Lady
We pray that the blessings of the goddess will always be with the Revelator who saved us.
I'm helping the refugees. {nl}The monsters attacked the village.
Mine Manager Brinker
Still anxious. {nl}But thanks to you things are better than before.
I can't believe the Cunningham's story is true... I think it needs more research.
Everything has a source called Mana. {nl}And everyone can connect to each other's Mana if they want. {nl}As if unearthing a channel.
Have you ever seen Vubbes using pickaxes? {nl}I wonder what they are trying to find...
Thank you very much for saving us.{nl}
If you still want to enter the Closed Area, collect Vubbe Magic Stones from the Vubbes. {nl}And then insert them inside a gap and the Crystal Wall should open.
What are you doing here? Hurry and get into the mines. {nl}Weren't we supposed to meet in the 1st floor?
No demon will be able to pass here.{nl}I will do my best to protect this place so they can't interrupt the Paladin Master.
Absolute faith is our greatest shield.{nl}In accordance with the goddess' will, we came to fight using our justice and conviction.
Well done.{nl}As the Paladin Master, I salute to your accomplishment.
Watcher James
We must protect this place from the demons at any cost.{nl}The land here is sacred.
I would have fled long time ago if it wasn't for that pledge.{nl}I am still the son of the great Watcher.
We have to somehow thwart these demons.{nl}I cannot let this danger pass to our brothers in the church.
We can't go in due to the barrier.{nl}To open the door, we should go through 1st floor of the basement.
Will this world be peaceful when we meet again? I hope it will.
I never expected those demons to come down this far.{nl}I hope our brothers can persist in their fight against them.
We have lots of things to protect so we should rather defeat those demons quietly than excitng them.{nl}I feel much more safe with you.
I frankly thought it would be hard to stand still with only Paladins.{nl}I guess I placed too little faith in them.
It will be better to fight them face to face instead of hiding.{nl}It will be even better if the opponents are the demons.
So humans can also defeat the demon king.{nl}I can't believe it.
Too bad that Gesti wasn't killed, but still you did a great job.{nl}It will end soon..
You fought hard.{nl}May the goddess bless you in the future.
Let's pay more attention to the safety of our people here.{nl}Where is Jonas' maid?
When I immerse myself in research, there are times when I'm not even aware that monsters {nl}have came. To think back about that moment, it is still frightening.
You got to start being more careful.{nl}I almost got involved in your carelessness.
I thought I could remember everything if I tried.{nl}I could be getting Alzheimer's? I can't even remember the face of the guy who I used to work with now.
There's a guy who I used to work with, but...{nl}I just can't remember his face.
We don't have time to waste here.
Thanks for helping me last time.{nl}I only had my research materials with me. Not sure why the monsters were after them.
I've done a wrongful thing to Niels.{nl}I remember everything now. I feel embarrassed.
Security Guard
The artifacts you discover here can't leave this area.{nl}Even if you are the Revelator.
A lot of scholars are doing their research here, so please do not make any loud noises.
When suppliers are lacking, merchants like me are more needed.{nl}That's the way of this world.
Why are monsters taking these.{nl}At least, it is fortunate that we still have this much materials.
This is the first time I've been at such a dangerous place like this.{nl}This place is so deserted, I don't even know why there are even monsters here.
Gorath
Quite a number of people went missing. Where is this guy?
Badat
I lost the research materials again.{nl}How many time have you lost them so far?
Stonemason Pipoti
I shouldn't have done that.{nl}This is all because of me.
I should have returned quietly after advising those historians.{nl}This is all my fault.
Go and find the Disciples of Gustas at Broken Pillar Canyon with the crystal.{nl}They will teach you what you need to know about the seal.
Kevin
This is a strange place.{nl}Those scholars, and those mercenaries just can't leave this place.{nl}Of course, us too.
Sculptor Hilda
Look at these pillars.{nl}Aren't they beautiful?
The beauty of these poles make us forget the monsters' scariness.{nl}They are really amazing.
Not only are they beautiful, but they also have writings on them.{nl}Maybe we should read them sometimes.
The reason why this isolated canyon is beautiful is because it keeps a secret somewhere.
The first mission of our family has now been achieved.{nl}It begins from here.
Supply Commander Vio
The monsters are quiet today.
We are veterans.{nl}Living as a mercenary these last few years, we do not panic even if we are cut off from society,{nl}and haven't heard anything as time flies by.
Mercenary Eta
I will come back soon so don't worry.{nl}This was an easy thing when I was young.
How will the commander scold us this time...
Archaeologist Laudi
The goddess and the demons... Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum and the secret of the artifacts...
Morkus Jonas
That guy the Old Man kept talking about, is he going to come at all??
The old man told us.{nl}When you go against your destiny, that also is a part of your destiny.{nl}Maybe the reason why we are trying hard is because that's our destiny.
How come no one remembers him.{nl}The man with silver hair... Hmm...
An unknown event that is being plotted by an unknown person...{nl}This is really scary...
It's time for me to push forward with my research, but I can't focus at all.{nl}Moreover, where did my assistant go...
Without Airine, I would have died.{nl}Of course, I really appreciate for your help.
Airine saved my life.{nl}Of course, thanks to you as well.
I heard the story but I still can't believe it. {nl}About you defeating the Vubbe Fighter.
Where is the scholar. I am really worried.
Without Dezic, I would have probably gone crazy among those monsters.{nl}Of course, thank you so much for your help as well.
We are about to leave here, is there something wrong?{nl}I haven't heard that we would receive reinforcements.
We should leave here soon.{nl}No one knows which stone will bring which monsters.{nl}Why is this happening...
Don't you agree that we should leave because the worth of these archaeological {nl}findings here is practically nil? There are artifacts anywhere you step around here!!
I think my senses aren't wrong. Something is definitely happening.{nl}As it stands, I can't give up.
The thing I want should be here, but I just can't figure out a way to find it.{nl}Hmm. What should I do?
My heart breaks knowing I have to leave such a wonderful place like this.{nl}But I don't have a choice.
Do you think I am crazy enough to want to stay here longer?{nl}I am going to leave this place as quickly as I can. See you later somewhere!
Historian Cyrenia Odell
This feeling...{nl}Is it the feeling being a historian, or the fear that comes from human instinct..
Adventurer Varkis
What's it like being an adventurer? Of course it's not too dangerous.{nl}After all, the intense feeling of discovering something is what guides me through the day.
Historian Rexipher
There's an old saying.{nl}A person who fights against beasts should be careful not to be a beast himself.{nl}When you look at the abyss for a long time, the abyss will also look at you..{nl}
I have a feeling that I will meet you again.{nl}Farewell until then...
I came here because the historians invited me to this place.{nl}They wanted my advice as a stonemason.
I should have returned quietly after advising those historians.{nl}This is all my fault.
Liaison Officer Bale
We are not responsible for the safety of a person who is not registered.{nl}Please go back to a safe place.
I am sorry for not being of any help, but you are not on the list.
Historian Colin
Hmm, nothing comes to mind at all. {nl}Yep... not at all.
How can I put all these materials in order?
A person who uses a demon's name.. He must be crazy.
Wounded Historian Laulas
There was a man taking over the excavation site.{nl}I feel powerless. How is he controlling those monsters?
Hurry! We must slow Rexipher somehow.{nl}No matter what the goddess' will may be, It won't do us good if everything falls in his hands.
Ruklys Memorial
Who decapitated Ruklys?{nl}Who labeled Ruklys a traitor?{nl}
The King tyrannized more as his spirit waned, and devastated his citizens' lives.{nl}I didn't die with him, so I am going to leave his spirit on this monument.
It's okay even if you are not a swordsman.{nl}It's okay even if you are not the chosen.{nl}
The light that Ruklys left for you should be used against this chaotic world.{nl}If you immerse yourself in senseless killing, then it might turn against your head.{nl}
I am looking for a person who will help me with my research.{nl}I lost my funding when they found out the research was on the traitor Ruklys.
Everything is my fault.{nl}Schmid is dead.. what can I do alone.
Is there even anything valuable here?{nl}For the time being, I have been hired by Raymond.
Nameless Monument
(It is currently unreadable.)

Words cannot describe how dangerous this place is.{nl}The scholar told me to stay beside him because of the dangers around here...{nl}But I just can't stay and do nothing in front of an opportunity to find out the secret of Ruklys.
That's why... I have strayed out this far.
This is amazing! As a scholar, I want to research more!{nl}But I'm not sure if it's okay to be out here.
To guide our spirits to a higher place through refining substances.{nl}That is the alchemists' ultimate goal.
Is the Netherbovine causing problems again?{nl}No monster will be able to step foot in Fedimian as long as we Rodelero are standing fast.{nl}
Are you going to defeat Netherbovine? {nl}Splendid. I am counting on you.
The magic to control time is the essence of all magic.{nl}Agailla Flurry told me.
I used to live in the forest but came to Fedimian because I had ambitions.{nl}I'm glad to be of service if I can help given that over half of Fedimian is destroyed.
I heard Netherbovine is going nuts outside Fedimian.{nl}As a person undergoing training, I am ashamed that I can't go out and fight.
Don't say poison is unfair.{nl}You gotta do anything to survive. You can't live in this world by just being fair.
Are you going out to defeat Netherbovine outside Fedimian?{nl}If it weren't you, I would have fought.{nl}Pity on my end. But good luck.

Even after this beautiful city got destroyed, there are still quite a few threats around.{nl}I can go out and fight, but... I won't. Because there are more and more people who are willing{nl}to serve without any compensation.{nl}
Netherbovine. It is fortunate that we have some to fight against it.
I would go back in time if I could.{nl}I would have been able to save Fedimian with the magic I have now.
I knew you are not ordinary.{nl}Thanks for your support.
I want to take a look at it more closely, but there are too many things interrupting me.{nl}Can you protect me from those monsters for a while?
I never thought that I would be able to see these beautiful patterns.{nl}When you go to Garden of Pillar, there may be more beautiful patterns. Come with me.
It seems that the Wandering Spirit wants to give the reward to someone in Fedimian.
After I finished the work, the Unicorn appeared.
Thank you for the regards from Laimonas. {nl} Come on in to Klaipeda. Uska is waiting.
Don't forget to send my regards to the Knight Commander of Klaipeda.
When you are ready, please go to Aras in the Eastern Woods.
Welcome! {nl}Oh, you're the Revelator. I really wanted to meet you. {nl}
This is a Warp Scroll. {nl}You can go to any Goddess Statue or return to previous location by using it. {nl}
We'll give you more than what the Knights asked for so please help us find the goddesses.
I think Large Kepa is still out there. {nl} Would you take a look?
It was there right? {nl} My senses are never wrong.
Even though Klaipeda is just around the corner, the supply situation here is not very good. {nl}Just think about how much worse it would be in other areas.
My men should have returned by now but there is no sign of them. {nl} They know well that I'm too busy to check on them myself.
My men said they were going to Delon Shelter. {nl}The Golem may appear at any moment, yet they looked so carefree.
Rocktortuga is coming this way. {nl}Please lend us your strength to make sure it doesn't break through our defenses.
Have you seen any baby Poata? {nl}We better drive them out quickly so that the mother Poata won't keep showing up.
The Vubbes have built their base outside the village. {nl}Now that we don't even have able-bodied soldiers, something serious might happen if we don't {nl}drive them out of their base.
Thank you so much for your bravery.
How can I express my gratitude. {nl}I'm sure the goddess sent you to us.
This patient told us that Chafer has appeared. {nl}Can you help us out and go check on it?
I must treat this patient at once... so thank you.
Those refugees are probably having a hard time getting here because of the monsters.
I can't help but think about it since he's worked here for so long.
Thank you. Now I can feel at ease and return to the village. {nl}May the blessing of the goddess always be with you .
Being attacked by the Golem will get them back to their senses.
Usually you can't find them no matter how hard you try. {nl}Strange, huh?
I am pleased that my friend was able to go back safely.{nl}I was worried because of the stories that Molich is wandering around.
After removing the seal, learn the next few steps for the other seal from the brothers there.
You have the Seal Release Crystal to release the seals.{nl}You are the person who Jonas sent right?{nl}
From now on, we will start releasing very important seals.{nl}The first seal is at the Pasagos Cliff.
I heard you successfully released the seal at Pasagos Cliff.{nl}Go get the next step from my brothers at Pillars of the Courtyard.
You should be going to the next seal at Broken Pillar Canyon once you unraveled the seal.
Find Gustas Jonas after releasing the seal.{nl}He will greet you respectfully.
Are the monsters all taken care of?{nl}If so, things will get important from here on out.
I want you to bring me the artifacts that I couldn't get since it became too dangerous.{nl}Please examine the stone pillars at Alkune Stairway.
The devices attached to the artifacts may still be activated, and no one knows what will happen.{nl}Please be careful.
Good. You have done well.{nl}I hope we will meet again soon.
Powerless Security Guard
I was attacked by Hogmas at Traceless Ruins.{nl}Fortunately, I was able to survive, but I need to find that chest.
Thanks for caring.{nl}Be careful of those Hogmas.
They probably haven't gone that far.{nl}I hope the necklace is safe even if others are not.
There was nothing in the chest?{nl}Aww, that's a bummer.
We should find that necklace.{nl}If not, I will be kicked out.
When you use this scroll, the necklace will shine.{nl}You will be able to find it easily, even if it has been dropped on the ground or is in the hands of {nl}the Hogmas.
If the necklace is that important, don't you think their boss would want it?
Thank you so much!{nl}I will take little bit more rest to recover my stamina and go back to the guards.
What are you waiting for? {nl}Nothing good will come out when you drag time.
Powerless Security Guard
I am still not feeling well. Got really startled not so long ago...
What will Rexipher do?
So the Tzedej Altar has been attacked too?{nl}Regardless, we will still have a chance if we protect the other altars.
Please go to Sviesa's Altar.{nl}I will follow you.
Run and don't look back!
If you look by the stones you will find Denoptic.
I will give you the scroll to open the seal.
I can't believe I have to go like this...{nl}I haven't even had a chance to say goodbye to my parents...
I'm sorry... I'm sorry...
What is that?{nl}Succubus' Eyes...? Thank you for defeating it, but hand those over!

As I've told you... I am quite dexterous, and have been interested in crafting since I was young.{nl}Alchemy, magic, medicines... I know about those Succubus' Eyes!{nl}The eyes that a Succubus put in my eyes because she was envious of the pretty necklace {nl}with the blessings of the Great Cathedral!{nl}I'll make you a new necklace with those eyes!
It won't take long. {nl}Excuse me.
All done!{nl}The necklace should suit you well!
Let's give up on this and move to the big transportation magic circle instead.
The Asmodian attacked the tower is not the first time, but did Mase long earthquake up here. Thanks to {nl}, and whether they are by but Gabija disappeared in the world?
That was a trap.{nl}It seems that they read every movements of us.{nl}
There's nothing we can do about it.{nl}Even it it would be little late, let's give up on the magic circle and destroy those monsters who are coming into the tower first.
The Barrier Device is on the left end of his hallway.{nl}Let's go upstairs right after we activate the device.
The device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}It seems okay yet.
Good!{nl}There wouldn't be more monsters now.{nl}
Let's go to the next floor soon. {nl} Goddess Gabija is awaiting us. {nl}
Refugee
I lost everything. {nl}I don't know how I can go on anymore. {nl}Would my life have become this miserable if not for Medzio Diena?
Four years ago, it was on the eve of the so called 'Medzio Diena'. {nl}Suddenly, a huge tree emerged in the middle of the capital and the earth and sky turned {nl}upside down. {nl}
I never knew a tree could grow that big. {nl}And the destruction of the capital began. {nl}
Everything happened so fast, and nobody knew what to do. {nl}We didn't know whether to run away or try to stop it... Our minds just became blank.
The destruction of the capital was just the beginning. {nl}Medzio Diena was simply a prelude to the catastrophes coming ahead. {nl}
Monstrous plants sprouted up all over and began devouring people.{nl}Everyone started running, but before I knew it I was the only person left.{nl}
Enough. Don't ask any more questions. {nl}I... don't want to think about it anymore.
The Excavation Camp on Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum is past here.{nl}You can freely enter, but please be careful not to disturb the people doing research.
The one in charge of this Excavation Camp is Niels.{nl}If you have something regarding the research group, look for him in the camp.
We won't block anyone's entrance past here, but we can't guarantee one's safety.
The researchers here receive support from the kingdom.{nl}The person in charge is Niels, so if you have any questions talk to him at the Excavation Camp.
The Royal Mausoleum should be protected.{nl}If it can't be protected, it will be destroyed itself.
Fedimian is a very old city, and is surrounded by countless ruins and wonders. {nl}This includes the Mage Tower, the Cursed City and the Great Cathedral.
Hundreds of years ago an archmage by the name of Agailla Flurry built that tower. {nl}Much of the magic used today saw their beginnings within that tower, and haven't changed {nl}much since.
That city was abandoned after it was cursed with a spell that turned everything into stone. {nl}It is just beyond Pilgrim's Way.
It used to be the place where the people who supported the former rebel Ruklys lived. {nl}The curse is still in effect today so it's difficult to travel there.
Goddess Zemyna has always protected us. {nl}I believe my older brother also leaves me to Zemyna's care.
How many times must we pray to the Goddess Zemyna until she can hear our prayers?
This is the Divine District of the city of Fedimian. {nl}The Market District is currently closed, please accept that inconvenience.
The Divine City, Fedimian, also had a Market District besides its Divine District.{nl}But the Market District was completely destroyed due to the earthquake during Medzio Diena.
We are still reviving the city, but the city infrastructure is still old and crumbling quite a bit...{nl}At least, the Divine District is still left intact due to Zemyna's blessing.
Believer Alvydas
It is because of our faith and dedication to Goddess Saule that we are able to endure {nl}such hardship. Would an unfaithful person want to stay in a terrible place like this?
Believer Raminta
If that evil energy spreads to other forests...{nl}then they will probably also turn... like Kvailas Forest.{nl}And then the entire kingdom may also... It scares me.
Believer Evaldas
Everyone is tired, but the evil energy never stops. So we at least try to stay happy. {nl} However, I don't know how long I can keep feeling happy.
Believer Zaneta
I want to tell to the people out there that we are still here.{nl}The goddess always tells us that everything will be alright when the revelation comes.
Believer Simas
I actually want to go to Fallen Worry Forest instead.{nl}I wanted to see the origin of the evil energy with my own eyes.
There are rumors about Golems appearing so don't go far too deep. {nl}It'll be safer to take the bigger roads where there {nl}are less monsters or just head straight to Klaipeda.
So, I guess there is actually someone good among those who say they've dreamed of a goddess.
I'm relieved that there are people who say they dreamed of a goddess. {nl}But there seem to be too many of them.
A dream of one of the missing goddesses. Isn't that something amazing?
The colleague who I used to work with has disappeared.{nl}He was definitely with me at the Forest of Fireflies, but I won't go back there. It's scary.
Where is he? I am scared.
My colleague is dead?{nl}That's nonsense. If I had not tempted him..{nl}
This map is useless now since my colleague is dead.{nl}Please pray that my colleague would go to the goddess safely.
I'm screwed. Monsters took my bag. {nl}The bag contained everything I recorded on my journey.. What should I do?{nl}
The goddess has surely sent help!{nl}Those monsters were last seen south of here.
There are still a lot of things I must do...
The adventure can continue if I get my diary back.{nl}I am happy..
Long time no see. {nl}I have a favor to ask you. Can you help?{nl}
I want to put a monument up for my dead colleague.{nl}But I don't have any materials or tools.
Thank you. The Klaipeda blacksmith should sell the tools.{nl}But first, I'd like to ask you to bring me boulders from High Winding Road {nl}that are known for their excellent quality.
Tools for stonemasons? {nl}10,000 silver will do.{nl}{nl}
I just figured out how I'm going to make it.{nl}I will make it quick, so please wait.
It's finished. Place it at the entrance of the Royal Mausoleum at Overlooking Crossroads.{nl}Maybe this can provide enough consolation.
I keep thinking about my colleague.{nl}I'll never see him again, right...
Varkis' Soul
I can't leave with all my things left here
I don't have any reason to stay in this land anymore.{nl}I want to meet the goddesses...
It was made long ago, but any stones will break it.
Monument
We have all become like wind in the canyon.{nl}Although we have left, our times together will always remain with you.
Architect Laudi

I received a request to rebuild this structure, but after Medzio Diena, {nl}I have been stuck here since.{nl}I don't know if the original client is still alive or if we lack the materials, {nl}but I will finish rebuilding this structure no matter what happens.
I will find the key to open the last seal.{nl}After opening a space with this scroll.
The spatial chasms may exist anywhere, but they might also not exist anywhere.
Hmm. Every bit as impressive as the rumors say.{nl}Rolandas will be waiting for you if you go to the base of the stone pillar.
Nothing beats traps when it comes to gathering enemies together and striking them all at once. {nl}Of course, they're also the best means of escape.
If you think a companion is just a pet, that's a huge mistake. {nl}They are like an inseparable friend to us hunters.
Our family has been waiting for your appearance for a long time.{nl}With this igniter, please light the signal at the top.
Since you have appeared, it is sending us a signal to greet you.{nl}After you light the signal, tell Niels that I am sorry.
There's nothing that Davio can't get! As long as you pay me enough.
Do you need anything?{nl}I can get you anything as long as you pay me enough.{nl}But, it will be expensive.
Don't ever think about going by yourself without mercenaries.{nl}There are too many monsters out there, and some of them can't even be defeated by mercenaries.
My soldiers should've been back by now, but I haven't heard from them.{nl}If you see them, can you tell them to come back to the camp?
If I don't take care of them, no one will.{nl}I should re-train them, damn.
With things like this, I won't be able to face the Captain.{nl}I should get back the supplies that the Wendigos stole, but I'm deeply wounded.
If I didn't have this wound, that monster would be nothing.{nl}I am really pissed off.
Thanks.{nl}Since I got all those supplies back, I will try to cheer up myself one more time.
The wound is deeper than I thought, and I can hardly move.{nl}I heard Canyon Apynys is good for alleviating pain.
Yep. That's Canyon Apynys, alright.{nl}I am worried about the side effects, but I hope they go away soon.
Do you have the Canyon Apynys?{nl}I feel like I'm going to lose consciousness just from breathing.
The blood has stopped, but my body feels numb.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can return safely?
It is aching more than I thought.{nl}I'll have to give up a little strength to move quickly.
After I regain more energy, I should go back to the commander.{nl}Thank you so much.
The commander is looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I can't go back until I catch that again.
They are not ordinary stones, as they emanate some sort of energy.{nl}You will know when you see them.
I didn't know that I would meet Saugas again, I don't know if I should like it or dislike it.
Good work.{nl}Now shall we start?
We will be ready when we rub Woodfung's poison on the stone with full of vigor.{nl}It will be done when we put this bait on the Alkune Hill.
The Saugas' just took the stones and disappeared?{nl}That's absurd.
Are you afraid of them?{nl}I still have some more stones, so could you try luring them again from there?
Did the Saugas ran away because they caught my scent?{nl}I guess that is possible.
So the Saugas were just causing trouble to its peers.{nl}Okay. I will go back to the camp slowly since the commander is worrying about me.
There's a scary monster called Denoptic here.{nl}I need the artifacts that Denoptic swallowed. Can you get them for me?
I'm surprised, as this is the first time I've seen Denoptic eat stones. {nl}Is someone behind this?
How did you find the right piece!{nl}Thank you so much.
Can I ask you one more favor?{nl}I want you to defeat the monster at Odega Hills.{nl}It disturbs my research.
Thank you.{nl}I wonder why there is no support here, because they do send mercenaries {nl}to those scholars at the entrance of the canyon.
If something were to happen to Airine, I don't know how I would live....
Why are monsters after these artifacts.{nl}Is there something that we should know?{nl}
Anyways, thanks for helping me on the research.
Gotta run away from Niels.{nl}We should go see the stars.
There was something important..{nl}
What are you doing here?
Dementia? That's absurd.{nl}I am okay. You guys are crazy.
Just where exactly did that old man go to alone?{nl}He's not even in good shape...
Instead of fighting, I chose to run away.{nl}I think my research will help us more than fighting.
Do those monsters like eating research materials or something?{nl}What do you think?
Sorry if I sounded mean.. it's just, I don't have energy to talk right now.
I was a hunter before.{nl}Those monsters in the canyon are nothing to me.
Damn... that was awesome.
It was dangerous, but we got something out of it.{nl}Nevertheless, the disappearance incidents are a bit eerie.
It's raining heavily.{nl}Monsters are more erratic on these days.
I wonder who is planning all this?{nl}I'm certain they're after the Royal Mausoleum.
Manipulating monsters, that's not a human thing to do.{nl}Are they demons then? Ah... this is all very confusing.{nl}What have I seen?
I guess I can't sleep tight.
Can you hear it? hear it? The screams of those who died without any reasons?
The criminals who fabricate counterfeits of the Royal Mausoleum's artifacts roam about here.{nl}They already know my face, what should I do...
There are many monsters here, {nl}though it appears there are stone statues moving near the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Perhaps they'll attack when the king gets disturbed in his sleep?
What do we do? {nl}To add to all the chaos in the village, the Vubbes have kidnapped the villagers.
Hunter
Oh, you're just in time. We need your help. {nl}Monsters stole all the aids and supplies meant for the refugees. {nl}
Fortunately, we found them quickly.
I'll stay and aid the people left here. {nl}There are more people who need more than my aid, so please go on ahead.
I'm holding this because it looks like it's about to collapse. {nl}We need some stones to do something about it.
We won't be able to handle it if this wall opens. {nl}How will you stop them then if people are already running away now?
Alright. That'll be enough.
I must go back to the village. {nl}But as you can see my arms are shaking. {nl}Can you defeat the monsters while I rest my arms for a while?
The goddesses are so heartless. {nl}Had the goddesses not disappeared, the monsters wouldn't be invading.
Now I can return to the village with peace of mind. {nl}This grace I shall never forget.
I came here to hide from the monsters, but even this area is becoming dangerous. {nl}I'm trying to make it back to the village, so can you bring the other refugees to me?
I see you came back safely. {nl}Well then, I must also prepare to leave.
What do we do? I think there are even more monsters now than when we first came. {nl}And the patients have not recovered yet. {nl}
Somehow I'll treat this man. Can you defeat the monsters around?
In order for these people to safely return to the village,{nl}we have to defeat these monsters.
Thank you. The patient also regained his consciousness. {nl}Though... I think there is a problem.
This has to be because there is the evidence of salvation or something. {nl}I'm sure that's where the villagers were taken away to.
The goddess must have sent help... {nl}Follow the pathway on the right to find the Vubbe Outpost.
Thank you for saving me. {nl}Seems like you're the Revelator who's looking for evidence of salvation. {nl}
I was taken in late so I was left here, the others were all brought to the mine. {nl}I'll tell you the rest of the story in the Crystal Mine.
You came. {nl}First, let's clear the wagons blocking the way into the mines. {nl}
The wagons can be demolished with these explosives that I have prepared. {nl}I'm concerned about the Vubbes that will come after hearing the explosion {nl}but with your skills, I think we'll be fine.
I'll let you take care of the Vubbes. {nl}I have things to attend to inside. {nl}
Thank you. Thank you very much. {nl}You're a savior of our village. {nl}
Oh, have you seen a girl about 5 years of age? {nl}I heard she was together with them when the villagers were kidnapped.
Don't just stand there. {nl}Move if you want to help or go away.
Mine Manager
I'm hanging on somehow but I'm losing strength in my arms.
I should have been more careful. {nl}It's all my fault.
I have my roots deep in hunting. {nl}Don't worry about me. Go look after the others.
As the mayor, I cannot just leave the village like this. {nl}How could the goddesses be so indifferent?

Aren't you a Revelator? The Goddess must've sent help. {nl}In order to enter the mine, you must save a young man name Vaidotas first. {nl}He was kidnapped and brought to the Vubbe Outpost. {nl} Please, I'm begging for your help.
Kind Owl Sculptor
There are so many wandering spirits these days.{nl}This is really...
Large Frame
It's about a problem.{nl}You should take a look at it yourself rather than me explaining it to you several times.
What's the problem? {nl}Um... it's big, very big.
You saw it right?{nl}He is called Sequoia. {nl}He once protected us owls, but now...{nl}
Some humans are absurdly attacking us owls.{nl}Hence, a few owls have been destroyed and there are an increasing number of people getting hurt.
That Owl
There is an owl that knows this problem well.{nl}But what was its name...{nl}
Ah, I can't concentrate.{nl}While I try to remember, can you take care of the Ellogua?{nl}Their spores are getting in my head so my memories are scrambled.
We are made of ordinary wood so we are scared of moist and insects.{nl}We are keen to being broken as well.{nl}It would have been better if we were made of iron.
Thank you!{nl}I can't scratch my head because I am a tree... Hehe...{nl}
Hm! Yes, I finally remembered! {nl}Find the Anxious Owl.{nl}That owl was so close to Sequoia so it must know the method.
Anxious Owl Sculpture
As promised, I will tell you. About Sequoia. {nl}
Sequoia is obsessed with evil energy.{nl}Must face evil energy with divine power.{nl}Yes. We must face it!{nl}
Please gather wood pieces from the broken sculpture.{nl}Ah. the ones with the power in them. Select well.
My friends became ordinary. {nl}Yes. Ordinary wooden sculptures. {nl}They must still have some divine power left, for sure. I believe...
Okay. Good. This will be enough! {nl}We have enough materials. Good. Good.
Hm? Sequoia? I know it well. Big mouth, big hip...{nl}Look at this. Many of my friends fell down.{nl}Sequoia did this alright.{nl}
But, monsters are keep trying to take them.{nl}What was that? Okay. The Essence of Spirits.{nl}If you get them again, I will tell you. The Essence of Spirits. My poor friends!
They were very good friends. Bad. Yes. I mean those monsters.{nl}I will try harder for my friends. {nl}Yes. I look a little confused...
Thanks. Yes. {nl}I will take you to a good place. For sure...
Gather them, and string them together and stab Sequoia.{nl}Then it will be surprised and run away.
You should succeed on your first try. Okay?
Sometimes I miss it. The old Sequoia.{nl}Why was it possessed by evil energy? There is no way to know. I am just sad. A lot.
Something is wrong. {nl}The Guide Owl is not in a good mood. I hope you go there quickly.{nl}
Take that stick with you. They are my friends.{nl}I think you will need it from now on.
It will be okay. That owl is strong.{nl}It will be okay. It will be okay.
Guide Owl Sculpture
I almost fell into eternal sleep if it weren't you.{nl}Sequoia is our enemy now. Enemy!
Sequoia is not only us owls' problem.{nl}It is attacking any living creatures!{nl}Please help us defeat it.{nl}

If we keep letting Sequoia act like this, us owls will be completely destroyed.{nl}Many people will die as well...{nl}There will be a flood of wandering spirits and we won't have any owls to guide us.{nl}
Sequoia is too late.{nl}They are not only attacking humans, but they also attack us who used to be it's old friends!{nl}
The memory of Sequoia and us together... was it weaker than the evil energy?
Grave Protector Owl Sculpture
Thanks for saving me.{nl}I don't understand how I got attacked by those little things.{nl}Maybe I am too old now.
It seems that the Guide Owl finally made a decision.{nl}It once tried fervently to bring Sequoia back to the way it used to be...{nl}
Anyways, It's good.{nl}I need the Essence of Spirit from the spirit that is wandering around the grave of unknown warrior.{nl}You can do anything, just bring us the Essence.
Spirits that wander around for a long time will become no different than the monsters.

Excellent, you collected the Essences.{nl}When you go back to the Guide Owl, it will empower your weapon with the power of the spirits.{nl}Whether such power will bring about something good... Only a goddess will know.

Although this is a personal matter, there is an angry owl at Cross Hill near here.{nl}After it fell into a deep sleep due to an incident, it became obsessed with evil energy.{nl}Please wake that angry owl up and persuade it to regain its consciousness again.{nl}
If it doesn't listen to you...{nl}Then please destroy it and let it go to the goddess.
I will do anything to bring it back to what it used to be.
This is the symbol of the Guide Owl which guided his spirit.{nl}When it sleeps for a long time, it gets influenced by monsters.{nl}Many of its allies changed like that.{nl}
I am sorry. Let me be alone for a while.
So you brought the power of the spirits.{nl}I will inject the power of the spirits into your stick.{nl}With this much power of the spirits in a stick like this, you will be able to destroy Sequoia.
You must succeed.{nl}If you think about those owls that were eaten by Sequoia or burnt into deaths, you must {nl}succeed this time.
What?{nl}Sequoia ran away alive?{nl}
That's a big problem!{nl}The Desperate Owl is over there...
It is my mistake. I thought it too easy. {nl}I didn't know this would happen. {nl}If the Desperate Owl gets destroyed, then I...{nl}
Please...{nl}Please help the Desperate Owl. {nl}
Desperate Owl Sculpture
It was very scary.{nl}Thanks for saving me.{nl}Although it seems that Sequoia is going crazier than usual, I feel relieved...{nl}
Anyways, it seems that Sequoia is moving towards the Desperate Owl.{nl}Please let nothing happen to it...
Sequoia was in a wild, angry state.{nl}I've never seen Sequoia like that before. We are going to be destroyed by it!{nl}Please lend us your strength!{nl}
We must try everything we can.{nl}We will need the Blackened Boughs laying around since Sequoia burned the forest.{nl}I will string them together and make a stronger stick.
Sequoia destroyed one of my friends, burned this forest, and...{nl}
Even if we are fundamentally good hearted...{nl}I will curse Sequoia until the very moment I fall into deep sleep.
This is plenty enough.{nl}It will be better if I could string my anger into it as well.
I have made the cursed stick with the Blackened Boughs that you brought.{nl}Sequoia must be still near here.{nl}Please stab Sequoia using this.
Sequoia will swallow us and absorb more spirits' energy.{nl}At one time, he was our friend..{nl}But we, and Sequoia, have long forgotten about those days.
To see the forest burning in flames.{nl}I'm fine by it. It's not shocking anymore.{nl}The day when the Sequoia was possessed with evil energy was worse than this.
I hope the owls don't feel disappointed due to their failure.{nl}Sequioia wasn't driven away, but that doesn't mean the stick had failed.{nl}The last two blows must have been especially fatal to it.
However, if we leave Sequoia as it is, then the whole forest may be set ablazed.{nl}It will recover itself by swallowing us.{nl}Please destroy Sequoia now.
