Goddess Laima is often called the recording goddess. {nl}When the Great King Zachariel formed this kingdom, the only record of it was bestowed by Goddess Laima.  {nl}
I'd like to ask you a favor. {nl}I have sinned because I was not able to fulfill my duties of guarding the kingdom on Medzio Diena. {nl}
But I am not a Revelator. {nl}Even if I want to make up for my sins, my duty at the moment is to protect the many citizens of Klaipeda. {nl}
So please find all the revelations. {nl}I will put my position as the Knight Commander of Klaipeda on the line and help you deal with it.
If you're on your way to Klaipeda, let me ask you a favor. {nl}It's not easy to go to Klaipeda because of the Infrorocktors.
I feel so relieved to be stationed in the Western Woods.{nl}There are some places where you'd rather die than to be stationed at.
Aren't you hurt?{nl}I appreciate that you got rid of the Poata but what were you thinking?
You mean you want to enter the Crystal Mines to find the evidence of Salvation? {nl}
But that's tough at the moment. {nl}For some reason, the Vubbes are rushing out of the Crystal Mine.{nl}

Moreover, there has also been an upsurge of monsters here in the Eastern Woods, which now even Klaipeda is threatened. {nl}The Miners' Village, caught in-between here and the Mines, has turned into a battlefield. {nl}
We have divided the platoon into two. {nl}Half of the platoon is guarding Miners' Village {nl}and the other half is investigating why the number of monsters have increased here in the Eastern Woods.

So we are not in the situation to spare our troops for guarding Revelators while they check the evidence of salvation. {nl}But we also can't go against the order of the bishop and Knight Commander either. {nl}
Hmm, how about this? {nl}
To test whether you can safely reach Miners' Village even without the aid of guards... {nl}Why don't you help us in our investigation?
Good job. {nl}Now, let's get to the main task.
Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your your help.{nl}The evidence of salvation that the Revelators are looking for might be found in the Closed Area.
It wasn't so long ago. {nl}I felt a strange energy while experimenting near the Closed Area. {nl}It was quite different from magic I know of. It was very warm.{nl}
The Miners' Village is under siege and is dangerous.{nl}Please wait in Klaipeda until the siege is over.

I am happy to see that you are determined to learn the way of the sword from me, {nl}but I can't be sure that you are capable.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face against the Vubbes at Crystal Mine 1F.
Have you met Jonas at the Gateway of the Great King? {nl}He definitely wasn't sick. {nl}But he also wasn't affected by present-day magic.
If this note is true, we might die any time.{nl}By the way, what happened to the person who wrote it?
Because of that, a few disciples have died.{nl}But, it's strange. It seems that it never happened.
Well done.{nl}Now, is this going to be the last lesson...
Bring me hard shell of Varvs and rigid horns of Zinutekas from the Royal Mausoleum 1F.{nl}It shouldn't be hard since you are my disciple.
It's time for you to enhance the qualities of Manas that you possess as a Linker.{nl}Any magic is okay. I will test you by dueling.
It is a shame to look back once a man starts his journey.{nl}My brother will rather choose to die than look back.
I'm sure my brother stood firm and accepted his final moments. {nl}However, I still think he could've lived more meaningfully {nl}if he had just turned away from his ambition...
I'm thinking of converting the demons using the power of the altar. {nl} The converted demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}
So you found the Seal of Space. {nl}Honestly, I did not believe it when my friend, the Paladin Master, said a Savior would come. {nl}
That's how bad the situation was. {nl}My family and friends all went to the goddess... {nl}It seemed like there was no hope anymore in this world. {nl}
Here, use the Seal of Space on the pillar beside me and go to the sanctuary. {nl}It is prepared only for the Revelator.
I was there when the Divine Tree was destroying the capital. {nl}But I was not able to stop it. I was not able to save everyone.{nl}This will remain in my heart like a needle and it hurts me forever.
But you were different. You have the power to save everyone. {nl}All the followers, the Watchers, even the wishes that me and the first Paladin longed for... {nl}
Right. {nl}Did you mention that you need to find Goddess Saule? {nl}
The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation starts at above the Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of the goddess be with you.
When you find the revelation, tell the Paladin Master of the story you've been through so far. {nl}He must be the one most anxious about it. {nl}
I will gather all the prayers for my family and friends and offer it to you. {nl}May the blessings of goddess be with you...
But this old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl}Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}
Go. The Tenet Church is in Tenet Garden.{nl}My lifelong wish.. Be sure to stop the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.
Please bring me the Mali seeds in the way to Labure Highway. {nl} They would be a good source of magic for the shaman doll. {nl} {nl}
Won't you help me purify Labure Highway? {nl} The shaman doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.
We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}A doll for spells. Doesn't that sound exciting?
I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil energy. {nl} I'm going to break it through the shaman doll. Want to give it a try?
I heard the first Paladin promised three things in return for saving our family. {nl}
Our Shaman dolls are different from Bokor's Shaman dolls. {nl}
You can summon the shaman doll with this summon scroll. {nl}
The power of an Elementalist comes from understanding the root of everything. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest entities.
This forest is also growing dark. {nl}Many people should realize that Medzio Diena was only the start of the disaster. {nl}
Too bad that Gesti wasn't killed, but still you did a great job.{nl}It will end soon..
Without Airine, I would have died.{nl}Of course, I really appreciate for your help.
It's all my fault.{nl}Schmid is dead.. what can I do alone...
Prayers and ceremonies are not the only ways of serving the goddess. {nl}Serving the world through physical training is also an important mission of the cleric.
There are two ways to connect with the goddess. {nl}An ardent belief for her, and the sound of silver dropping into her offering box. Just those two.
The magic to control time is the essence of all magics.{nl}These are Agailla Flurry's words.
I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord ransacking the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}As a person undergoing training, I am ashamed that I couldn't go out and fight.
The bishop is praying in closure. {nl}When you are ready, please go to Aras in the Eastern Woods.
I'll give you more than what the knight asked me to give so please help us find the goddesses. {nl}
Klaipeda is full of hope and expectations for the Revelators who dreamed of the goddess. {nl}I am also one of them. {nl}
I'll give you more than what the knight asked me to give. {nl}Since we have many Revelators, things will get better, right?
You mean you actually drove away the Demon Lord from the Crystal Mine... {nl}Thank you for restoring in me something that I had lost for a while. Hope.
The first Paladin and the Tenet Church fulfilled their duties. {nl}Right.. The time has finally come. Together with the Revelator.
I heard the monsters in Kateen Forest are eating up the Owl Sculptures I've made. {nl}I'm sure they are trying to use the souls for something else. Like for nourishment...
Did you know? A Revelator defeated the Demon Lord in the Crystal Mine. {nl}Do you think that with disaster also comes hope?
When I first saw the Revelators, I wondered if they were worthy of that name. {nl}But they saved the Crystal Mine and the Tenet Church. {nl}There is definitely a Savior whom the goddess sent.
I heard some Revelator defeated the Demon Lord in Crystal Mine. {nl}That's incredible. Aren't Demon Lords the greatest among the demons?

Did you hear about the Revelator who stopped the Demon Queen at the Tenet Church? {nl}It would have been better if she was killed for good, {nl}but she is the Demon Queen after all, someone that even the Paladin Master wasn't able to defeat. {nl}That is awesome enough.
As a Hunter, my instinct says the monsters in this forest are showing unusual movement. {nl}As if they are controlled by something.
I feel ashamed that I wasn't able to join the squad in the Tenet Church. {nl}But isn't it amazing? the Tenet Church was saved from that Demon Lord.
Just as I thought. The monsters in this forest were chased in by the Vubbes. {nl}And the Revelator actually defeated the Demon Lord that planned all this.{nl}I really wonder who it was.

If it was my hometown, if a demon occupied the Mines, everyone would have attacked it and celebrated. {nl}Anyway, I don't know who that Revelator is but this weak kingdom finally found someone useful.

A sacred church had to go through such bad things. The clerics of this kingdom are planning something unusual.{nl}But it's a good thing to have protected the Tenet Church. It means they have the guts, don't you think? {nl}{nl}
The Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Mines. {nl}I have no idea what's going on. Do you have anything that comes to mind?
We won't know if the Revelators really dreamed of the goddess. It could even be a trick of the demons. {nl}But didn't someone among them save the Tenet Church. {nl}From the Demon Lord even.

It's a relief a Revelator drove away the Demon Lord from the mines. I was scared another Medzio Diena would happen. {nl}But I felt something warm... Was it just my delusion? {nl}It was a pure and good energy.

It's such good news that a Revelator helped drive away the Demon Lord of the Crystal Mine.{nl}But I felt a strange and sacred energy... Could it have been just a delusion? {nl}It is hard to describe it.

Do you think Medzio Diena and the demons are related? {nl}I mean look at the Tenet Church. It was as if the demons were waiting for that moment...{nl}Come to think of it, the Revelators could have been ones who set the stage.
I made it through the wild monsters and you made through the Thorn Forest. {nl}I'm sure you're not looking for the goddess... So what's the matter?

I heard the historians were attacked by the Demon Lord at King's Plateau. {nl}So it means the disaster was forewarned a thousand years ago? {nl}Anyway, it's a relief the Revelator was able to stop it.

In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but..{nl}You making it through the forest... Does it mean the forest is now purified?

There is still so much left undiscovered about the Great King Zachariel.{nl}But since the demons live longer than us... This must have been what they were preying at. {nl}I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. We might even have had another Medzio Diena.
I heard the source of the evil energy deep in the Thorn Forest recently disappeared. {nl}But we will need a long time for the forest to return to its previous state...

Did you hear that a Revelator stopped the Demon Lord's plan in the Royal Mausoleum? {nl}I heard that a Demon Lord was going around destroying the ruins in King's Plateau.{nl}I'm glad it got its punishment.
How did you come here? Did you make it through the Thorn Forest? {nl}Hmm. Are you saying you can't tell me about it.

The Demon Lord that was messing with King's Plateau seems to have been the reason behind all the cases of missing people. {nl}It serves him right that a Revelator stopped all his plans from succeeding.
Since Goddess Saule disappeared, the area around Kvailas Forest was filled with evil energy and thorns. {nl}But you made it through the Thorn Forest? Can we say that's a good sign? {nl}
A Revelator saved the Royal Mausoleum of King Zachariel. {nl}But why would the demons go after ruins that's over a thousand years old? {nl}There is so much that we don't know about. {nl}
I heard the monsters keep attacking the ruins and the historians keep disappearing. {nl}Yet, nobody remembers anything after the fact. How funny.
I heard a Revelator drove out the Demon Lord that was trying to take over the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}That's funny. Doesn't that mean that everything was foreseen a thousand years ago?

If the Demon Lord invaded the Royal Mausoleum, then the symptoms of Jonas in Gate Route also becomes clear. {nl}If King Zachariel erased the memory of the workers in the Mausoleum, then it must be a side effect of the old magic. {nl}What do you think he was planning to do?
Now the demons even bear the face of a human. {nl}I heard some Revelator stopped the Demon Lord in the Royal Mausoleum,{nl} but I wonder how many demons are now hiding amongst humans.
This place holds records of the hidden side of history. {nl}Time is an absolute thing. It just depends on how you look at it.

I heard a Revelator stopped the Demon Lord that was eyeing the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}It may be a bit overboard to make a connection between Medzio Diena and a king from a thousand years ago... {nl}But I'm sure that was something that we were all made to forget.
The demons have been continuously attacking the Mage Tower even before Medzio Diena.{nl}Thanks to the goddess sending us the Revelator, we finally make an end to the long battle.
The weight of history feels astoundingly heavy when you stand in this place. {nl}Maybe you can find a clue about Medzio Diena here.

I keep thinking that Medzio Diena might have just been a process.{nl}If not, then why would the demons go after a mausoleum that is over a thousand years old? {nl}It's a good thing some Revelator stopped it.
Everyone knew that Helgasercle showed an obsession towards the Mage Tower since centuries ago. {nl}Whatever is in that tower, we can finally see the end of it. {nl}That's a great thing.

First the Tenet Church and now the Great Cathedral...{nl}But they say it was all resolved by the Revelator, so I am hopeful that things will get better.{nl}Not minding the gossip of the world and doing what you must is what's good for the goddess and the kingdom.

The rumor that a Revelator saved the Mage Tower is something that even someone like me, {nl}who is not interested in the gossips of the world, will take in. {nl}I'm surprised that there was a even one person who was good enough from anybody there.
Hergasercle was an incarnation of obsession. {nl}The chain of obsession was broken thanks to the Revelator but its souls is not something that can be saved.

I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord who sullied the wise teachings of Maven. {nl}Now it is time for us priests to come forward. {nl}We should put away our regrets about failing to protect the Great Cathedral and atone for our sins.
My colleague is dead?{nl}That can't be. If only I had not tempted him...{nl}
This map is useless to me now, without my colleague.{nl}Please pray that my colleague goes to the goddess safely.
I can't leave everything behind...
What do we do? {nl}The Vubbes rushed in and kidnapped the villagers!
You are the Revelator, right? {nl}The goddess must have helped. {nl}
This is all because of the dream of the bishop of Klaipeda. {nl}What is he talking about evidence of salvation in the Crystal Mine. I have never seen such thing. {nl}
I'm not sure if that is the reason but the Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Crystal Mine. {nl}Those Vubbes took all the villagers they see into the mines. {nl}
Please... Save the villagers. {nl}I beg of you!
Let's go to the Crystal Mine. {nl}I will tell you the rest of the story at the Crystal Mine entrance.

Hold on! There is something you should know. {nl}We went into the mines to save the kidnapped villagers too.{nl}But the purifiers were broken and the mine was filled with toxic fumes, so we failed every time. {nl}
Ye..Yes..{nl}Find a young man named Vaidotas!{nl}
That fellow knows well about the purifiers in the Crystal Mine. {nl}It hasn't been long since he was taken away by the Vubbes so he must be in the Vubbe Outpost.
You want to learn my skills?{nl}It's not hard for me to teach you, but would you be able to handle it?
The goddess always told us to help those around us.{nl}By helping others near you, you will help your spirit as well.
Great King Zachariel's ordeal is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have acknowledged you.
The kingdom has lost all hope. {nl}It does not have any will to stand firm anymore and is just crying out for the goddesses.{nl}
In recent times however, people have come forward saying they dreamed of the goddess. {nl}You are one such person, Revelator. {nl}
Anyway, the bishop himself also had a dream while praying in closure. {nl}In his dream, the goddess told him the evidence of salvation will be found in the Crystal Mine. {nl}
Knight Aras at the Eastern Woods is in charge of that so go and meet him.
Four years has passed since that incident, why is the goddess sending us Revelators now... {nl}I guess someone like me may not be able to understand the deeper meaning of the goddess' will.
But, at least I know that the Revelators are our only hope.{nl}
Well then, go on to the Eastern Woods. {nl}Don't forget to worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza before you leave. {nl}
Also, be sure to drop by the Item Merchant.{nl}I have left some warp scrolls for Revelators like you.
I can feel Bramble suffering.{nl}He is getting retribution for extracting all vigor from this land.
I am not afraid of dying.{nl}Goddess Saule will guide me well.
The portal that you tried to open was a false gateway.{nl}That portal leads to where all of the world's knowledge is.
I have been fighting the Demon Lord Bramble, who tried to take over the revelation. {nl}I have fought with it night and day to be able to hand the revelation to you. {nl}
But, Medzio Diena broke the balance of strength. {nl}The goddesses lost most of their strength since that day. {nl}
Bramble took that chance to steal the revelation and seal me in this place. {nl}Because only I know how to interpret the revelation.{nl}
But I did not give into Bramble's order to interpret the revelation.{nl}That is why he made a plot to open a portal to where all the knowledge of the world is. {nl}
The residents of this area are victims of the plot to open that portal. {nl}To find a way to get the revelation using your power as the savior... Something brutal was done. {nl}
I lost most of my strength and couldn't stop that horror from happening. {nl}All I could do was... to despair. {nl}
But the revelation led you to me. {nl}I am certain that you are the ray of light who will save all of this world. {nl}
Savior. {nl}Please destroy the magic that is trapping me. {nl}In order to deliver and follow the revelation, I must first be freed.
The Binding Magic Circles are located in Drugys Courtyard and Vapsva Vacant Lot. {nl}Please hurry before I lose my consciousness.
Thank you for saving me. {nl}You are... the only true savior who will save this world. {nl}The one who Goddess Laima talked about.
I am Saule, the goddess of the sun.{nl}I was the guardian of the revelation.
This cage is still confining me. {nl} We've got to find Clymen who has the key and is hiding in between the dimensional crack.
Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Altar Grand Corridor. {nl} I will try to use the divine power that dwells in the tool.
I am finally free. {nl}I will prepare to interpret the revelation from this point on. {nl}
As I have told you before, the revelation is in the hands of the Demon Lord Bramble. {nl}I feel sorry that I have to burden you, but your strength is the only thing I can rely on.{nl}
But Bramble is also not in its usual condition due to the previous battle. {nl}It is recovering by turning the forest into a thorn forest and extracting nourishment.
My Believers are waiting for you in Gate Route. {nl}Please take back the revelation from Bramble.
I have carved many owls for a long time to help Goddess Ausrine.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}
Medzio Diena was just the beginning. {nl}A forest far away from the capital such as this one is also starting to soak its way into the evil energy. {nl}
I will be able to guide you to the revelation if I use all the strength left in me. {nl}That is why you should release me.

But please don't reveal my existence for now. {nl}It is the nature of humans to want to depend on something. {nl}If they find out about the helplessness of the goddesses, this world will be full of chaos and sighs.
That portal is... a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl} Anyway, opening the portal is very important.

If armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl} I hope this will be useful for you.{nl}Nice to meet you!{nl}Are you the Revelator who dreamed of the goddess? {nl}
Everyone in Klaipeda is talking about it. {nl}I wonder if the Revelators really saw the missing goddesses in their dreams... and where is that dream... {nl}
I am curious to know more about the dream but I'm sure they can't tell me about it.{nl}But that's fine since I believe that the Revelators are people who will find the goddesses. {nl}
Please take this accessory. {nl}If the armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl}
I hope it will be useful for you. {nl}May the blessings of goddess be with you...
It's a little strange that it had to be the venom of Scorpio.{nl}Well... it's already done so what can I do?{nl}It doesn't bother me as long as it doesn't threaten my life.
I must be causing you some trouble... Thanks for helping.{nl}Now you just have to make a magic circle with the firewood I gave you, and burn the voodoo doll on top of it.
The crops died when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's okay. I was told that the bad energy within the crops will go away like that. {nl}
This is tough. {nl}Many might be killed..
Huh? You killed it because it tried to eat people? {nl}Ah.. well then, never mind. I will report it to the baron myself.
This is the last one. {nl}The magic circle at Darbas Entrance will have a lot of monsters that will interfere. {nl}With the divine power suppressed, the monsters are naturally drawn to that area.
The baron is doing something to purify this farm. {nl}But recently the crops are dying and people are starting to fall sick. {nl}

If the magic circles are really a lie, then you should be able to remove the magic circles at Tylila Path with the goddess' power. {nl}I mean something like the Goddess Statue. Is there any way to get it?
If only I had a little more time...{nl}My documents... I can't leave them...
These things are useless to me now...{nl}Okay. Maybe you... My documents are at Dykyne Fork...
Gerda
I am a new member of the Kedorlaomer Merchants. {nl}I am setting up warning and notice Boards related to the Kedorlaomers here and there. {nl}It is very tiring though.

{nl}If it is alright with you, can you set up some boards on the lower area over there? {nl}That's where Jurate is trying to excavate sacred objects so we need to put up a warning for pedestrians. {nl}But I need to go somewhere else...
Thank you. {nl}That would be good enough.
Serapinas
I am Serapinas, one of the new members of the Kedorlaomer Merchants. {nl}I am in charge of promoting the merchants. {nl}If you have time, can you help me in one of my promotion agenda?

{nl}It's nothing difficult. You just have to go near Orsha or Klaipeda and help the Revelators who just began their adventures. {nl}I will give you a scroll. If you use it on them, it will help them and promote the merchants as well.
You must use it near the fields of Orsha or Klaipeda. {nl}And it must be someone who just began their adventure. {nl}I will not work on people who have seen the promotion material already.
Thank you for stepping up to help.
Oh, you're back already. {nl}Revelators sure are different.
Jurate
I am Jurate, the leader of sacred object excavation team. {nl}Are you here to help? {nl}We need some.
{nl}Let's take time to talk later but first, please help excavate the area I tell you .
It would also be nice to take care of the monsters on your way there too.
It won't be that dangerous.
Oh, you brought it. {nl}This is a sacred object known as the Incense of Goddess.
Did I tell you? {nl}Oh, it was a long day... {nl}We faced Medzio Diena right here while we were transporting the sacred objects to Orsha.

{nl}The wagon flipped and the sacred objects scattered around. {nl}That's why we are going through this excavation to find it. {nl}But people are hesitating to excavate that area because of the monsters... Please help us.
I wonder if it was eaten by the monster...
Looks like the monsters ripped it to shreds but here. {nl}Let me try to have it back.
{nl}Since it is the record of the merchants, only if I could stick it back together...
This record is about the materials of the arrow that the merchants supplied to Lydia Schaffen and her arrow maker, the first Fletcher MAster.
I think there should be some sacred objects up here too though. {nl}I can't tell where exactly. {nl}Can you look for it? I'll give you a detector.
Locate the area and then carefully dig that area. {nl}You will probably find the sacred object.
Carefully use the detector as you go north.
Oh, you found it.
{nl}Let's see...
{nl}This sacred object is an ink bottle. {nl}It contains the secret ink that was used for important records and documents. {nl}I assume this ink was used when they needed to hide the record.
{nl}Ah, I think that's about all the work we need to do for the day. {nl}Thank you for your help.
Margellius
Hello. {nl}I am Margellius, the one in charge of the records.
{nl}If you want to help me... {nl}Please find the records of the merchant that the monsters stole from us.
As Leopoldas says, we, the merchants, have been doing a lot of things. {nl}The records hold the history of our works.
If we get back the records that the monsters stole from us, then we must rewrite them again so that it will stand the times.
Thank you for coming forward to help us. {nl}We are in really tight hands.
Now we have to rewrite the damaged records... {nl}The ink made from monster fluids are good and lasts long. {nl}I will give you a trap to use so please get me the monster fluid.
If you place the trap near the monster, the monster will be lured to it and faint. {nl}You need to extract its fluid while it is still alive.
You can get it from all the monsters around the area.
This is good enough! {nl}Thank you very much!
Now it's time to make the sanctuary. {nl}Try to make it here. {nl}I will give you the materials and tools you need.
You can make it here.
Good work. {nl}I have a feeling that Giedra, in the northern area, also needs your help.
Giedra
You're the Revelator. {nl}I am Giedra of the Rhud Order. {nl}If you're here to meet Antanas, I'm sure you've already heard about our order so I won't talk so much about it.

{nl}I am collecting the materials needed to make the Scriptures of Goddess. {nl}Normal paper turns yellow and decays quickly... So I'm looking for materials that won't get wet nor be discolored easily. {nl}The transparent shell of the monsters are great for it. If you polish it well before writing on it, it will last a long time. {nl}Can you get me those? {nl}
It's a pretty common material so it will be easily to collect.
Bring it to me when you collect them all.
You brought them earlier than I expected. {nl}These shells will now be polished and used as pages of the scripture. {nl}Thank you.

We also need to do some bookbinding. {nl}Making sure the book does not break lose is the most important thing. {nl}The leather string made from monster leather is the best but the problem is that it is too short. {nl}I will give you an anvil. Can you make me some bookbinding strings using the leather strings?

Listen carefully. First, get leather string from the monsters, then use this anvil to turn the leather strings into a strings for bookbinding. {nl}You need to connect the short strings and make it into a single string. {nl}It also becomes more durable this way.
Return to me when you are done making the string.
Awesome! {nl}You can say that you made a book yourself.
{nl}Kestas over there also needs your help. Try talking to him.
Kestas
I had the records of my seniors...{nl}But it was all stolen... {nl}I'm done...
Oh oh oh!{nl}Please help me!{nl}My seniors' records are all gone!
{nl}That's my job but it's all gone! All of it! {nl}Please find it! {nl}I'm sure the monsters took it!
What to do... What do I do... {nl}I'm done... All the hardworks put in to make those records...
{nl}That's it! Wow, you got them all! {nl}Thank you!{nl}How can I thank you enough...
Aah it's all good now! Now go back to Orsha and complete the records!{nl}Hahaha!
Ah really... {nl}Actually, these records are made out of the polished shells of the monsters. {nl}You need to write it there to make it last long.
{nl}Yes, yes, right. That is also why Giedra is trying to make the scripture using the monster shells. {nl}That's why we are always attacked like this. {nl}Because they can smell their fellows...
{nl}Anyway, now I'll really go to Orsha now. {nl}Thank you very much!
Chisel?{nl}The tools merchant should have it. {nl}Go on over there.
It's a long way back with the tool... {nl}Be careful.
A Chisel? {nl}You will use it to repair the sanctuary?
{nl}Well, I just bought some old chisels from other Revelators... {nl}If you need, you can take one of it.
Did you get the chisel?
Oh, you got them all.
It's a long way to Genar Field... {nl}Go on.
Albinas
Thank you for what just happened. {nl}Ah, this sanctuary...

{nl}I expected it to be polluted but... I mean who would have thought it would be this bad? {nl}Making a sanctuary like this here is bad enough but those Nestos. {nl}What are they thinking leaving it corrupted like this.
{nl}Can you help me out for a while?
I belong to the Anastos. {nl}The Nestos still pursue unconditional belief even at this point when the goddesses are all gone. {nl}That's why they are building sanctuaries here and there.

{nl}What's the use of sanctuaries when the goddesses are all gone? {nl}When you know it will just be corrupted like this even if you build it. {nl}On the other hand, the Anastospa pursue practicality.
People come first, mopping up the demons come first, and what's the use of faith when the goddess themselves abandoned us?
There is another sanctuary over there. {nl}I will finish burning this sanctuary so please destroy the one over there. {nl}We need to teach those Nestos as lesson.
{nl}I'm sure the sanctuary over there is also fuming red enegy. {nl}A sign of corruption.
Damijonas
What the... {nl}Who are you? What are you doing to our sanctuary...
This is the sacred sanctuary of the Nestos. Did you do this?
I have never heard about someone like that. {nl}I may not know every singe person in Anastopas but I at least know those who set up this camp.
I'm at loss for any word.
{nl}Albinas? He is one of Anastopas? That can't be. {nl}Bring that person here. I need to check for myself.
Are you saying that Albinas guy is missing? {nl}It's getting out of hand. {nl}I'm sure Anastos won't do such a thing.
{nl}Anyway, our priority then is to restore this sanctuary. {nl}You did this so you should be responsible for it. {nl}There are rocks over there.

{nl}This sanctuary was also made of the rocks here so collect some rocks. {nl}And the Nestos Camp is over there. {nl}You'll find someone named Eduinas . {nl}Ask him to polish the rocks to use as materials for restoring the sanctuary.
If he finds out you did this to the sanctuary, he won't polish the rocks easily. {nl}But that's a price you have to pay and you should be responsbile for it.
Still not done yet?
Eduinas
Who are you..? {nl}And what are these rocks?
What? Destoryed the sanctuary? {nl}The sanctuary that was built with everyone's efforts here?

I don't need your apologies. {nl}I'll polish the rocks to use as materials since Damijonas said so but don't ever do that again. {nl}And while I polish these, I don't want to see your face so go away and take care of some monsters nearby.
You should wait longer.
Done. Now, don't ever do that again.
You brought it. {nl}Now let's begin the restoration.

Done. It's a good thing it wasn't totally destroyed. {nl}I apologize for being angry at you a while ago. Seeing the sanctuary destroyed was upsetting. {nl}But it's not total nonsense. {nl}Anastos and Nestos may be in conflict of interests but we do not invade each other's territory.
{nl}But you mentioned someone from Anastos that I don't even know as the reason behind destroying the sanctuary so I couldn't hold my anger. {nl}Anyway, at least you restored it...
{nl}But it strange. I have never heard of that name...{nl}Anastos Camp is in the northern side so why don't you go there and ask. {nl}It really is strange.
Gedas
Don't bother me if you don't have any business. {nl}Ah... I really need that...
{nl}Hey, can you find it for me? {nl}My research materials. {nl}The monsters took them all from me...
More than other things, we need to find it first! {nl}My research! My research! {nl}The monsters took it! {nl}Find me that first!
Are you not done yet?
Let me see... {nl}Yes, right! You got them all! {nl}Thank you very much!
{nl}Oh, did you have something to ask?
Albi...nas...?
{nl}Uh...
{nl}Nope. I can't think of anyone on Anastos with that name. {nl}Moreover, he told you go burn and destroy the Nestos sanctuary? {nl}Oh my god...

{nl}Nonsense. We don't do such a thing. {nl}I think we need to investigate on that matter. {nl}We give danger signal fires when we send out people for investigation {nl}and we ran out of it just now. {nl}Can you find some firepowder that are used to make the danger signal fires?
We all serve the goddess. That is why we're on the pilgrimages. {nl}It's just a small difference in how we see the world.
{nl}Nestospa's people say that we should believe in the goddesses unconditionally even if they disappeared, {nl}while we, the Anastospa, pursue something more practical.
{nl}Defeating demons, improving the qualities of human lives... we have to aim for those things.
Monsters are all around so it will be difficult to obtain the materials.
But, Albinas... We don't feel good about it.
Okay, good. That's enough.{nl}Now, we will make flame bombs. Please wait a bit.
We've completed the flame bomb... Now I will call my colleague.{nl}He is called Fabijus.
Fabijus is a moderatist among Anastos, so he won't have problem even if he meets one of Nestos on his way.
Since Fabijus left... we would somehow get some answer.{nl}But, I don't feel good about it. Is there any information...
{nl}Ah! Barte over ther must know something.{nl}He arrived here while traveling various locations.{nl}How about we ask about Albinas there?
It's just a different perspective of looking at the world. {nl}The topic they cover the most...

{nl}The disappearances of the goddesses were done spontaneously so are we going to still follow then after they abandoned us...{nl}Another problem is whether we, humans should continue to manage the world where the goddesses have disappeared...
{nl}Are we going to aim for the truth or trust the goddessses and pray... that will be the difference.{nl}But, they are just conflicting each other and they don't deny each others' existences.
She is rather progressive.{nl}So since she is not close to me... I want you to go to her.
Barte
{nl}Ah, yes. I am called Barte.{nl}I was on a journey until recently. I am thinking about leaving again.

Albinas... Is that him?{nl}When we arrived at the camp recently, one man was wearing the same outfit like us so I was going to say hello, but then I felt something was not right so I decided not to.{nl}He was giggling as he was looking at the leathers that were engraved with writings and he ripped off those leathers.

{nl}I was scared since that wasn't the power of a human, but he threw all those leathers on the ground and disappeared down there. The monsters thought that was the time and ate all the leathers. Was the smell of blood on those leathers?...
{nl}It was scary. {nl}Ah, I think the monsters there could've not digested the leathers as yet... {nl}Can you bring them? I am curious too.

The people who are progressive are a minority among Anastos.{nl}They are asserting to stop conflicting with Nestos, but instead try to change Nestos.{nl}So that Albinas probably told them he is also progressive.
{nl}So he could make you participate into destroying the sanctums of Nestos.
I can connect the burnt leathers together.
The monsters have those.
Let's see...
{nl}Uh?
{nl}Ah... This doesn't make sense... He...is a subordinate of Vaiga.{nl}Bring a conflict to Nestos and Anastos...{nl}You can use the Revelator...{nl}Vaiga.
Please tell this to Gedas!{nl}Oh my god, what is happening to Fabijus?
We don't have time. Hurry.
What?{nl}Damn it...{nl}The demons came here...
Fabijus... what is happening to him?{nl}What should I do...?
The flame bomb has exploded!{nl}Please hurry to Fabijus!
{nl}And one more thing I should tell you...
{nl}To defeat the demons, Nestos may be better, when you stop by their camp and explain about the circumstances, they would tell you how to defeat Albinas.
Damn...{nl}That was his plot.{nl}I thought it was suspicious.
{nl}Please take this sacred object.{nl}You would be able to defeat the demons.
You are safe.{nl}I've heard from Fabijus.{nl}Everything was Vaiga's plot...{nl}We should be cautious all the time.{nl}Thank you.
It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...
Thank you. {nl} My comrades will now be able to rest in peace.
It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the goddesses.
Damn. {nl}It's too wide, so let's move separately.{nl}
First, you go deep into that place.{nl}Who knows? The demons with the special power may possess something.{nl}
I am so mad.{nl}There isn't anything special and the demons didn't have anything.{nl}
Did we search an empty area?
I will search the area up here.{nl}Let's meet later.
How about you?{nl}Have you obtained anything?
Wait!{nl}I can sense something big from Monocle.{nl}
It looks to be very big. Go there and check yourself.{nl}I will hide here since the battles are not my type.{nl}I don't know what to do if a strong demon comes out.
Monocle is looking for the hidden object that is hidden inside the special power. It is a big object.
Go there and check.{nl}Like a while ago, the demons may appear and there may be really strong demons there... I will hide myself here.
An outsider comes here... Who are you?{nl}How did you come here?
It is really big so you will recognize it when you see it.
I will introduce myself first.{nl}I am the manager of the Fortress of the Land.{nl}Who are you?{nl}
Okay. You don't have to explain anymore.{nl}I can feel you are full of sacred power.{nl}
I know the special power which Ruklys hid here exists.{nl}If it is your task to find it, then I will help for sure.
You can't say no nor ask for reasons to the kingdom orders.{nl}But as I lived here for my life, I have many things to think.{nl}
The kingdom order told us to ban anyone's entrance here, but I think the goddess made us to meet each other here.{nl}The goddess is not under the kingdom.{nl}
If it is about the Goddess, then I will do the guide.{nl}At least, there aren't anything here so let's go to the next area.
Ah, I totally forgot.{nl}I've prepared many things to block the intruders, but I totally forgot about them.{nl}
I need a certificate.{nl}It was created to attack the ones who are not permitted ferociously.{nl}
To make a certificate, we first need a mushroom.{nl}There are many mushrooms at the lower area so please get me one.
I will help anything that is related to the goddesses.{nl}Finally, an opportunity has come in my boring life.
They are enough to make the certificate.{nl}Please wait a bit.
What I can do for you is to put my sign on the certificate.{nl}But, I am too old to use magic.{nl}

But, I am sure the energy that is flowing around the Fortress of the Land could substitute my weak power.{nl}Please gather all of those.{nl}The monsters who've lived here for a long time must have the crystal of the great earth.
I am not like the old days.{nl}When I made that certificate, I thought I would never make anymore.
I never knew that I would be making this again... Please wait.{nl}I will make it quickly.
Let's go more deep inside. {nl}I hope you can find the one that you are looking for. {nl}
I will go there first so please follow.
Don't come late.
Welcome.
Please receive it.{nl}My devices won't attack you anymore.
I've protected this place for my entire life, but I don't know anything about the revelation which you are looking for.{nl}But, the spirit that lived in the era of Ruklys may know something.
But, those spirits are dangerous.{nl}Since they only have the thoughts of that time. Their hatred towards the kingdom soldiers.
The Soul Stones that read the memories of the spirits are beside me.{nl}I've created them. I've tried to read their memories in the past many times.{nl}
But, what we received in return were only hatred.{nl}For them, we are just kingdom soldiers that are trying to occupy the Fortress of the Land.
It is unfortunate, but to make them not to go crazy, you would need the Restraint Token.
It is very complex to make the Restraint Token.{nl}We've failed that time, but since we have you this time, it will be much easier this time.{nl}
I will tell you in steps, so please first bring the eggs of Rajatad.
The spirits only have the feeling of anger left.{nl}I guess we can't do anything about it.
This egg is the power to restrain.{nl}Now, we need something to execute the power.
To execute the power, the bones of the demons are the best.{nl}When you get the bones, I will move the power of restraint that is in the eggs to the bones of the demons.
Even I failed to pull out the memories of the spirits.{nl}I feel reliable since you are with me.
Well done.{nl}We only have to do the last step in order to complete the Restraint Token.
As I told you before, I've tried to look at the memories of the spirits.{nl}The resistances from the spirits were too aggressive at then, so I failed that time.{nl}
But, now I have you and the token of restraint.{nl}If we could bring the spirits, we may able to read the memories with the soul stones that are beside me.
Please bring the spirits here with the Restraint Token.{nl}I will get prepared.
Please bring the spirits fast.{nl}I am also curious.
They are breaking something after receiving an order from Ruklys.{nl}I think that may be related to the revelation of the goddesses.
I should find out about the device which Ruklys destroyed.

We can look at the detailed memories of the spirits by enhancing the Restraint Token.{nl}Due to enhanced Restraint Token, the spirits would resist. If the spirits resist, suppress them with your power and use the token of the spirit.
I have no choice even if the spirits suffer. {nl}That's the best way I can help you.
Finally found it.{nl}I've been looking for it for 600 years and finally... found the revelation.
Please put the vitality of the monsters into this bone.{nl}Then, the power to restrain, the power to release, and the power to execute, all steps will be put into those.{nl}
That's an old method.{nl}If we complete this, you may able to see the memories of the spirits that were with Ruklys.
Even we if we know the method, it is useless if we can't execute it.{nl}I wasn't able to obtain the vitalities of the monsters...
Good. {nl}That's the Restraint Token.{nl}
Don't care that much even if we use the demons.{nl}What's important is that we should look for the revelation of the goddess.
Are there spirits that are wandering around the Fortress of the Land without going to the goddesses?{nl}I can't see them suffering anymore.
I can only help you to make the owl sculptures.{nl}Those owls would guide the spirits that lost their ways.
Can you put the owl sculptures at the Fortress of the Land?{nl}If you guide the spirits to the owl sculptures, then you would be able to go beside the goddesses.
I can't quit carving the owl sculptures.{nl}When I stop carving, then that means the peaceful days have come.
Thanks.{nl}The goddesses must have given use long lives to fulfill these.
I don't have time to think about those treasures.{nl}I also care for the kingdom. I know that the revelation should not fall into the hands of the demons.{nl}
I should meet Eminent around here.{nl}Let's check with Monocle without being noticed by Eminent.
This is as I thought... He is not like the guardian of the revelation.{nl}Otherwise, are the demons the guardians of the revelation?{nl}
They are going after the revelation.{nl}What should we do about it...{nl}
That's right!{nl}We have that document.
Do you remember?{nl}It's the document that was in the treasure when we went to the hidden place.{nl}

The methods of the activation and the repair of the magic circle is written there to face against the demons at the battle field.{nl}If we somehow use them effectively, we may able to block Eminent.{nl}
First, you do what Eminent tells you to do.{nl}And let's secretly activate the magic circle with me.
Did it go well?{nl}The last thing is near the Ikbeta Platform.{nl}
But, the power of the magic circle is getting suppressed due to the flags of the demons.{nl}I've tried to get near it somehow, but I can't due to the demons.
Let's pull out the demon flags that are near the magic circle.{nl}
Ah, if you go late, Eminent may suspect you.{nl}Go meet Eminent as the magic circle gets activated.
I believe that Ruklys has not colluded with the demons.{nl}If not, what I saw are all lies.
Have you collected all the parts?{nl}Give it to me. I can restore it.
I want you to meet the revelation of the goddess fast.{nl}To fulfill my lifelong wish...
I will not hide it anymore.{nl}I am Premier Eminent and I used to serve King Kadumel.{nl}
It's up to you to believe, but I want you to give me an opportunity to at least explain this.
I am sure that you know this place is the last battlefield where Ruklys resisted until his death.{nl}And Ruklys was also the guardian of the revelation like his master, Maven.{nl}
But, as the defeat came, he crossed the line which he should not have crossed.{nl}He made an alliance with the demons.{nl}
The Fortress of the Land is full of vicious demons and monsters. {nl}That's why I brought my army here.{nl}
It was a long battle. But the battle ended with my victory.{nl}And then the voices of the goddess was heard. To protect the revelation.{nl}
But, I don't know how Ruklys hid the revelation.{nl}He is just a half guardian.{nl}
It's up to you to believe this story, but look at me in front of you.{nl}I've been living with the blessing from the goddesses for the last 600 years.{nl}
And I've met you at the end.{nl}And you pulled me to the place where the revelation is.{nl}
It is my honor since I can be helpful to you. {nl}I was suffering from the sense of shame since I don't know what the half guardian could do.{nl}
Let's finish the explanation here and go look for the revelation of the goddesses.{nl}I have things to prepare so I will go there first.{nl}
Ah, you still haven't left?{nl}
I've thought about it a lot. {nl}I am sure that the person who've been to this deep is just me among the grave thieves!{nl}
We should record this historic moment.{nl}Can you bring some stones where I could record my achievements?
What should I write on the stones? {nl}If you have any thoughts, please let me know.
I know that it is hard to bring something that is that big.{nl}Thank you. I will think what to write on it.
Isn't this the diary of Ruklys? {nl}I am sure that more than this. Can you look for more?
When you bring this to Wilhelmina Carriot, she will pay you accordingly.
Okay. This is enough.{nl}
The history which we know are all lies. He was killed by the hands of the one he used to love.{nl}Ruklys, he is an unfortunate man.

It's good to see that you are still alive.{nl}Do you remember? When I first looked through this Monocle.{nl}I thought the object is hidden by the special force, but when I went there there were only demons there.{nl}

And when you entered the habitants' area, you've checked it with Monocle right?{nl}The strong force was detected so I remember that I told you to check.{nl}You told me that there is only an old manager there.{nl}
Since then, I've been keep looking for that force with this monocle... {nl}But, when I went to the places, only demons were there.{nl}
Maybe...{nl}The true nature of the force that can be seen by Monocle is maybe... demons?{nl}
That old manager... I have no idea...
I hope my assumptions are wrong.
The demons did not attack Premier Eminent? {nl}
I need to check it. {nl}Let's go together and meet that Eminent guy. {nl}
We will know for sure if you check that guy with the Monocle.
Mirtis is gone, but the Vubbes are still following Mirtis' commands. {nl}And there is also a rumor that even stronger and more dangerous Vubbes were seen. {nl}
Most of them died while returning with the prince's men.{nl}But they were not guided by the goddess even after their death. {nl}
I want to mourn for those who died unfairly. {nl}Would you like to join me?
Chapparition will not bring back the lives of those who died.{nl}It's a sad thing.. But we can't just leave it like that.
What? You're not a reaper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you will be cursed. {nl}
Huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon. {nl}Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
The Legwyn family was a renowned family. {nl}But since the disappearance of Justina's father, Gailus Legwyn, other members of the family and their deities all fell sick and died. {nl}
The mansion where Justina used to live... is now full of monsters.{nl}

I went through great lengths to get a chance to meet Erikas,{nl}a longtime friend of the Legwyn family.{nl}He also possesses the Legwyn family's heirloom but...{nl}I didn't expect him to behave like this.
The guy doesn't even know where the graves of the Legwyn family are...{nl}I strongly suspect he's an impostor.{nl}
Then we have no choice.{nl}As Erikas said, can you find Legwyn at Mires Grave using the Scroll of the Dead?{nl}I will stay here so that Erikas won't escape.
So he didn't really tell us the location of Legwyn grave because he doesn't know...?{nl}Didn't he say he would tell you if you give him some money?
To wake me up as I was about to go beside the goddesses... {nl}What do you need of me?{nl}
There's a long story behind it, but what Erikas said is largely correct.{nl}I was chasing after the Kartas Hunter with my vassals.{nl}Initially, our strength was lacking.{nl}
Thus, I told Erikas to lend us his power to defeat the Kartas Hunter since he lived nearby.{nl}Erikas asked for our heirloom as collateral in return for lending me the Blessing Crystal.{nl}
He told me that we would be able to defeat the demon with the Crystal.{nl}Attempting to defeat it proved difficult, so we ended up just sealing the demon.{nl}Many lives were sacrificed to seal it.
The Kartas Hunter is locked inside the seal in front of you.{nl}The power that is restraining the demon is from the Blessing Crystal lent by Erikas.{nl}
The Kartas Hunter will not be able to get out from here in its current state.{nl}But, my daughter... I have to take back our heirloom for Justina's sake.{nl}
I can release the Kartas Hunter from the Crystal's seal by myself, but{nl}in order to preserve the power of the Crystal, we will need help from the vassals.{nl}
I don't want to ask Erikas for help again...{nl}If you could gather the Spirit Incenses growing on Mochia Fields, we will be able to wake up my vassals.
When we fought the Kartas Hunter, someone had to stay focused on the Crystal.{nl}My team fell one by one, the battle situation worsened as fewer people could focus on the Crystal.{nl}
In the end, everyone dedicated their lives to seal the Kartas Hunter.{nl}Still, as me and my vassals don't have real bodies now, we won't be disturbed by it.{nl}
I can sense some sacred power within you.{nl}If you could eliminate that demon, we will help.{nl}Please complete the task that we couldn't complete...
There was a pitiful girl that I was taking care of.{nl}She didn't have a family and was very quiet.{nl}
As she started to stay in my mansion, demons started to appear near the mansion...{nl}
One day, an incident occurred where one of my vassals was killed by poison. {nl}Of course, everyone suspected that the girl did it.{nl}
Soon the girl ran away. {nl}I don't know why, but there was a voice deep inside my heart, echoing to protect her.{nl}
Since we were able to sealed the Kartas Hunter here, she was able to run away safely.{nl}Even if it turned out like this, I don't have any regrets.{nl}
It's not that I allowed it because of good faith or that I was aware of how people saw her.{nl}But, I feel sorry for my family... that they couldn't see Justina.
The Spirit Incenses have the power to pull out the memories of the dead.{nl}I will put the power of the Scroll of the Dead here.{nl}
As you were able to pull me out, you will be able to pull out my vassals.
My vassals are sleeping at Kruva Stream Bank.{nl}I regret that I couldn't prepare a good spot for their graves.{nl}
You will be able to wake up my vassals when you rub the Spirit Incenses onto their gravestones.
I am to blame for this.{nl}They're like family, yet they are resting on grounds without calm winds...
I am happy to meet my vassals again because of you.{nl}Their spirits continue to have great determination.{nl}They will fulfill our mission even after their deaths.
Next, we'll be releasing the Kartas Hunter.{nl}But the power of the Blessing Crystal is too powerful. I see no easy way to release the demon...{nl}
We have no choice but to try a dirty method.{nl}We will need to use some corrupt energy sources to weaken the powerful divine power.{nl}
Defeat some monsters and bring their Corrupt Fangs.{nl}If we can weaken the power of the crystal with them, the demon will attempt to come out unaware that it's a trap.{nl}
And that will be our last chance to eliminate it.
Thank you for helping us thus far.{nl} Thank you for listening to the final wishes of the dead...
I can feel the fangs' corrupt energy.{nl}Since I don't want you to get corrupted by them, let's finish this quickly.
Place the Corrupt Fangs near the seal. {nl}Then, our last mission will start.
Everything is over...{nl}It is so fortunate that it ended even after our deaths
Thank you again. Please pass this crystal to my daughter's friend.{nl}Now, I will return to the goddesses together with my vassals.{nl}
If you meet my daughter, please tell her that I'm really sorry and that I love her...{nl}I hope you can pass my words to her.
I wonder who's the girl who Legwyn tried to protect until his death?{nl}Nevertheless, I'm sure he'll rest in peace since his last mission has been fulfilled.{nl}
I will return this to Erikas now.{nl}I really appreciate your help on behalf of my friend, Justina Legwyn.
I can tell you this at least.{nl}The keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen...{nl}I came out from the Astral Tower to protect them with my colleagues.{nl}
The preceding leader suspiciously died and Ignas became the next leader of the Astral Tower.{nl}Then, his tyranny started.{nl}
He told everyone that the old rules of Lydia Schaffen were to be abandoned and that we should start over...{nl}He said to eliminate everything that was related to Lydia Schaffen.{nl}
But Lydia Schaffen was everything to the Astral Tower, she was the symbolic figure of all archers.{nl}After we regained consciousness, we ran away with our colleagues and the keepsakes.{nl}
Right now... I can hardly move due to my injury...{nl}But if I stay like this, the pursuers will find out about me.
I think we should move.{nl}Can you lure the pursuers so I can go to the Guoda Empty Lot?{nl}
When we fire this disposable signal flare, they'll follow you.{nl}I'm counting on you...
As you lure them, I will move secretly.{nl}Let's meet at Guoda Empty Lot.
We were able to move safely due to your help.{nl}You seem like a good person so please receive this.{nl}
This is the book recorded about the Roxona Conflict.{nl}I am not sure whether you are interested, but please receive it as a token of my gratitude.
Ah, I came up with a good idea when the pursuers ran towards the signal flare you fired.{nl}I'm going to make a trap by attaching a signal flare onto a bomb.{nl}
That way, my colleagues will know that I'm here...{nl}Maybe it will also lure the demons.{nl}
To do so, we need something to make smoke with...{nl}I've used everything I had already so...{nl}
Good. I saw Red Leaves as I ran away to Ruda Path. {nl}Can you collect them?
Many people left the Astral Tower as the tyranny of the leader Ignas continued.{nl}I tried my best to endure, but...
I could not endure when he was trying to eliminate the keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen.
How come I haven't thought about this. {nl}I should have set the traps already...
Lastly, can you put this trap over there on Ruda Path?{nl}I'll hide here until I recover.{nl}
My colleagues who were on the same side with me would also be chased by now.{nl}We were to meet at Orsha, but I don't know how far they've come...
How did you get a hold of Irmantas' signal flares?{nl}You must be either brave or stupid.
Our brothers who were on my side are also being chased at the moment.{nl}We were gonna meet at Orsha, but I don't know how far they've come.
So you're the one who helped Irmantas.{nl}Hmm. Are you hurt at all?{nl}
I want to get together with Irmantas, but I'm in bad shape.{nl}One mistake, and we might interfere with each other...
I'm going to go to Orsha from here.{nl}I'm sorry, but can you hand this over to him?{nl}Just tell him that it's taken from the Astral Tower.
I'll leave first.{nl}I also heard that Alina is also wandering around here...{nl}I hope you can find her if possible.
Who are you?{nl}You don't seem to be Ignas' pursuer.{nl}
Ah... You've already met Irmantas and Grazina.{nl}That's good. I have to meet Irmantas right away since I have information to pass to him!
I've seen it for sure.{nl}The demons were among the chasers of Ignas.{nl}They seemed to be close to each other.{nl}
I am sure Ignas has colluded with the demons.{nl}I think eliminating the keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen is a part of that collusion.{nl}
But, I was badly hurt as well...{nl}I am not sure if I can meet Irmantas again in my life.{nl}
Can you defeat the monsters around here so I can get to him?{nl}If you reduce the number of monsters, then the possibility of getting detected by monsters will be lowered.
At first, I thought the pursuers that were following from the Astral Tower were subordinates of Ignas.{nl}But, they weren't. There's something we don't know yet!
It's noisy around here so I guess the pursuers are near.{nl}We should move quickly.
If we just stay here, we'll get attacked without having notified anyone...{nl}
Please take me to Irmantas.{nl}We have to tell Lydia Schaffen's followers that they're colluding with the demons!
They'd be easy to defeat if I didn't have this injury...{nl}Where is Irmantas now?
No... I feel like I am going to lose consciousness if I walk little more.{nl}I feel like I am hearing the voice... of the goddess.{nl}
After I ran away from the Astral Tower, I've never seen a person who is so kind and reliable like you.{nl}If something happens to me... {nl}
Please tell Irmantas about the plot of Iganas with this letter.{nl}
Let's go. {nl}I will cheer myself up a bit.{nl}
What happened?{nl}I think I've heard a some noise from down there...{nl}
Illina... was attacked?{nl}How can Ignas do something without going crazy!{nl}
I will follow the words of Lydia Schaffen on behalf of Illina.{nl}I will arrive at Orsha no matter what it takes.{nl}
To you... I want to give you some rewards since you've protected me until the end.{nl}I am sure Illina and Lydia Schaffen also want me to do that.
Please feed the Dark Blue Herbs to Agatas.{nl}As it gets detoxified, the weak body of a human will suffer severe pains, but that will be better than dying.{nl}
You may leave after saving Agatas' life.{nl}You've saved my contractor, so in the name of the Demon Lord Hauberk, I will never forget you.
You are one with a strong spirit.{nl}When they rushed in, I thought my pursuit of revenge towards Giltine was at an end.{nl}
They followed me here to obtain the power of my spirit.{nl}You and Agatas will be in danger...
I don't think Agatas will regain consciousness for a while...{nl}I want you to do something for yourself and this innocent human.{nl}
I have an idea on how to eliminate the head of the demons.{nl}Agatas has a piece of my spirit, please take care it for a while.{nl}
In order to move my spirit piece, I need the crystal that possesses the demonic energy.{nl}Please get the shadow essence from the demons at Fiskavi Plains.
With that power, I will be with you.
I can't quit this journey.{nl}Only I can eliminate Giltine and her servants from this world.{nl}
As you ripped me off, I will get revenge on them...
This is good enough.{nl}If you help me, I promise you I will fight the demons for the sake of the goddesses and the humans.{nl}
If you hate the demons, then you can trust me.{nl}The ones who've been betrayed will never forget it.{nl}
I decided this myself when my spirit was ripped into pieces.{nl}Even if I had to search for my spirit for thousands of years, I would never forget them...
The power of the spirit is gradually recovering with demonic power.{nl}The knowledge I've forgotten is gradually coming back.{nl}
The leader of my pursuers should be searching for me now.{nl}For a fresh start on this new journey, I'll make them feel what it's like to be chased...
Defeat the demons using the power of my soul stone.{nl}If you defeat them, I will use them as the source to call out my subordinates.{nl}
Please find my hidden spirit from the unoccupied grave at Vadova Road.{nl}I couldn't be with Agatas, but it will be possible if I am with you...
For my revenge, I'll have to put my pursuers in danger.{nl}They must be hiding and watching me from somewhere.
Do they still have their confidence?...{nl}Or are they afraid because I'm with a competent person like you?
Enough.{nl}Now is the time to find my shattered spirit again!
Let's go to the Silaisvin Wilderness.{nl}If only I could combine my spirit's pieces together now, I'd be able to fight my pursuers directly.
If you're afraid I'll betray you when my spirit is back, then hold on to my soul stone.{nl}If I try to hurt you, destroy it...
But, I promise. {nl}That would never happen.
1st Page of the Roxona Conflict

Lydia Schaffen was a master of archery.{nl}She could even hit the feelers of a small insect.{nl}She stood in front of the great knight Ruklys.{nl}She held her breath and slowly drew her bow.{nl}It wasn't that long ago when Lydia Schaffen stood against Ruklys who used to be her lover.{nl}

It was a day in the winter time.{nl}The tyranny of Kadumel King started getting extreme.{nl}Never-ending labor, starving people, corrupted landlords and a violent king...{nl}Ruklys could not stand what he was seeing in the kingdom.{nl}Revolt.{nl}Everyone in Roxona believed that Ruklys will win.{nl}

The spring had come and Ruklys was still in high spirits.{nl}Ruklys obtained the information that there was a village where the thieves who'd collided with the kingdom soldiers were living.{nl}The soldiers were so corrupted...{nl}Ruklys decided to attack the village with his subordinates.{nl}

He was just fighting against the thieves, but some unknown tension made Ruklys to hold his sword more firmly.{nl}A few of his colleagues fell down with the blood bursting out from their chests.{nl}At the same time, Ruklys and his subordinates ran towards the village.{nl}They didn't need to horn the pipe to let everyone know the battle has started.{nl}

They possessed a decent level of archery and martial arts.{nl}The doubts which Ruklys had in his mind also disappeared.{nl}It was certain that they were not normal thieves...{nl}Ruklys held his sword on his other hand.{nl}He noticed something strange as the time passed by, but that was after many people died.{nl}In the darkness, the battle continued.{nl}Ruklys managed to win the battle at the end, but he felt somewhat uncomfortable.{nl}Long after the battle, he found out that the village was the hometown of Lydia Schaffen.
The betrayed never forget.{nl}
The things I've forgotten have returned to me, but don't worry.{nl}In my journey, you are a companion.
Please return my soul stone to me.{nl}I'll prepare to summon my subordinates.{nl}
Let's defeat the leader together.{nl}The shadow essences you've collected revealed that he's hidden in Fiskavi Plains.
Pull him out!{nl}I will be with you soon.
If you are afraid, you can give up. I will complete my revenge alone.{nl}I just hope my contractor won't be hurt again...
Thanks for fighting with me, companion.{nl}I will be with you whenever you and your colleagues fall to despair and peril.
Agatas carried out the contract diligently.{nl}I'll leave him and start my journey for revenge.{nl}
The pieces of my spirit have been spread all over this world...{nl}I will reunite with them someday.
If you meet them on your journey, please help them.{nl}My spirits will rely on you.
This is the reward for the contract I've made with Agatas.{nl}Please put this in his pocket.{nl}
Farewell, companion.{nl}I will never forget you.
I'll look for the whereabouts of my other spirits here.{nl}Companion, we will meet again.
I've put the spirit separation potion{nl}into my pocket.
Oh, you're here. {nl}Let's trace back what was seen in the soul's memory. {nl}If we could revive the Ruklys' device, then it will guide us to the revelation.
I know where the device of Ruklys is but we need its parts to fix it. {nl}I will check on the left side so you check on the right.
We'll need the parts to repair the device. {nl}Look for it on the right side.
You're here? {nl}What did Eminent say? {nl}
Good thing he doesn't seem to find anything suspicious. {nl}We must not give any parts to Eminent until the magic circle of Ruklys is activated.
I figured the location of the magic circle as written in the document. {nl}
First, the magic circle under Slypti Watchtower. {nl}The writings on the pole were erased so the magic circle is not working. {nl}
It will work when you write on it again. {nl}I'll take care of the magic circle below so I'll leave this to you.
Be sure not to be caught by Eminent.
I saw the magic circles activate. Are you alright? {nl}What about Eminent? {nl}
You defeated Eminent and obtained the revelation? {nl}Wow, you're way better than I thought... {nl}
Anyway, I also feel like I've helped bring peace to the world and it beats my heart. {nl}But I still have some work to do. You know, right?
I feel lucky to have met you among the many Revelators. {nl}You saved the world, right?
I hope you stay safe, more than anything. {nl}May the goddess bless you!
Uh... Is that an army note? {nl}
Right. Those belong to my colleagues. {nl}I don't know when it would be, but I want to send their keepsakes back to their hometown someday.
Speaking of which, could you give me that army note?
Hopefully, I will be able to return to hometown together with the keepsakes of my colleagues. {nl}And my colleagues would surely want that too.
I will surely bring it back to hometown. {nl}My fellows will want that too.
Come to think of it, there is a holy relic of the goddess in Sielvar Prayer Room. {nl}I think offering a prayer to that holy relic will give us some answers. {nl}
The dead that wakes up again are the problem. {nl}Why don't we purify them and keep them from waking up. {nl}
We break their coffin before they wake up. {nl}Even for the dead ones, it will be better than forcibly waking up. {nl}What do you think? Will you help?
You must be careful not to open the coffin lid when you break the coffin. {nl}When the coffin opens, the dead will jump out and attack.
Good work. {nl}I'm sure they will also thank you for making them rest in peace. {nl}
The problem is that holy relic. {nl}I can't approach anywhere near it because of the barrier.
Maybe the grave keeper would know something about the holy relic and the barrier...{nl}But the grave keeper doesn't like me. We had a thing in the past. {nl}
I met the grave keeper while working on purifying in the name of the goddess. {nl}I was actually helping the grave keeper but he was really mad about it. {nl}
The grave keeper stands at the end of Vepavi Corridor. {nl}Can you ask him about the holy relic of the goddess for me?
A holy relic of the goddess? {nl}What? Are you teaming up with that rude Bokor? {nl}
Get out of this grave site. {nl}Just thinking about that Bokor brings back my anger. {nl}
That Bokor went around breaking the coffins of the dead saying they rise back! {nl}I don't understand how she can do such a thing with a sane mind!
A holy relic that you can't even approach... {nl}I understand if they block the monsters or demons from getting close to it but even humans, that I don't understand.
These people from the Order of the Tree of Truth or whatever were here first before Bokor Utara.{nl}They claimed that they were officially acknowledged by Goddess Zemyna or something?{nl}
They said they'd carry out the will of Goddess Zemyna since this land was blessed by her. {nl}How could I have stopped that.{nl}
But since their arrival, the dead started to rise again. {nl}If that was on purpose, there couldn't have been an insult worse than that! {nl}
That was giving me a headache already, and then some Bokor comes along breaking the coffins. {nl}Breaking the coffins to purify the dead does not show any respect for the dead!
That is not important. {nl}I want to calm all this fuss as soon as possible. {nl}
If you help me, then I will believe that the Bokor didn't come here with bad intentions. {nl}
Burying it back in the ground is not all. {nl}Pay respect to the dead using this match and cremate their bodies.
What are you waiting for! Move quickly! {nl}I cannot... handle it anymore.

Sorry for being sharp a while ago. I was a bit sensitive. {nl}Actually, having to point the blades to people whom I should {nl}take care of as a grave keeper is not something I am comfortable with. {nl}
Thank you for giving them peace for me.
Anyway, I know of the holy relic of the goddess that the Bokor mentioned.{nl}Those people from the Order of the Tree of Truth made it one day. {nl}
Maybe that is why the dead rose... {nl}I had my suspicions but I couldn't approach it either. {nl}
Ah! That's right. {nl}A long time ago, a Bokor and a Necromancer not in their sane minds used to come here secretly. {nl}They used to do insane experiments on the dead who are rested in here. {nl}

So my father learned how to make spell dolls from the guards nearby Klaipeda. {nl}He said if you put spells on the spell dolls, it finds the power {nl}that messes with the grave and destroys it or something? {nl}
There is a chest in Kansias Stone Chamber with my father's belongings. {nl}There should be a spell doll in it. I don't think I can... make it through the bodies.
Our family has been grave keepers for generations. {nl}My father passed away during the disaster on Medzio Diena, so I have taken his place since then. {nl}
I only learned over his shoulders... {nl}But I am the grave keeper of this place now.
Right! This is it.{nl}It wasn't used for a long time, but it should work well since father made it.
Done. Now go to the holy relic. {nl}If that holy relic is the reason behind the dead rising here, {nl}the spell doll will break the barrier and destroy the holy relic.
It's the spell doll that father used. {nl}If we do as my father used to do, then nothing will go wrong. Just as my father used to do...
If the spell doll attacked the holy relic, then it means it detected the evil energy. {nl}But the spell doll was the one destroyed... {nl}
Anyway, if the barrier broke, then your Bokor friend must be able to identify it. {nl}What about going back to that Bokor and asking her?
Huh? You really broke the barrier? {nl}See, I knew the grave keeper would help. {nl}
Actually, I was a bit suspicious myself. {nl}I felt a bad energy from the barrier considering that it {nl}was something that covered the goddess' holy relic.
Anyway, since the barrier is now broken, let's go together. {nl}If it really is a holy relic of the goddess, then it will react to the prayer for the goddess. {nl}
Will you go ahead first? {nl}I will follow as soon as I'm ready for the prayer.
A spell doll... Evil energy... It really is suspicious.
Thank you for saving me. I almost went to the goddess. {nl}I guess it is a lie that it was a holy relic of the goddess. {nl}
The relic of the goddess would not summon such a monster. {nl}I smell something fishy with that Order of the Tree of Truth.

Since the relic here wasn't real, we must find Goddess Zemyna's traces from somewhere else. {nl}It's alright. If something like this makes me frustrated, {nl}then I would not have kept my journey until here. {nl}
But before I leave, I must help the grave keeper and keep the fuss down. {nl}Now that the evil object is gone, my abilities will help keep this place calm. {nl}
I want to show my sincerity to the grave keeper, but{nl}the image of him being angry at me holds me back. {nl}If you're on the way to the grave keeper, can you send him my sincerity as well?
No wonder. That object wasn't that of the goddess. {nl}Using the name of the goddess into tricks like this. They have really crossed the line. {nl}
I want to go and make them pay for it right away. {nl}However, as a grave keeper, keeping this place secure comes first. {nl}
Was that Bokor's name Juta? {nl}Her ability powers will be of much help. {nl}
The Order of the Tree of Truth went into Carlyle's Mausoleum. {nl}They said they will find something to carry out their order or something...{nl}
If you ever go to Carlyle's Mausoleum, be careful about them. {nl}No matter how much I think about it, they are not in their right minds. {nl}
If this is not it either, I can't help but be exhausted. {nl}Where do you think Goddess Zemyna has gone?
Oh my god, the Divine Tree! {nl}The Divine Tree answered my prayers and sent someone to save me!{nl}
Thank you. I thought death was the only option for me. {nl}I am Gintas, a follower of the Order of the Tree of Truth. {nl}
We from the Order of the Tree of Truth, believe in the Divine Tree that stands tall in the kingdom. {nl}The Divine Tree is punishing the foolish people whose greed are soaring up high. {nl}
Our order will be the appointed ones of the Divine Tree and guide the world in opening a new age. {nl}Right. Are you interested in joining our order? {nl}
You are really strong, just as someone sent by the Divine Tree should be. {nl}Such strength should be used for something bigger.
I am collecting the spirit of the dead that rose back, as the order told me to. {nl}Margiris can read the memories of the dead when they were alive from the spirit stones.
She finds the sins of the dead from their memories and forgives them to purify the sins in this world. {nl}
I seem to have sprained my ankle while running away from the dead. I can't walk. {nl}Can you help me by any chance?
I'm sure my prayers reached the Divine Tree to send you here. {nl}
Brother. {nl}By this, your sins have become lighter.
There is something you need to help us with. {nl}Think of it as a test and do your best. {nl}
Carrying out sacred missions can get you to some trouble like just a while ago. {nl}You can also lose your life. {nl}
Bodies of followers are brought to Seima Stone Chamber and their sins are purified. {nl}But because of Margiris' sacred abilities, some actually get their life back. {nl}
The followers who rise back can't throw away their regrets in life and keep roaming around this place. {nl}Please use this flint to cremate the regrets and soulless bodies of the dead.
Margiris told us salvation is not something we can get so easily. {nl}
This work purifies the sins of the foolish as well as ours. {nl}Those who die during the process is because their belief is not enough. {nl}
Only those who stand it will earn salvation.
Poor Gintas... {nl}You've dealt with the despair of death alone.
Hey. If you are thinking of joining the order, don't bother. {nl}I, myself, used to be a follower of Margiris. {nl}
I used to focus on purifying the sins of the dead like Gintas. {nl}I thought I would earn salvation. {nl}
But one day, I saw the record books of Margiris. {nl}As far as I knew, those books keep a record of the process of purifying the sins of the dead. {nl}
But it was actually a record of land ownership. {nl}And I also found out that he was looking for the record of Carlyle in here.
When I read until that part of the books, Margiris killed me.
Amazing. Did righteousness bring you here?{nl}Look. Defeating Margiris does not mean anything. {nl}
If Margiris' mission fails, the Order will send someone else in here... {nl}And innnocent disciples will turn like this again. {nl}Nothing will change.

If you really want to stop the Order, then you need to find out their true objective. {nl}Find the record of Carlyle first. {nl}You need to stop the order from getting their hands on Carlyle's records.
What? {nl}You met a spirit of a believer in there? {nl}
Ah. I think it's the believer that I know of. {nl}It's embodied with regrets, keeping it from leaving and just roams around. {nl}
But don't worry. {nl}The souls that are forgiven will soon be with the Divine Tree. {nl}
Thank you for helping until here. {nl}Here, let me give you a seal of Truth. {nl}
Margiris is along the way to Carlyle's Mausoleum. {nl}If you bring this to him, he will acknowledge your contributions.
Don't tell Gintas about the story of Carlyle. {nl}He won't believe it. {nl}
I want to save you, but I don't know how...
Who are you? {nl}Ah, it's Gintas' Seal of Truth. {nl}
There are too many people who want to join the Order for Salvation. {nl}Anyway, welcome.
I think my ankle is getting better so a little more rest will do. {nl}Please be careful and may we meet again.
Sorry to ask you when you've just joined the Order, but there is something we need you to do. {nl}We are cleansing the sins of those who have died here. {nl}
I woke Carlyle's Spirit. {nl}He used to own some land of the kingdom when he was alive. {nl}
He was not able to let go of that even after his death. {nl}He hid a document of sins somewhere in this gravesite. {nl}

To save his spirit, we must find the hidden document and make him let go of his regrets from the time he was alive. {nl}But there seems to be greed left in him and he won't speak up about the whereabouts of the document. {nl}
Can you try to persuade Carlyle? {nl}Since he doesn't know your face, try to act as if you're not part of the Order. {nl}
If you find out the whereabouts of the document, I will bless you with the grace of the Divine Tree.
