The Hoplite Submaster has tasked you with defeating Rafflys at the Dadan Jungle.
You have cleared out enough Rafflys. Return to the Hoplite Submaster.
Defeat Raffly
Defeat Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle
The Barbarian Submaster wants to test your mind for combat. Defeat the Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle and submit proof of your hunt.
You have defeated the Gosarus. Return to the Barbarian Submaster.
Use the ointment to heal refugees at Lemprasa Pond
Worship all Goddess Statues around Orsha
The Krivis Submaster has tasked you with visiting the Lemprasa Pond, Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing and worshiping the Goddess Statues in all those locations.
Collect herbs for the ointment
The Priest Submaster has asked you to visit Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle and collect Wormwood, Hemostasis Herb and Moonlight Flower respectively in each area.
Collect %s at Koru Jungle
Collect %s at Knidos Jungle
Collect %s at Dadan Jungle
Collect materials and craft a Bokor Doll
Go to Dadan Jungle and collect Raffly Soul Crystals and Vubbe Warrior Mind Crystals.
Collect chunks of metal from Grummers at Dadan Jungle
The blacksmith doesn't have a chisel ready for you, but she can make one if you collect the right materials. Defeat Grummers at the Dadan Jungle and collect chunks of metal from them.
Deliver to the Orsha Blacksmith
You have collected enough chunks of metal, Bring them to the blacksmith in Orsha.
Collect %s from Grummers
Defeat monsters using Highlander techniques
The Highlander Submaster wants to find out how polished your Highlander skills are. Use your Highlander techniques to defeat any type of monster. This is a task you must complete on your own.
The Peltasta Submaster is ready to set you up on the path of a true Peltasta if only you pass this test. Defeat the Chapparition at Karolis Springs.
Defeat Sparnasman at the Novaha Annex
The Sparnasman that Hoplites fought long ago has returned. Defeat the Sparnasman at the Novaha Annex and bring back the Hoplites' broken spearheads.

The Krivis Submaster wants you to defeat the monsters that are terrorizing people. Go to Feretory Hills and, after draining out some of their stamina, use the crystal gem to purify them and collect the ashes.
Collect %s by purifying monsters
The Priest Submaster strongly believes in exterminating all evil forces of this earth. Go to Feretory Hills where evil energy is concentrated and defeat monsters there.
The Priest Submaster will be satisfied with your performance. Return to her.
Collect Sparnasman's Horn
The Dievdirbys Submaster has asked you to collect a Sparnasman's Horn to use as carving material. Go to Braken Monastery 64_2 and defeat Sparnasman to collect its horn.
Deliver to the Dievdirbys Submaster
Collect monster souls imbued with the Sadhu Master's spirit
The Sadhu Master has given you a task. Go to Feretory Hills and imbue monsters with the Sadhu Master's spirit, then defeat them and collect their souls. This task you must complete on your own.
You have completed the Sadhu Master's task. Return to the Sadhu Master's physical body in Orsha.
Talk to Mage Melchioras
Mage Melchioras seems to have something to say to you. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
After hearing that you're a Revelator, Mage Melchioras seems to want to tell you something. Listen to what he has to say.
Mage Melchioras says he has returned to this place to gather the Revelators and stop another Kruvina from being created in Delmore Castle. Keep listening to Mage Melchioras.
Use the compass to search for hidden artifacts
You have decided to help Melchioras. Visit the spots marked on the map and use the compass to find the objects under the protection spell. The compass is activated only near the cast.
Report to Mage Melchioras
You have found the objects under the protection spell. Relay their location to Mage Melchioras.
Talk to Revelator Mihail
Melchioras is going to analyze the protection spell; meanwhile, talk to Revelator Mihail.
Defeat demons and charge the Magic Concentration Orbs
According to Mihail, they need more magic concentration orbs to blast the Magic Power Supply Device. Defeat demons to charge the orbs.
Deliver to Revelator Mihail
You have filled all orbs with magic. Bring them to Revelator Mihail.
Mage Melchioras' analysis of the protection spell seems to have come to an end. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
Release the objects' protection spell
Mage Melchioras has asked you to dispel the protection spell placed north of the Amjene Sanctum. Use the amulet on the objects protected by the cast to release it.
You have dispelled the protection spell. Return to Mage Melchioras.
All preparations for blowing up the Magic Power Supply Device are now in place. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
Place the Magic Concentration Orbs on the Magic Power Supply Device
It's time to blow up the Magic Power Supply Device. Go to the Ishinti Crossroads and place the charged orbs around the device.
Report to Revelator Mihail
All the charged orbs are now in place. Talk to Revelator Mihail and blow up the Magic Power Supply Device.
You have destroyed the Magic Power Supply Device. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
Go to Delmore Manor
Melchioras wants to meet up at Delmore Manor, where the Kruvina device is located. Join Mage Melchioras at Delmore Manor.
Talk to Follower Andrea
Follower Andrea is preparing to deal with the monsters in the area. Ask her if there is anything you can help with.
Collect data from Pag Amplers
Follower Andrea is looking to obtain information on Pag Amplers. Defeat Pag Amplers and collect any data you can from them.
You have collected enough data. Bring it to Follower Andrea.
It looks like Follower Andrea needs your help. Talk to Follower Andrea.
Collect the diary of Delmore Castle resident Ardel
Follower Andrea was asked to contact a resident of Delmore Castle named Ardel, but all Delmore Castle residents are missing. Try and recover Ardel's diary.
Deliver to Follower Andrea
You have collected all the pages of the diary. Bring them to Follower Andrea.
Talk to Follower Nuodas
Follower Nuodas is feeling sorry for the missing residents of Delmore Castle. Talk to Follower Nuodas.
Follower Nuodas believes that clearing out some demons will probably help the residents of Delmore Castle. Defeat nearby demons.
You have defeated enough demons. Go and tell Follower Nuodas.
It seems Follower Nuodas has a favor to ask of you. Talk to Follower Nuodas.
Collect arrows from Charcoal Walkers
Follower Nuodas thinks the Revelators waste too many arrows. Defeat Charcoal Walkers and collect any arrows that can still be used.
Deliver to Follower Nuodas
As Follower Nuodas said, there were plenty of useful arrows to be collected. Bring them to Follower Nuodas.
Collect %s by defeating Charcoal Walker
Mage Melchioras seems to have split up from the group of Revelators. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
Mage Melchioras seems to be looking for a new way to neutralize the Kruvina device. Keep talking to Mage Melchioras.
Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Rampart Reconstruction District
Mage Melchioras believes there is a Magic Power Supply Device in the Rampart Reconstruction District. Go there and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.
You have found the hidden Magic Power Supply Device. Return to Mage Melchioras.
Mage Melchioras believes there are other Magic Power Supply Devices. Keep talking to Mage Melchioras.
Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Buried Central Plaza
Mage Melchioras says he felt a new Magic Power Supply Device. Go to the Buried Central Plaza and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.
It seems this time his prediction was wrong. Return to Mage Melchioras and let him know.
Mage Melchioras feels sorry for his lack of judgement. Keep talking to him.
Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Handicraft Workshop Road
This time, Mage Melchioras thinks there is a Magic Power Supply Device at the Handicraft Workshop Road. Go there and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.
It looks like Yane is going to try and destroy the central device purely by force. Go back and tell Melchioras about this immediately.
Mage Melchioras looks livid after hearing about what Yane is planning to do. Keep talking to him.
Stop Revelator Yane at the Palma Central Plaza
Mage Melchioras says the Kruvina runs on human lives and gathering around it would be a fatal mistake. Go to the Palma Central Plaza and stop Yane from carrying out her plans!
Follow Yane into the Delmore Outskirts
Delmore Rephaim has kidnapped an injured Melchioras and escaped, the other Revelators chasing after him immediately after. Go to the outskirts of Delmore and join Revelator Yane.
Talk to Follower Bigs
It looks like Follower Bigs is in need of your help. Talk to Follower Bigs.
Obtain Useful Wooden Boards from Box Piles
Bigs wants to create a barricade to protect Melchioras once he returns. Go to the Kalbos Vacant Lot and Handicraft Workshop Road and look in box piles for wood boards to use.
You have collected a handful of useful wooden boards. Bring them to Follower Bigs.
Obtain %s from old chests and others
It looks like Follower Bigs needs your help. Listen to what he has to say.
Bigs hopes you will clear out the demons in the area for those who are now injured. As instructed, defeat any demons nearby.
You have defeated the demons as requested. Return to Follower Bigs.
Talk to Follower Wedge
Follower Wedge seems to be worried about Mage Melchioras. Talk to him.
Collect Thorn Mushrooms
Follower Wedge wants to make some medicine to help Melchioras recover his health later. Go and collect some thorn mushrooms from the Kalbos Empty Lot and Buried Central Plaza.
Deliver to Follower Wedge
You have collected enough mushrooms now. Bring them to Follower Wedge.
More than demons, Follower Wedge is worried about the monsters roaming about. Talk to Follower Wedge.
Collect Charog Sap
Follower Wedge wants to produce a monster repellent. Defeat Charogs and collect their sap to use as material for the repellent.
You have now collected enough Charog sap. Bring it to Follower Wedge.
Chasing Lord Delmore
Talk to Revelator Yane
Revelator Yane is in a hurry to chase after Lord Delmore accompanied by a party. Talk to her.
Ask Revelator Mihail to accompany you
Revelator Yane wants to split the group to chase after Delmore Rephaim. Ask Revelator Mihail to accompany you.
Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Outskirts Central Plaza
Follow Revelator Mihail and chase Delmore Rephaim up to the Outskirts Central Plaza.
Escape from Delmore Rephaim's trap
You are caught in Delmore Rephaim's trap. Fight demons to find the hidden magic core or defeat all demons to escape.
You have disabled the trap. Talk to Revelator Mihail.
Revelator Mihail is worried about Revelator Yane's party headed towards the Tagika Crossroads. Talk to him.
Join Yane's group at the Tagika Crossroads
Find Revelator Yane's group at the Tagika Crossroads and help them.
Revelator Mihail has disabled the barrier that was trapping Yane and her group. Ask Revelator Yane if she is all right.
Revelator Yane says she saw a suspicious light by the Government Ruins. Keep talking to her.
Go to the Government Ruins
Go to the Government Ruins with Revelators Yane and Mihail.
Mage Melchioras is trapped in the altar. Try and find a solution with Revelator Yane.
Revelator Yane seems to have figured out a solution. Talk to her.
Collect Demons Souls in the Shaman Doll
Yane wants to impart demons souls onto a shaman doll and replace Melchioras with it. Hunt demons and collect their souls on the doll.
Deliver to Revelator Yane
The shaman doll is now fully charged with souls. Bring it to Revelator Yane.
Lead to a Dead-end
Mage Melchioras is still struggling but he is trying to tell you something. Talk to him.
Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot
Mage Melchioras says Delmore Rephaim has escaped to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot. Go and chase Delmore Rephaim with Revelator Mihail.
Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot
Go and chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot with Revelator Mihail.
Protect Mihail while he sets up the bomb
Revelator Mihail wants to blow up the obstacle that's blocking the way with a bomb. Protect him from the incoming demon attacks while he finished setting up the bomb.
Revelator Mihail has finished setting up the bomb. Talk to him.
Revelator Mihail has finished setting up the bomb. Talk to him.
Stop Delmore Rephaim
You've almost caught up with Delmore Rephaim now. Keep going and stop his plans!
Delmore Rephaim tried to use the power of the Kruvina but was ultimately defeated. Return to Revelator Mihail.
It's time to go back to where Melchioras and the Revelators are. Talk to Revelator Mihail.
It's time to go back to where Melchioras and the Revelators are. Talk to Mage Melchioras at the Tagika Crossroads.
Mage Melchioras is apparently still having difficulties moving. Talk to him.
Destroy all reserve Kruvina devices
Melchioras is worried about the backup Kruvina devices that are still around. Fill the crystal given to you by Melchioras with evil energy by defeating demons and place it on the devices.
You have cleared out all the reserve devices. Go and tell Mage Melchioras.
There still seems to be something concerning Mage Melchioras. Talk to Melchioras.
Inject demonic power into the Supply Device

Mage Melchioras has asked you to destroy the remaining Magic Power Supply Device in Delmore Manor. Go back there and defeat demons to charge the crystal with demonic power, then place it on the supply device.
The Delmore Manor is now free of the Magic Power Supply Device. Go back and tell Mage Melchioras.
It seems Revelator Yane has not yet fully recovered. Talk to her.
Revelator Yane wants you to help clear out some demons. Defeat demons nearby.
Report to Revelator Yane
You have cleared out some of the demons nearby. Go and tell Revelator Yane.
Revelator Mihail seems to have something on his mind. Talk to Revelator Mihail.
Collect Magic Amplifiers from Black Maizes
Mage Melchioras seems interested in the magic amplifiers. Obtain some magic amplifiers from Black Maizes.
You have collected enough magic amplifiers. Bring them to Mage Melchioras.
Collect %s from Black Maizes
Defeat nearby monsters

Believer Gintas supports you joining the Order and asks you to charge the Evil Thoughts Stone. It looks like a good opportunity to join the Order. Set up the Evil Thoughts Stone and defeat the dead to collect their evil thoughts.
Gintas says the once-believers of the Order have resurrected, possibly by the power of Margiris. Defeat the resurrected believers in the Seima Stone Chamber and then use the flint to burn the bodies.
You have received a fully charged Evil Thoughts Stone from Gintas. Take it to Margiris And you should be able to join the Order.
Benes has asked you to spread a ferret-repelling scent around the entrance to the Bellai Forest Workshop. Press the
Defeat Vikaras Mages and collect %s
Defeat Zaura, Empowered by Giltine
Elder Aloizard looks deeply concerned about something. Talk to him.
Elder Aloizard wants to return to where the village residents are but is worried about the monsters. Clear out some monsters nearby to help Elder Aloizard return.
You have defeated a good number of monsters nearby. Go and tell Elder Aloizard.
The village chief's granddaughter is looking for someone to help her. Talk to her.
Investigate the Wandering Sanctuary
The elder's granddaughter says the village residents are suffering with the red water incident but have no way to solve it. Help them out by investigating the Wandering Sanctuary.
Deliver the diary to the Elder's Granddaughter
You have found a burnt journal at the Wandering Sanctuary. Bring it to the elder's granddaughter.
Search for Elder Aloizard
The elder's granddaughter says he took off with a group of village youth and disappeared. Search for Elder Aloizard around the Anga Hall area.
The episode with the monsters was a close call. Ask Elder Aloizard and the village youth if they are all right.
Elder Aloizard believes there is something important happening at the Wandering Sanctuary. Talk to Elder Aloizard.
Look for the spot signaled by the Old Disc
Elder Aloizard says that when the earth shook, he saw the old disc glow red and point towards somewhere. Find out where the old disc is pointing to.
Deliver to Elder Aloizard
The object the old disc was pointing to was a red gem fragment. Bring it to Elder Aloizard.
Use the Old Disc on nearby monsters and acquire %s
Talk to the Elder's Granddaughter
Elder Aloizard took the red fragment and went to the Absenta Reservoir. The elder's granddaughter is looking to speak to you about the journal. Go and talk to her.
Talk to Elder Aloizard at the Absenta Reservoir
The burnt journal seems to contain important information. Go and find Elder Aloizard right away.
Collect Rajatadpole Meat
Samsonas believes the wrath of the goddesses is what caused the water to turn red. He proposes you collect some Rajatadpole meat to use as an offering.
Deliver to Samsonas
You have collected enough Rajatadpole meat to use as offering. Bring it to Samsonas.
It's time to make the offering. Talk to Samsonas again.
Make an offering to the Obelisk
Samsonas is going to use this obelisk and has asked you to use one in another location. Go to the left side of the Vishikas Great Hall and make an offering to the obelisk there.
Report the results to Samsonas
Oddly enough, the offering caused nearby monsters to attack. Go to Samsonas right away and warn him about it before he makes his offering.
Nikodemas is looking around apprehensively. Talk to Nikodemas.
Find the Village Resident at the Drava Chapel Lot
Nikodemas says someone from the village wandered off and hasn't been back since. It seems they were headed towards the Drava Chapel Lot; go and look for them there.
Talk to Napalis
You successfully defeated the monster that attacked from underwater. Ask Napalis if they are all right.
Defeat Rocksodon
Scalvis is worried about the monsters roaming around. Talk to Scalvis.
Scalvis is worried about the large number of monsters around. Defeat nearby monsters to make the area safer for the village residents.
The area seems safer now. Report back to Scalvis.
Talk to Elder Aloizard about the contents of the journal.
Investigate the Nesuga Small Corridor
Elder Aloizard says Modis once saw people with black hoods doing something at the Nesuga Small Corridor. Go to the Nesuga Small Corridor and see if you can find any clues.
You have found a burnt painting. Elder Aloizard could possibly know something about the images in the painting.
Elder Aloizard seems to have recognized the images in the painting. Ask Elder Aloizard about the painting,
Go to the Jeneuam Corridor and find the Hydra
A resident of the village came running, saying the Hydra has appeared. Go and check the Jeneuam Corridor, where the Hydra is said to be.
A colossal Hydra with a red gem on its body appeared but quickly fled. Return to Elder Aloizard.
The monster depicted in the painting is the Hydra. Ask Elder Aloizard about what to do next.
Talk to Hunter Modis
Elder Aloizard believes that, with your help, they might have a chance to destroy the red gem on the Hydra's body. Go see Hunter Modis and find a way to lure the Hydra.
When it comes to bait and traps, no one knows better than Hunter Modis. Ask Hunter Modis about how to catch the Hydra.
Collect Sawpent Meat
While Hunter Modis is making a trap to catch the Hydra, he wants you to collect Sawpent meat to use as bait.
Defeat Sawpents and collect %s
Collect Blue Herbs
You have collected enough bait. Now, collect blue herbs to disguise the scent of humans.
Deliver to Hunter Modis
You have collected meat to use as bait and herbs to disguise your human scent. Bring the items to Hunter Modis.
Talk to Hunter Modis
Hunter Modis seems to have finished all preparations to lure the Hydra. Talk to Hunter Modis.
Hunter Modis has set up a trap at the Heralve Vacant Lot. Place the bait on the trap to lure the Tyronas Hydra and defeat it.
After defeating the Hydra, the red gem on its body shattered to pieces. Go and tell Elder Aloizard about the Tyronas Hydra.
Hunter Modis seems to have a problem at hand. Talk to Hunter Modis.
Collect Markazi Flowers
Someone from the village accidentally drank the contaminated red water. Go to the right side of Svaigulys Hill in Letas Stream and collect Markazi Flowers to ease their pain.
You have collected enough Markazi Flowers now. Bring them to Hunter Modis.
Lanaldas is furious at the fact that the red water of the reservoir was the fault of someone's experiment. Talk to Lanaldas.
Collect lard from Black Rajapearlites
Lanaldas wants to burn down the laboratory as retaliation. Go and collect lard from Black Rajapearlites to make flammable oil.
Deliver to Lanaldas
You have collected enough lard from Black Rajapearlites. Bring it to Lanaldas.
The oil is ready now. Talk to Lanaldas before burning down the laboratory.
Set fire to the laboratory

Lanaldas wants you to burn down the laboratory to prevent future experiments. One is located in the Nesuga Small Corridor of the Absenta Reservoir, the other in the Wandering Sanctuary of the Pelke Shrine Ruins.
You have burned down all the laboratories. Go and tell Lanaldas.
If you're really set on helping Elder Aloizard, he will be waiting for you at the Collapsed Hall Lot. Go and find him there.
Rune Casters can command powerful magic through the use of Rune Characters.{nl}Rune Stones are merely tools to make that process easier.
Rune characters are rarely used now.{nl}But they shall never be forgotten as long as there are Rune Casters.
Mercenary Post Receptionist
Check for requests at the Mercenary Post
Check for requests at the Mercenary Post.
Carry out the Mercenary Post Mission
You've accepted a mission from receptionist Donnes at the Mercenary Post. Complete the mission.
Report to the Mercenary Post Receptionist
You've completed the mission. Report back to Donnes at the Mercenary Post.
Interrupt the Merog Shaman's Ritual
Jonas is the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}He is a very important person to our research team.{nl}
I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the {nl}memories of all workers after building the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.
I'm not sure if that is the reason but the Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Crystal Mine.{nl}Those Vubbes took all the villagers they saw into the mines.{nl}
That portal is a gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.
After Medzio Diena, maintaining the monastery has been no easy task.{nl}Apart from me and few other brothers, there was no one left in the monastery, you see.{nl}
The demons kept every single one of us locked inside the annex.{nl}We didn't know the demons' demands or their reasoning; all we could do was pray.{nl}
They say that there are barely any intact cities left in the kingdom.{nl}All because of Medzio Diena four years ago... It's a real shame.{nl}
On Medzio Diena, it was a nightmare because of the earthquake.{nl}It was still easier to get by back then than it is now...{nl}
And after the Kruvina device, my condition isn't the best either...{nl}If that's okay with you, will you help us set up the barricade?
It doesn't make sense no matter how much I think of it.{nl}How did they find this place?
Find the map at Ratas Fork

Rolandas says that a map showing the location of Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden somewhere. As its exact coordinates are unknown, you will have to search the entire area.{nl}Go to Ratas Fork and look for the map.
My old colleague who went to Sirdgela Forest told me that he saw a strange looking map.{nl}I am sure that it is the map we are looking for.
It is a real honor to be chosen as a member of the research team, {nl}but I am afraid of making mistakes.
The crops withered when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's alright. I was told that the bad energy within the crops would go away like that. {nl}
Dried food has a long shelf life.{nl}You'll feel full even when you consume only a small amount of beef jerky.{nl}That's why we're accumulating a lot of it.
What?{nl}No way... You think Vaiga has sent his pawn?
I... I don't trust what these youngsters are doing. No, sir.{nl}I know I can find a way if they would just let me, but they want to keep me out of it.
Next time, I'll fight at the front line. {nl}I'm positive I can take it down.
Then we have no choice.{nl}As Erikas said, can you find Legwyn at Mires Grave using the Scroll of the Dead?{nl}I will stay here so that Erikas won't escape.

Attention! Please read.{nl}Should the purifier be disabled, toxic substances will fill Crystal Mine 3F.{nl}Please proceed with the following steps as quickly as possibel in the event of a purifier failure.
1. Next to the purifier
Emergency Power Source
check it{nl}2.
: take it and find magic crystals on 3F that have yet to be collected.{nl}3.
: collect the crystal's magic on it!{nl}4.
: use it to restore the purifier{nl}5. After using,
: put it back!
Would you please help me?{nl}Something must have happened to make the Pantos like that.{nl}You saw that baby Panto eat the Plateau Sugar Beet I was carrying, right?

{nl}I'm guessing the adult Pantos started acting strange after eating the Sugar Beets that grow here.{nl}Get rid of all the Sugar Beet stems you see growing at the Spalva Junction.{nl}It's a shame but I'd rather the Pantos starve than eat those things.
I often hear from the watchers at the Gele Plateau that the soil here is being contaminated.{nl}With what, I'm not sure...
Did you destroy the roots, too?{nl}If someone comes to cover me I'll help you out.
If we're going to use a shaman doll, we need more information.{nl}There used to be nothing but Pantos here, but now I see other monsters hanging around.
{nl}If you find any Spion Archers, Leaflies or Malis at Gele Plateau, can you handle them?{nl}Also, let me know if you find anything new.
We've only recently started to scout this area, so we don't know exactly where they are either.{nl}But the last place we found is probably the last two I talked about earlier.
Hm... I see. It's not much yet, but we might be able to fix the shaman doll a little.{nl}I'll let Basil know. Thanks for helping.

While I was running from the demons I found some traps {nl}around this area that weren't working like they should.{nl}They're supposed to react to demons only, but they reacted to me, too.{nl}Then some Blue Vubbe Archers saw it and took a few of my traps for themselves.

{nl}If you're going over there, would you please collect some of my traps?{nl}I installed most of them in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.{nl}You might be able to get some from the Blue Vubbe Archers over there, too.
The traps built here weren't all made at the order.{nl}Some I bought at a high price from a Sapper in Klaipeda, but they aren't worth the money.
I built a few good hundreds of them, so we're still far from collecting them all.{nl}If I get out of here, I need to go to Klaipeda and find that Sapper.
Do you know what's harder than running from Marnox?{nl}Trying to hide among the Varvs at the Felon Prison.{nl}I want you to just get rid of all the Varvs you can find.
If I get out of here I can talk proudly of having faced Marnox.{nl}But the thing with the Varvs is not something I want to talk about over dinner, {nl}or ever for that matter.
I think I just heard them.{nl}Are you sure you got rid of all of them?
{nl}They were so many; there's no way, huh...{nl}Still, thanks for clearing them out a little...

I think I'm going to need to camp out here for a few days, {nl}but I'm worried about spending the night here.{nl}Will you get me the blue coal I burried at Goram Shores and Saunu Brook?{nl}I burried it before Medzio Diena, but given my situation I really need to use it...

I bought it from the mine in the northern snowfield thinking I could sell it in Orsha...{nl}However, after Medzio Diena, everyone was busy reconstructing {nl}the city and cutting down the tree around it. In the end, no one was buying my items.
{nl}I ended up burying it in nearby Koru Jungle.{nl}I didn't mean to leave it there for so long... {nl}I don't even know if it's good for fire, because of all the humidity.
I think this will do to keep me safe for a few hours...{nl}Thank you!
For my father who is in Klaipeda, it may not be quite enough.{nl}I'll help you get to a slightly higher level.
Your test is going to Feretory Hills and defeating monsters.{nl}Use only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques.{nl}
And no helpers. Only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques.{nl}Easy and simple.
Uh... you say the statue only made the ferrets even more violent?{nl}
Now, pour the oil around the laboratories and set fire to them.{nl}We can't let this type of experiment happen ever again...{nl}
Dangerous Mine
I'll find the power
Justified Suspicion
I'll help you
I don't think that'll be necessary
Improvements
I'll find the other people
Conveying information
Collect the Faulty Goods
We should let that go
Days to Forget
I don't want to get my hands dirty
Camping Preparations
Check the Purifier in 3F
Check the Purifier in Crystal Mine 3F
Collect Crystal Magic
The purifier on the 3rd floor is disabled for lack of energy. Find magic crystals and charge the emergency power source with their magic, then use it to provide energy to the 3F Purifier.
Supply energy to the 3F Purifier
You have collected enough crystal magic. Supply their energy to the 3F Purifier.
Watcher Molly is waiting for your help at Srautas Gorge
Remove the Plateau Sugar Beet Stems
Watcher Molly believes the reason the Pantos started acting strange from eating the Plateau Sugar Beets. She requested you get destroy all the Plateau Sugar Beets.
You have removed enough Plateau Sugar Beets. Report to Watcher Molly.
Watcher Molly is waiting for help at the Gele Plateau
Hunt Monsters

Watcher Molly wants to gather information on the monsters in order to more effectively use a shaman doll at Gele Plateau. Defeat Spion Archers, Leaflies and Malis to learn how to handle these new monsters.
Report to Watcher Molly
You have collected sufficient information for Watcher Molly. Go back and report to her about what you learned fighting the monsters.
Priest Draznie is looking for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 2F
Collect Faulty Traps
Priest Draznie has asked you to collect some traps she set up a long time ago. According to her, most traps are set up in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.
Return the Faulty Traps to Priest Draznie
You have collected a large number of traps. Bring them to Priest Draznie.
Priest Gelija is waiting for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 3F
Varv Extermination
Priest Gelija has asked you to clear out the Varvs that have been terrorizing the priests in Ashaq Underground Prison. They are often found at the Felon Prison.
Report to Priest Gelija
You have clear out enough Varvs. Report to Gelija.
Exterminate %s
A traveling merchant in Koru Jungle is waiting for help
Collect Blue Coal

The merchant wants to retrieve some blue coal they buried in Koru Jungle to help them make it through until the group has recovered. Go to Goram Shores and Saunu Brook and find the pieces of blue coal in the piles of dirt.
Deliver the Blue Coal to the merchant
You have collected enough blue coal. Deliver it to the merchant.
The Barbarian Master wants you to defeat monsters in Feretory Hills using only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques. This is a task you must complete on your own.
You didn't see him?{nl}His mind is not all that sound. Where could he be?{nl}
column3: 보지 못하셨다고요.{nl}그 정신으로 어딜 가신걸까..{nl}
column5: You didn't see him?{nl}His mind is not all that sound. Where could he be?{nl}
column6: 보지 못하셨다고요.{nl}정신도 오락가락하신 분이 어딜 가신걸까.{nl}

Centinela: Niels sent you too?{nl}I am not going.{nl}I have to research these wild flowers.{nl}
column3: 댁도 닐스가 보낸 거요?{nl}난 안 가오. {nl}야생화를 연구해야 한단 말이오.{nl}
column5: Niels sent you too?{nl}I am not going. I have to research these wild flowers.{nl}
column6: 댁도 닐스가 보낸 거요?{nl}난 안 가오. 야생화를 연구해야 한단 말요.{nl}

Centinela: I am not sure of what he meant by 'the worthy one'...{nl}However, the goddess said unto Zachariel and gave him{nl}the divine task of helping the one who will save this world.{nl}
column3: 그 적임자의 기준이 무엇인지 잘은 모르겠지만..{nl}여신께서 자카리엘 대왕께 이 세상을 구원할 이에게 도움이 되어 달라고 부탁하셨다는군.{nl}
column5: I am not sure of what he meant by 'the worthy one'...{nl}However, the goddess said unto Zachariel and gave him{nl}the divine task of helping the one who will save this world.{nl}
column6: 그 적임자의 기준이 무엇인지 잘은 모르겠다만..{nl}여신께서 자카리엘 대왕께 이 세상을 구원할 이에게 도움이 되어 달라고 부탁하셨다는군.{nl}

Centinela: There's a herb that only grows around Metos Field.{nl}Please bring me it.
column3: 협곡 메토스라고 이 협곡에서만 나는 박하가 있소.{nl}그걸 가져다 주시오.
column5: Hmm... Well, there's a herb that only grows around Metos Field.{nl}Please bring me it.
column6: 음.. 그러면, 협곡 메토스라고 이 협곡에서만 나는 박하가 있소.{nl}그걸 가져다 주시오.

Centinela: Good job.{nl}You're pretty sharp, aren't you?{nl}
column3: 그거 맞소. {nl}당신 좀 보는 눈이 있구려?{nl}
column5: Good job. You're pretty sharp, aren't you?{nl}
column6: 그거 맞소. 당신 좀 보는 눈이 있구려?{nl}

Centinela: Alright, it's done.{nl}Take this to Davio.
column3: 자, 다 되었소. {nl}이걸 다시 다비오에게 갖다 주시오.
column5: Alright, it's done.{nl}Take this to Davio.
column6: 자. 다 되었소. {nl}이걸 다시 다비오에게 갖다 주시오.

Centinela: This will be enough.{nl}Davio sent you, right?{nl}I still need one more ingredient to make the medicine truly effective.
column3: 이 정도면 충분하군. {nl}다비오가 보냈겠지?{nl}하지만 약효가 제대로 들을려면 한 가지 약재가 더 필요하다오.
column5: This will be enough. Davio sent you, right?{nl} I still need one more ingredient to make the medicine truly effective.
column6: 이 정도면 충분하군. 다비오가 보냈겠지?{nl}하지만 약효가 제대로 들을려면 한 가지 약재가 더 필요해.

Centinela: To make the medicine, I needed to find the cause of Jonas' symptoms and it drove me crazy.{nl}Funnily enough, it was caused by a spell that was used long ago.{nl}
column3: 약을 만들려면 원인을 알아내야 하는데 이게 골치아팠다고.{nl}웃기게도, 아주 오래 전에 쓰인 마법이랑 같은 것이였어.{nl}
column5: To make the medicine, I needed to find the cause of Jonas' symptoms and it drove me crazy.{nl}Funnily enough, it was caused by a spell that was used long ago.{nl}
column6: 약을 만드려면 원인을 알아내야 하는데 이게 골치아팠다고.{nl}웃기게도, 아주 오래 전에 쓰인 마법이랑 같은 것이였어.{nl}

Centinela: I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the {nl}memories of all workers after building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.{nl}
column3: 소문으로 들은 얘기지만, 자카리엘 대왕은 왕릉을 만들고 나서 모든 인부들의 기억을 지웠다는군.{nl}그게 요나스 영감한테 걸린 마법이야. {nl}그런데 나이 때문에 노망도 온 거지.
column5: I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the {nl}memories of all workers after building the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.
column6: 소문으로 들은 얘기지만, 자카리엘 대왕은 왕릉을 만들고 나서 모든 인부들의 기억을 지웠다는군.{nl}그게 요나스 영감한테 걸린 마법이야. 그런데 나이 때문에 노망도 온 거지.

Centinela: It will be completed once you melt it in the honey that you have.{nl}Take it with you.
column3: 자네가 가져온 걸 벌꿀술에 녹이면 완성이지. {nl}가져가게.
column5: It will be completed once you melt it in the honey that you have. Take it with you.
column6: 자네가 가져온 걸 벌꿀술에 녹이면 완성이지. 가져가게.

Centinela: We don't accept just anyone as a Peltasta.{nl}I will give you an assignment. First, defeat all Jukopus that are occupying Siauliai's Miners' Village.
column3: 우리는 아무나 펠타스타로 받아들이지 않습니다.{nl}과제를 드리지요. 샤울레이 광산 마을에 서식 중인 유코푸스들을 소탕하십시오.
column5: We don't accept just anyone as a Peltasta.{nl}I will give you an assignment. First, defeat all Vubbes that are occupying the 1st floor of Crystal Mine.
column6: 우리는 아무나 펠타스타로 받아들이지 않습니다.{nl}과제를 드리지요. 수정광산 1층을 점령하고 있는 부베들을 소탕하십시오.

Centinela: I am happy to see that you are determined to learn the way of the sword from me,{nl}but I can't be sure that you are capable.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face against the Vubbes at the Miners' Village.
column3: 그대가 검법을 계승하겠다는 건 참으로 고마운 일이나 제대로 따라올 수 있을지 의문이 드는군.{nl}샤울레이 광산 마을에 퍼져 있는 부베들을 상대하는 것으로 그대를 시험해 보겠다.
column5: I am happy to see that you are determined to learn the way of the sword from me, {nl}but I can't be sure that you are capable.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face against the Vubbes at Crystal Mine 1F.
column6: 그대가 검법을 계승하겠다는 건 참으로 고마운 일이나 제대로 따라올 수 있을지 의문이 드는군.{nl}수정광산 1층을 점거하고 있는 부베들을 상대하는 것으로 그대를 시험해 보겠다.

Centinela: Your will to learn from me is good, but first I have a favor to ask.{nl}We can continue our talk if you are up for it.{nl}
column3: 내게 뭘 배우겠다는 마음가짐은 좋지만 대신 한 가지 부탁이 있네.{nl}들어주겠다고 해야만 이야기를 계속할 수 있어.{nl}
column5: Your will to learn from me is good, but first I have a favor to ask. {nl}We can continue our talk if you are up for it. {nl}
column6: 내게 뭘 배우겠다는 마음가짐은 좋다만 대신 한 가지 부탁이 있네.{nl}들어주겠다고 해야만 이야기를 계속할 수 있어.{nl}

Centinela: I heard the lost telescope lens from the Astral Tower is at the Miners' Village. {nl}Get me that lens before the other masters find out and I'll teach you my techniques.
column3: 별의 탑에서 사라진 망원경의 렌즈가 샤울레이 광산 마을에 있다더군.{nl}다른 마스터들이 눈치채기 전에 빨리 그 렌즈를 가져다주면 내 기술을 가르쳐 주겠네.
column5: I heard the lost telescope lens from the Astral Tower is in Crystal Mine 1F. {nl}Get me that lens before the other masters find out and I'll teach you my techniques.
column6: 별의 탑에서 사라진 망원경의 렌즈가 수정광산 1층에 있다더군.{nl}다른 마스터들이 눈치채기 전에 빨리 그 렌즈를 가져다주면 내 기술을 가르쳐 주겠네.

Centinela: I heard the Vubbes at the Miners' Village have a special type of venom. {nl}I'm sure it's the same venom used by the assassin Ebonypawn. Bring me that venom.
column3: 샤울레이 광산 마을의 부베들은 특별한 독을 사용한다는 소문을 들었어.{nl}분명히 암살자 에보니폰도 쓰는 독일 거야. 그 독을 모아 와.
column5: I heard the bats in Crystal Mine 1F have a special type of venom. {nl}I'm sure it's the same venom used by the assassin Evoniphon. Bring me that venom.
column6: 수정광산 1층의 박쥐들은 특별한 독을 품고 있다는 소문을 들었어.{nl}분명히 암살자 에보니폰이 쓰는 독일 거야. 그 독을 채취해 와.

Centinela: {nl}The Archer Master is not a mean person, so he will give you the book if you ask nicely.{nl}
column3: {nl}아처 마스터가 그리 매정한 사람은 아니니 공손하게 부탁하면 책을 내어 줄 지도 몰라.{nl}
column5: The Archer Master has the next book. {nl}He's not a mean person, so he will give you the book if you ask nicely. {nl}
column6: 다음 책은 아처 마스터가 가지고 있을 거야.{nl}그리 매정한 사람은 아니니 공손하게 부탁하면 책을 내어 줄 지도 몰라.{nl}

Centinela: It's not hard to teach you high level magic... but, you should help me before I teach it to you.{nl}I need to collect fire energy for my research, but I just don't have the time.
column3: 고급 마법을 가르쳐 주는 거야 어렵지 않지만.. 그 전에 날 좀 도와줘야겠어.{nl}연구에 필요한 불의 기운을 모아야 하는데 도무지 짬이 나질 않아.
column5: It's not hard to teach you high level magic... but, you should help be before I teach them to you.{nl}I should collect the energies of fire that are needed for the research, but I just don't have time for that.
column6: 고급 마법을 가르쳐 주는 거야 어렵지 않다만.. 그 전에 날 좀 도와줘야겠어.{nl}연구에 필요한 불의 기운을 모아야 하는데 도무지 짬이 나질 않아.

Centinela: This is the symbol that I engraved on my father's sleeve...{nl}This is so precious to me... Thank you.
column3: 이건 제가 아버지 소매에 넣어드린 문양인데..{nl}제겐 너무 소중한 아버지의 유품이네요.. 감사합니다.
column5: This is the symbol that I engraved on my father's sleeve...{nl}This is so precious to me... Thank you.
column6: 이건 제가 아버지 소매에 넣어드린 문양인데..{nl}제겐 너무 소중한 아버지의 유품이네요... 감사합니다.

Centinela: This is an opportunity for us. The Cockats are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails from them to use for our research.
column3: 이건 기회에요. 코카트가 이미 병에 걸려 있거든요.{nl}조사에 쓸 수 있도록 꼬리를 넉넉히 구해 주세요.
column5: This is an opportunity for us. The Big Cockatrices are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails from them to use for our research.
column6: 이건 기회에요. 빅 코카트리스가 이미 병에 걸려 있거든요.{nl}조사에 쓸 수 있도록 꼬리를 넉넉히 구해 주세요.

Centinela: What if one of those flowers suddenly bit you?{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.
column3: 어느 날 갑자기 저 꽃들이 네 다릴 문다고 생각해봐.{nl}넌 어떻게 보일진 모르겠지만, 난 별로 아름답게만은 보이질 않아.
column5: What if one of those flowers suddenly bit you?{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.
column6: 어느 날 갑자기 저 꽃들이 네 다릴 문다고 생각해봐.{nl}넌 어떻게 보일진 모르겠다만, 난 별로 아름답게만은 보이질 않아.

Centinela: I must protect them...
column3: 지켜야 해..

Centinela: Gesti... should not be underestimated.{nl}We need to find the hidden sanctum fast, but let's be cautious.
column3: 제스티.. 쉬이 얕볼 상대가 아니다.{nl}숨겨진 성소를 빨리 찾아야 하지만, 신중하자꾸나.
column5: Gesti... should not be underestimated.{nl}We need to find the hidden sanctum fast, but let's be cautious.
column6: 제스티.. 쉬이 얕볼 상대가 아니다.{nl}숨겨진 성소를 빨리 찾아야 한다만, 신중하자꾸나.

Centinela: You need the Seal of Space in order to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl}It's hidden in the Sventove Central Altar, but I just hope it's not too late.
column3: 숨겨진 성소에 들어가려면 공간의 문장이 필요하단다.{nl}스벤토베 중앙 제단에 숨겨져 있지만 너무 늦은 게 아닌지.
column5: You need the Seal of Space in order to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl}It's hidden in the Sventove Central Altar, but I just hope it's not too late.
column6: 숨겨진 성소에 들어가려면 공간의 문장이 필요하단다.{nl}스벤토베 중앙 제단에 숨겨져 있다만 너무 늦은 게 아닌지.

Centinela: We can't do anything about the destroyed altar, but the fragments still have power. {nl}Gather the pieces and insert them into the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.
column3: 파괴된 제단은 어쩔 수 없지만 조각들에는 아직 힘이 남아 있다.{nl}그 조각들을 모아 스벤토베 중앙 홀에 있는 8개의 기둥에 잘 끼워넣거라.
column5: We can't do anything about the destroyed altar, but the fragments still have power. {nl}Gather the pieces and insert them into the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.
column6: 파괴된 제단은 어쩔 수 없다만 조각들에는 아직 힘이 남아 있다.{nl}그 조각들을 모아 스벤토베 중앙 홀에 있는 8개의 기둥에 잘 끼워넣거라.

Centinela: Uh...
Is there nothing valuable here?{nl}I mean, I've been hired by Raymond, but...
column3: 어디 뭐 값나가는 거 없을까?{nl}일단 레이몬드에게 고용된 몸이긴 하지만.
column5: Is there even anything valuable here?{nl}For the time being, I have been hired by Raymond.
column6: 어디 뭐 값나가는 거 없을까?{nl}일단 레이몬드에게 고용된 몸이긴 하다만.

Centinela: In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but...{nl}
column3: 이 협곡지대와 클라페다 사이엔 사악한 기운이 가득한 가시숲이 있지.{nl}예전엔 보통의 평화로운 숲이였지만..{nl}
column5: In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but...{nl}
column6: 이 협곡지대와 클라페다 사이엔 사악한 기운이 가득한 가시숲이 있지.{nl}예전엔 보통의 평화로운 숲이였다만..{nl}

Centinela: I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. {nl}We might even have had another Medzio Diena otherwise.
column3: 누군진 모르지만 계시자가 잘 막아줘서 망정이지.. {nl}신수의 날이 또 올 수도 있는 거잖아.
column5: I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. {nl}We might even have had another Medzio Diena.
column6: 누군진 모른다만 계시자가 잘 막아줘서 망정이지.. {nl}신수의 날이 또 올 수도 있는 거잖아.

Centinela: Overlong Bridge Valley is home to many places where one can open spatial chasms.
column3: 긴다리 계곡에는 공간의 틈새를 열 수 있는 곳이 아주 많아.
column5: The spatial chasms may exist anywhere, but they might also not exist anywhere.
column6: 공간의 틈새는 어디에나 있을 수 있지만, 어디에도 없을 수도 있지.

Centinela: Dementia? That's absurd.{nl}I'm perfectly fine. {nl}You're the crazy ones.
column3: 노망이라니.. 웃기지도 않는 소리.{nl}난 멀쩡해. {nl}미친 건 너희들이지.
column5: Dementia? That's absurd.{nl}I am okay. You guys are crazy.
column6: 노망이나? 웃기지도 않는 소리.{nl}난 멀쩡해. 미친 건 너희들이지.

Centinela: Just where did that old man go all by himself?{nl}His mind isn't even right...
column3: 도대체 이 위험한 곳에 노인의 몸으로 혼자 어딜 가셨단 말인가.{nl}정신도 온전치 못하신 분이..
column5: Just where exactly did that old man go to alone?{nl}He's not even in good shape...
column6: 도대체 이 위험한 곳에 노인의 몸으로 혼자 어딜 가셨단 말인가.{nl}정신도 성치 않으신 분이..

Centinela: You should prove that you are suited to use a sword if you want to reach a higher level of swordsmanship. {nl}Go and collect Red Kepa Skins at the Miners' Village.
column3: 좀 더 높은 검의 경지에 오르고 싶다면 스스로가 검에 어울리는 인물인지 증명해야겠지.{nl}샤울레이 광산 마을에 있는 붉은 케파에게서 붉은 케파의 껍질을 가지고 오렴.
column5: You should prove that you are suited to use a sword if you want to reach a higher level of swordsmanship.{nl}Please obtain the heart of Stone Orca at the 1st Floor of the Crystal Mine.
column6: 좀 더 높은 검의 경지에 오르고 싶다면 스스로가 검에 어울리는 인물인지 증명해야겠지.{nl}수정광산 1층에 있는 스톤오르카에게서 스톤오르카의 심장을 가지고 오렴.

Centinela: While magic does not choose its wielder, I don't like a lazy disciple.{nl}Defeating Stone Orcas in Crystal Mine 1F will be a test of your guts.
column3: 마법은 사람을 가리지 않지만 난 게으른 사람은 싫어.{nl}샤울레이 광산 마을에서 붉은 케파를 해치우는 것으로 네 근성을 시험해 보겠어.
column5: While magics does not choose its wielder, I don't like a lazy disciple.{nl}Defeating Stone Orcas in Crystal Mine 1F as a test of your guts.
column6: 마법은 사람을 가리지 않지만 난 게으른 사람은 싫어.{nl}수정광산 1층에서 스톤오르카를 해치우는 것으로 네 근성을 시험해 보겠어.

Centinela: If you can't bring me cores, you better give up now.
column3: 핵을 가져올 수 없다면 그냥 일찍 포기하는 게 더 나을지도 몰라.
column5: If you cannot bring arrows, you better give up now.
column6: 화살을 가져올 수 없다면 그냥 일찍 포기하는 게 더 나을지도 몰라.

Centinela: Defeat the Jukopus at the Miners' Village and bring me their cores as proof.
column3: 샤울레이 광산 마을의 유코푸스를 해치우고 그 증거로 녀석들의 핵을 가져와.
column5: Eliminate the bats in Crystal Mine 1F and bring their wings as a proof.
column6: 수정광산 1층의 박쥐를 해치우고 그 증거로 녀석들의 날개를 가져와.

Centinela: We should ask for more in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they're looking for, {nl}but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}
column3: 요즘 같은 세상일수록 더 챙겨야지.{nl}다들 뭘 찾고 있는진 모르겠지만, 왕릉서 뭐가 나왔다고만 하면 거금을 주고 사버린다니까?{nl}{nl}
column5: We should ask for more when we are in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they are looking for, {nl}but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}
column6: 요즘 같은 세상일수록 더 챙겨야지.{nl}다들 뭘 찾고 있는진 모르겠다만, 왕릉서 뭐가 나왔다고만 하면 거금을 주고 사버린다니까?{nl}{nl}

Centinela: Ah, so you're the newcomer.{nl}Come see this thing behind me and if the matter inside solidifies, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}
column3: 아아, 신참이 자네군.{nl}내 뒤에 있는 거푸집을 잘 보다가 안에 있는 것이 다 굳거든 꺼내 와.{nl}{nl}
column5: Ah, so you are the newcomer.{nl}Come see this thing behind me and if the matter inside solidifies, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}
column6: 아아, 신참이 자네군.{nl}내 뒤에 있는 거부집을 잘 보다가 안에 있는 것이 다 굳거든 꺼내 와.{nl}{nl}

Centinela: I would feel more comfortable doing it myself, {nl}but I took an arrow to the knee before, and it aches quite a bit.
column3: 내가 직접 하는 게 속 편하지만 옛날에 화살을 맞은 무릎이 욱씬거리는군.
column5: I would feel more comfortable doing it myself, {nl}but I took an arrow to the knee before, and it aches quite a bit.
column6: 내가 직접 하는 게 속 편하다만 옛날에 화살을 맞은 무릎이 욱씬거리는군.

Centinela: Hmm... So... The procedure is...{nl}Wash your body in the water, pray, and then...{nl}
column3: 음, 그러니까.. 절차는요.{nl}물에 몸을 정갈히 씻고 기도를 드린 다음에..{nl}
column5: Hmm... So... The procedure is...{nl}Wash your body in the water, pray, and then...{nl}
column6: 음. 그러니까. 절차는요.{nl}물에 몸을 정갈히 씻고 기도를 드린 다음에..{nl}

Centinela: Thank you. {nl}I should be able to work with this amount of divine energy.
column3: 감사합니다.{nl}이 정도 신성력이라면 충분하겠어요.
column5: Thank you. {nl}I should be able to work with this amount of divine energy.
column6: 감사합니다.{nl}이 정도 성력이라면 충분하겠어요.

Centinela: Clymen... I can feel its presence at the Ishpirki Access Road.
column3: 클라이멘.. 이쉬필키 진입로에서 느껴집니다.
column5: Clymen... I can feel its presence at the Ishpirki Access Road.{nl}Please defeat it.
column6: 클라이멘.. 이쉬필키 진입로에서 느껴집니다.{nl}어서 그를 말살해 주십시오.

Centinela: Goddess Saule? {nl}We haven't seen Her in a long time.{nl}
column3: 사울레 여신?{nl}우리도 못 뵌 지 오래 됐지.{nl}
column5: Goddess Saule? {nl}We haven't seen her for a long time. {nl}
column6: 사울레 여신?{nl}우리도 못 뵌지 오래 됐지.{nl}

Centinela: The portal that leads to Goddess Saule doesn't open. {nl}I think it's because the Holy Pond is corrupted.
column3: 여신께 가는 포탈이 도무질 열리지 않거든.{nl}그게 다 신성한 연못이 오염됐기 때문이라네.
column5: The portal that leads to Goddess Saule doesn't open. {nl}I think it's because the Holy Pond is corrupted.
column6: 여신께 가는 포탈이 도무질 열리지 않거든.{nl}그게 다 신성한 연못이 오염된 게 아닐까 싶은데.

Centinela: Is it the sacred object?{nl}It's been such a long time, I can't think of anything else.
column3: 설마 그 성물인가?{nl}흠.. 하도 오래전이다 보니 짚이는 것이 없네요.
column5: Is it the sacred object?{nl}It's been such a long time so I can't think of anything else.
column6: 설마 그 성물인가?{nl}흠.. 하도 오래전이다 보니 짚히는 것이 없네요.

Centinela: I also wonder why they used such magic on the old man.
column3: 그 노인에게 왜 그런 마법이 걸렸는지는 나도 궁금하다구.

Centinela: I had never seen demons use any herbs, but I'm sure whatever it is they're doing, it's evil.{nl}I was on my way to stop them when this happened...
column3: 마족이 독초 같은 걸 쓰는 것도 처음 봤지만, 좋은 일은 아닐 거요.{nl}그래서 부수려고 했다가 이 꼴이 났지..
column5: I had never seen demons use any herbs, but I'm sure whatever it is they're doing, it's evil.{nl}I was on my way to stop them when this happened...
column6: 마족이 독초 같은 걸 쓰는 것도 처음 봤다만, 좋은 일은 아닐 거요.{nl}그래서 부수려고 했다가 이 꼴이 났지..

Centinela: The Chapparition will not bring back the lives of those who died.{nl}It's a sad thing.. But we can't just leave it like that.
column3: 채퍼리션이 목숨을 앗아간 사람들을 다시 살릴 순 없겠지.{nl}안타까운 일이지만.. 그렇다고 방치할 순 없는 일이네.
column5: Chapparition will not bring back the lives of those who died.{nl}It's a sad thing.. But we can't just leave it like that.
column6: 채퍼리션이 목숨을 앗아간 사람들을 다시 살릴 순 없겠지.{nl}안타까운 일이다만.. 그렇다고 방치할 순 없는 일이네.

Centinela: What? You're not a reaper?{nl}But since you've seen my face now, I'm sorry but you will be cursed. {nl}
column3: 뭐야. 리퍼가 아니잖아?{nl}하지만 내 얼굴을 보았으니 안됐지만 곧 저주받게 될 거야.{nl}
column5: What? You're not a reaper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you will be cursed. {nl}
column6: 뭐야. 리퍼가 아니잖아?{nl}하지만 내 얼굴을 보았으니 안됬지만 곧 저주받게 될 거야.{nl}

Centinela: Wait a minute. No. No.{nl}Deliver this letter for me and we can pretend this never happened.
column3: 잠깐. 아니지. 아니야. {nl}이 편지 한 통을 전해 준다면 없던 일로 해 주지.
column5: Wait a minute. No. No. {nl}Delivering this letter will just make it bounce back to you.{nl}You'll have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian. Do not look at what's written in the {nl}letter.
column6: 잠깐. 아니지. 아니야. {nl}이 편지 한 통을 전해 준다면 없던 일로 해 주지.{nl}페디미안의 경비병 리퍼에게 전해주면 된다. 그 안의 내용은 절대 보지 말고.

Centinela: {nl}You'll have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian.{nl}Do not look at what's written in the letter.
column3: {nl}페디미안의 경비병 리퍼에게 전해주면 된다. {nl}그 안의 내용은 절대 보지 말고.

Centinela: I can release the Kartas Hunter from the seal by myself, but{nl}in order to preserve the power of the Crystal, we will need help from my vassals.{nl}
column3: 카르타스의 사냥꾼을 봉인에서 끌어내는 건 나 혼자서도 할 수 있지만.{nl}수정의 힘을 유지하려면 내 가신들의 도움이 필요해.{nl}
column5: I can release the Kartas Hunter from the Crystal's seal by myself, but{nl}in order to preserve the power of the Crystal, we will need help from the vassals.{nl}
column6: 카르타스의 사냥꾼을 봉인에서 끌어내는 건 나 혼자서도 할 수 있다만.{nl}수정의 힘을 유지하려면 내 가신들의 도움이 필요해.{nl}

Centinela: It could be... That they were threatened...{nl}Or they had a mission to complete even though they were being chased?{nl}
column3: 아마 제 생각엔.. 협박이라든지..{nl}아니면 쫓기는 와중에도 완수해야 할 목적이 어딘가에 있는 것 아닐까요?{nl}
column5: It could be... That they were threatened...{nl}Or they had a mission that they had to complete even though they were being pursued?{nl}
column6: 아마 제 생각엔.. 설마 협박이라던가..{nl}아니면 쫓기는 와중에도 완수해야 할 목적이 어딘가에 있는 것 아닐까요?{nl}

Centinela: Attention! Please read.{nl}Should the purifier be disabled, toxic substances will fill Crystal Mine 3F.{nl}
column3: 주의! 꼭 읽어주세요.{nl}정화장치가 정지하면 머지않아 유해물질이 수정광산 3층에 가득차게 됩니다.{nl}
column5: Attention! Please read.{nl}Should the purifier be disabled, toxic substances will fill Crystal Mine 3F.{nl}Please proceed with the following steps as quickly as possible in the event of a purifier failure.
column6: 주의! 꼭 읽어주세요.{nl}정화장치가 정지하면 머지않아 유해물질이 수정광산 3층에 가득차게 됩니다.{nl}만약 정화장치가 정지했다면 다음 방법을 사용하여 동력을 최대한 빨리 복구해주세요.

Centinela: Please proceed with the following steps as quickly as possible in the event of a purifier failure.{nl}
column3: 만약 정화장치가 정지했다면 다음 방법을 사용하여 동력을 최대한 빨리 복구하세요.{nl}
column5: 1. Next to the purifier
column6: 1. 정화장치 곁의

Centinela: : Take it and find the unmined magic crystals spread around 3F.{nl}
column3: 를 들고 3층 곳곳에 아직 채굴하지 않은 마력이 담긴 수정을 찾자.{nl}
column5: Emergency Power Source
column6: 비상 동력장치

Centinela: : Restore in the Purifier.{nl}
column3: 를 정화장치에 복구 시키자.{nl}
column5: : put it back!
column6: 는 꼭 제자리에 둡시다!

Centinela: - Attention -{nl}After using:
column3: -유의사항-{nl}다 사용한

Centinela: Would you please help me?{nl}The Pantos must have eaten something wrong to be acting like that.{nl}
column3: 괜찮다면 나를 좀 더 도와 줄 수 있겠어?{nl}판토들이 저렇게 된 건 역시 뭔가 잘못 먹은 탓일거야.{nl}
column5: Would you please help me?{nl}Something must have happened to make the Pantos like that.{nl}You saw that baby Panto eat the Plateau Sugar Beet I was carrying, right?
column6: 괜찮다면 나를 좀 더 도와 줄 수 있겠어?{nl}판토들이 저렇게 된건 역시 뭔가 잘 못 먹은 탓 일거야.{nl}너도 봐서 알겠지만 내가 가져 온 고원 사탕무를 먹은 새끼 판토들은 아무 일도 없었잖아?

Centinela: You saw that baby Panto eat the Plateau Sugar Beet I was carrying, right?{nl}I'm guessing the adult Pantos started acting strange after eating the Sugar Beets that grow here.{nl}
column3: 너도 봐서 알겠지만 내가 가져 온 고원 사탕무를 먹은 새끼 판토들은 아무 일도 없었잖아?{nl}아마 다 큰 판토들은 이곳에서 자라는 고원 사탕무를 먹고 정신이 나간 게 분명해.{nl}
column5: {nl}I'm guessing the adult Pantos started acting strange after eating the Sugar Beets that grow here.{nl}Get rid of all the Sugar Beet stems you see growing at the Spalva Junction.{nl}It's a shame but I'd rather the Pantos starve than eat those things.
column6: {nl}아마 다 큰 판토들은 이곳에서 자라는 고원 사탕무를 먹고 정신이 나간 게 분명해.{nl}스팔바 삼거리에 자생하는 고원 사탕무 줄기를  보이는 대로 없애버려줘{nl}불쌍하지만 그런걸 먹일 바엔 판토들을 굶기 편이 낫겠어.

Centinela: Get rid of all the Sugar Beet stems you see growing at the Spalva Junction.{nl}It's a shame but I'd rather the Pantos starve than eat those things.
column3: 스팔바 삼거리에 자생하는 고원 사탕무 줄기를  보이는 대로 없애줘.{nl}판토들이 불쌍하지만, 그런 걸 먹을 바엔 굶는 게 나을지도 몰라.

Centinela: I often hear from other watchers that the soil here is being contaminated.{nl}With what, I'm not sure...
column3: 이 지역 땅이 오염되고 있다는 이야기는 다른 파수꾼들에게서 자주 들었어.{nl}무엇 때문에 오염됐는지는 잘 모르겠지만..
column5: I often hear from the watchers at the Gele Plateau that the soil here is being contaminated.{nl}With what, I'm not sure...
column6: 이 지역 토양이 오염되고 있다는 이야기는 겔리고원에 있는 파수꾼들에게서 자주 들었어.{nl}무엇 때문에 오염됐는지는 잘 모르겠지만..

Centinela: If we're going to use a shaman doll, we need more information.{nl}There used to be nothing but Pantos here, but now I see other monsters hanging around.{nl}
column3: 주술인형을 계속 써먹으려면 지금보다 더 많은 정보가 필요해.{nl}여긴 분명 판토들 말곤 다른 몬스터들은 없었는데 못 보던 녀석들이 판토들과 섞여서 돌아다니고 있어.{nl}
column5: If we're going to use a shaman doll, we need more information.{nl}There used to be nothing but Pantos here, but now I see other monsters hanging around.
column6: 주술인형을 계속 사용하려면 지금보다 더 많은 정보가 필요해.{nl}여긴 분명 판토들 말곤 다른 몬스터들은 없었는데 못 보던 녀석들이 판토들과 섞여서 돌아다니고 있어

Centinela: Good.{nl}If you find any Spion Archers, Leaflies or Malis at Gele Plateau, can you handle them?{nl}Also, let me know if you find anything new.
column3: 뭐, 잘 됐어.{nl}겔리고원에서 스피온 궁수랑 리플라이, 그리고 말리를 발견하면 상대해 줄 수 있겠어?{nl}그리고 알게 된 걸 내게 몇 번만 알려주면 돼.
column5: {nl}If you find any Spion Archers, Leaflies or Malis at Gele Plateau, can you handle them?{nl}Also, let me know if you find anything new.
column6: {nl}겔리고원에서 스피온 궁수와 리플라이 그리고 말리를 발견하면 녀석들을 상대해 줄 수 있겠어?{nl}그리고 알게 된 걸 내게 몇 번만 말 해주면 돼.

Centinela: We've only recently started to scout this area, so we don't know exactly where they are either.{nl}But the last places we found are the two I talked about earlier.
column3: 우리도 이 근방을 정찰한지 얼마 안돼서 녀석들이 특별히 어디 몰려 있는 지는 잘 모르겠어.{nl}그래도 마지막으로 발견된 곳은 아까 알려 준 두 곳이야.
column5: We've only recently started to scout this area, so we don't know exactly where they are either.{nl}But the last place we found is probably the last two I talked about earlier.
column6: 우리도 이 지역을 정찰한지 얼마 되지 않아서 특별히 녀석들이 어디에 있는 지는 모르겠어.{nl}그래도 마지막으로 발견된 곳은 아까 알려 준 두 곳이야.

Centinela: Hm... I see.{nl}It's not much yet, but we might be able to fix the shaman doll a little.{nl}
column3: 음.. 그렇구나.{nl}아직 좀 부족하지만, 적게나마 주술인형을 개량할 수 있을지도 몰라.{nl}
column5: Hm... I see. It's not much yet, but we might be able to fix the shaman doll a little.{nl}I'll let Basil know. Thanks for helping.
column6: 음.. 그렇구나.{nl}아직 좀 부족하지만 적게나마 주술인형을 개량할 수 있을지도 몰라.{nl}바질씨에게 알려줘야겠어.{nl}도와줘서 고마워.

Centinela: I'll let Basil know. {nl}Thanks for helping.
column3: 바질씨에게 알려줘야겠어.{nl}도와줘서 고마워.

Centinela: Running from the demons I found some traps around this area that weren't working like they should.{nl}They're supposed to react to demons only, but they reacted to me, too.{nl}
column3: 마족에게 도망치면서 제가 설치해 둔 함정들이 제대로 작동하지 않는 걸 발견했습니다.{nl}원래대로라면 마족에게만 반응해야 할 텐데 제가 지나갈 때도 터지더군요.{nl}
column5: While I was running from the demons I found some traps {nl}around this area that weren't working like they should.{nl}They're supposed to react to demons only, but they reacted to me, too.{nl}Then some Blue Vubbe Archers saw it and took a few of my traps for themselves.
column6: 마족에게 도망치면서 제가 이곳에 설치해 둔 함정들이 제대로 작동하지 않는 걸 발견했습니다.{nl}원래라면 마족에게만 반응하도록 개조한 것인데 제가 지나갈 때도 터지더군요.{nl}그리고 그걸 본 푸른 부베 궁수들이 함정을 제 것인 것 마냥 가지고 갔습니다.

Centinela: Then some Blue Vubbe Archers saw it and took a few of my traps for themselves.{nl}If you're going over there, would you please collect some of my traps?{nl}
column3: 그런데 그걸 본 푸른 부베 궁수들이 함정을 제 것인 것 마냥 훔쳐가지 뭡니까.{nl}괜찮으시다면 제 함정을 회수해 주실 수 있겠습니까?{nl}
column5: {nl}If you're going over there, would you please collect some of my traps?{nl}I installed most of them in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.{nl}You might be able to get some from the Blue Vubbe Archers over there, too.
column6: {nl}아직 이 지역에서 할 일이 남아 있으시다면 제 함정을 회수해 주실 수 있겠습니까?{nl}함정은 대기실과 비품실에 대부분 매설해 두었습니다.{nl}혹은 이곳을 배회하는 푸른 부베 궁수들에게서도 구하실 수 있을 겁니다.

Centinela: I bought them from a Sapper I met in Klaipeda, and they weren't cheap...{nl}Guess they aren't worth the money.
column3: 클라페다에서 만난 새퍼에게 비싼 돈을 주고 사 온 함정들인데.. {nl}제값을 못 하는군요.
column5: The traps built here weren't all made at the order.{nl}Some I bought at a high price from a Sapper in Klaipeda, but they aren't worth the money.
column6: 이 곳에 설치한 함정이 모두 교단에서 만든 것 만 있는 게 아닙니다.{nl}클라페다 지역에서 만난 새퍼에게 비싼 돈을 주고 사 온 함정들인데 제값을 못 하는군요.

Centinela: I built a few dozens of them, so we're still far from collecting them all.{nl}If I get out of here, I need to go to Klaipeda and find that Sapper.
column3: 수십 개를 설치 했는데, 아직 모두 회수하려면 멀었군요.{nl}여길 무사히 빠져 나가면 클라페다로 가서 그 새퍼를 다시 만나봐야겠어요.
column5: I built a few good hundreds of them, so we're still far from collecting them all.{nl}If I get out of here, I need to go to Klaipeda and find that Sapper.
column6: 수 백 개를 설치 했는데, 아직 모두 회수하려면 멀었군요.{nl}여길 무사히 빠져 나가면 클라페다에 가서 그 새퍼를 찾아봐야겠어요.

Centinela: Do you know what's harder than running from Marnox?{nl}Trying to hide among the Varvs at the Felon Prison.{nl}I want you to just get rid of all the Varvs you can find.
column3: 마르녹스의 추격으로부터 도망치는 것 만큼 힘든 일이 무엇이었는지 아십니까?{nl}바로 바브들과 뒤섞여 중죄인 옥사에 숨어 있던 일입니다.{nl}
column5: Do you know what's harder than running from Marnox?{nl}Trying to hide among the Varvs at the Felon Prison.{nl}I want you to just get rid of all the Varvs you can find.
column6: 마르녹스의 추격으로부터 도망치는 것 만큼 힘든 일이 무엇인지 아십니까?{nl}바로 바브들과 뒤섞여 중죄인 옥사에 숨어 있던 일입니다.{nl}바브들을 보시면 꼭 보이는 족족 박멸해 주세요.

Centinela: If you see any Varvs, just get rid of them.
column3: 바브들을 보시면 보이는대로 족족 박멸해 주세요.

Centinela: If I get out of here, I can talk proudly of having faced Marnox.{nl}But the thing with the Varvs is not something I want to talk about over dinner, or ever, to be honest.
column3: 여기서 나가면 마르녹스에게 맞섰던 일을 자랑스럽게 말할 수 있겠죠.{nl}하지만 바브와 함께 있던 일은 굳이 저녁 시간이 아니어도 꺼내기 힘들 겁니다.
column5: If I get out of here I can talk proudly of having faced Marnox.{nl}But the thing with the Varvs is not something I want to talk about over dinner, {nl}or ever for that matter.
column6: 여기서 나가면 마르녹스와 다투던 일을 자랑스럽게 말할 수 있겠죠.{nl}하지만 바브와 함께 있던 일은 굳이 저녁 시간이 아니어도 꺼내기 힘들 겁니다.

Centinela: {nl}They were so many; there's no way, huh...{nl}Still, thanks for clearing them out a little...
column3: {nl}그렇게나 많았는데 그럴 리 없겠죠..{nl}하지만 조금이라도 줄여 주셔서 감사합니다..
column5: {nl}They were so many; there's no way, huh...{nl}Still, thanks for clearing them out a little...
column6: {nl}그렇게 많은데 그럴리 없겠죠..{nl}하지만 조금이라도 줄여 주셔서 감사합니다..

Centinela: I think I'm going to need to camp out here for a few days, but I'm worried about spending the{nl}night here. Will you get me the blue coal I buried at Goram Shores and Saunu Brook?
column3: 여기서 앞으로 며칠은 야영을 해야 할 텐데 밤을 어떻게 보낼지 벌써부터 두렵다네.{nl}혹시 괜찮다면 고람 기슭과 사우누 개울에 내가 파묻어 둔 푸른 석탄을 구해다 줄 수 있겠는가?{nl}
column5: I think I'm going to need to camp out here for a few days, {nl}but I'm worried about spending the night here.{nl}Will you get me the blue coal I buried at Goram Shores and Saunu Brook?{nl}I buried it before Medzio Diena, but given my situation I really need to use it...
column6: 여기서 앞으로 며칠은 야영을 해야 할 텐데 밤을 어떻게 보낼지 벌써부터 두렵다네.{nl}혹시 괜찮다면 고람 기슭과 사우누 개울에 내가 파묻어 둔 푸른 석탄을 구해다 줄 수 있겠는가?{nl}신수의 날 이전에 묻어 둔 것인데, 상황이 여의치 않으니 꺼내서 써야겠어..

Centinela: I buried it before Medzio Diena, but given my situation I really need to use it...
column3: 신수의 날 이전에 묻어 둔 것인데, 상황이 여의치 않으니 꺼내서 써야겠어..

Centinela: I bought it from the mine in the northern snowfield thinking I could sell it in Orsha...{nl}However, after Medzio Diena, everyone was busy reconstructing the city and cutting down the tree around it.{nl}
column3: 원래는 북쪽 설원 지역의 광산에서 사들여서 오르샤에 팔 생각이었네..{nl}그런데 신수의 날 이후 오르샤를 재건하면서 도시를 휘감은 나무를 벌목하면서 문제가 생겼지.{nl}
column5: I bought it from the mine in the northern snowfield thinking I could sell it in Orsha...{nl}However, after Medzio Diena, everyone was busy reconstructing {nl}the city and cutting down the tree around it. In the end, no one was buying my items.
column6: 원래는 북쪽 설원 지역의 광산에서 사들여서 오르샤에 팔 생각이었네..{nl}그런데 신수의 날 이후 오르샤를 재건하면서 도시를 휘감은 나무를 벌목하면서 문제가 생겼지.{nl}아무도 내 물건을 사려고 하지 않으니까 말이야.

Centinela: In the end, no one was buying my items.{nl}So I ended up burying it nearby in Koru Jungle.{nl}
column3: 아무도 내 물건을 사려고 하지 않으니까 말이야.{nl}그래서 인근의 코루 숲에 몰래 파묻어 뒀다네.{nl}
column5: {nl}I ended up burying it in nearby Koru Jungle.{nl}I didn't mean to leave it there for so long... {nl}I don't even know if it's good for fire, because of all the humidity.
column6: {nl}그래서 인근의 코루 숲에 몰래 파묻어 뒀다네.{nl}원래는 이렇게 오래 방치할 게 아니었지만.. 이제 습기 때문에 불이나 잘 붙을지 모르겠구만.

Centinela: I didn't mean to leave it there for so long...{nl}Not sure if it'll still light up, because of the humidity.
column3: 원래는 이렇게 오래 방치할 게 아니었지만.. {nl}이제 습기 때문에 불이나 잘 붙을지 모르겠구먼.

Centinela: I've lost all of my Holy Stones...{nl}I don't know how much longer I'll be able to stay here.{nl}
column3: 가지고 있던 성령석은 모두 잃어버렸고..{nl}내가 여기서 얼마나 더 버틸 수 있을지 모르겠어.{nl}

Centinela: If you happen to find an Orb Crystal when fighting demons, will you bring it to me?{nl}I can use it to create a makeshift Holy Stone and protect myself.
column3: 혹시 마족들과 상대하다가 보주 결정을 발견하면 내게 가져다 줄 수 있을까?{nl}그것만 있으면 조잡하게나마 성령석을 만들어서 내 몸 하나 지키는 건 가능할 것 같아.

Centinela: I'm still in pain from the beating.
column3: 아직도 녀석들에게 얻어맞은 곳이 욱신거리고 아린거 같아.

Centinela: It's not much... But it will have to do.{nl}Thank you so much!
column3: 조금 모자라지만.. 이걸로 어떻게든 해 볼게. {nl}정말 고마워!

Centinela: You weren't thinking of ditching me and doing everything yourself, were you?{nl}Don't you have to be around here for that, anyways?{nl}
column3: 자네 설마 날 혼자 내버려두고 부탁받은 일을 하려는 건 아니겠지?{nl}그 일이라는 거, 어차피 이 주변에서 할 거잖아?{nl}

Centinela: While you're at it, you could clear out some monsters for me, too.
column3: 겸사겸사 날 위해 주변 몬스터들도 처리해줬으면 좋겠어.

Centinela: Guess I shouldn't just trust whoever Niels recommends.
column3: 닐스가 추천해주는 사람은 앞으로 안 믿는 게 낫겠어.

Centinela: Thank you.{nl}If you finish the other job, would you work here with me for a few months?{nl}It's okay if you don't want to, though...
column3: 정말 고맙군.{nl}혹시 그 일이 끝나면 나랑 여기서 몇 달만 같이 일해줄 수 있겠어?{nl}싫다면 별 수 없지만..

Centinela: Epigraphist Deltran
column3: 금석학자 델트란

Centinela: Please help me!{nl}There are important records here that I must find.{nl}
column3: 저 좀 도와주십시오!{nl}여기서 꼭 찾아야 할 중요한 기록들이 있단 말입니다.{nl}

Centinela: But those monsters... If I move they'll come running right away.{nl}Please clear out the ones wandering over there!
column3: 그런데 저 몬스터들이.. 제가 뭐라도 건들 셈이면 제게 달려들고 있어서 말이죠.{nl}저기 저 어슬렁거리는 녀석들 좀 처리해주세요!

Centinela: I got out of Stele Road without my master knowing.{nl}If I go back empty-handed, I'll be in big trouble.{nl}
column3: 비석로에서 스승님 몰래 빠져나왔습니다.{nl}아무런 성과도 없이 돌아가면 분명 크게 혼나겠지요.{nl}

Centinela: I could even be expelled from the Association...
column3: 어쩌면 협회에서 퇴출당할지도 몰라요..

Centinela: Thank you for helping me.{nl}I wonder where all those monsters came from.{nl}
column3: 도와주셔서 감사합니다.{nl}저 녀석들 대체 어디서 몰려드는 건지 모르겠군요.{nl}

Centinela: I know for sure there's something important in here!{nl} But please don't tell the other adventurers I'm here...
column3: 여긴 분명 뭔가 중요한 게 있는 게 분명해요!{nl}그리고 다른 탐험가분들에겐 제가 여기 있다는 걸 말씀하지 말아주세요..

Centinela: With that many monsters, taking anything is almost impossible...
column3: 저렇게 몬스터가 많아선 여기서 돌맹이 하나 가져가기 힘들겠어..

Centinela: Never have I seen such a dreadful place.{nl}The monsters corrupted by evil energy are interfering with our attempts of purification.{nl}
column3: 여신의 말씀을 모셔온 이래 이렇게 끔찍한 곳은 처음입니다.{nl}사악한 기운에 오염된 몬스터들이 우리의 정화작업을 방해하고 있어요.{nl}

Centinela: If you follow the word of the goddess, you know what to do.{nl}Defeat them all!
column3: 당신도 여신을 따르신다면 어떻게 해야하는지 잘 아시겠죠?{nl}보이는 대로 녀석들을 처치해주세요!

Centinela: There's no time to wonder how this happened.{nl}We need to fix it before it's too late.
column3: 왜 이런 일이 일어났는지 고민할 시간은 없습니다.{nl}더 늦기 전에 해결해야지요.

Centinela: I will make sure to tell the other believers about your generous help.{nl}Thank you.
column3: 신실한 당신의 도움을 다른 신도들에게도 꼭 전하겠습니다.{nl}감사합니다.

Centinela: Please don't leave me alone here!{nl}If you go, the Lapasape Mages will come and take me!{nl}Please!
column3: 제발 절 혼자 내버려두고 가지마세요!{nl}안 그러면 라프세이프 메이지들이 절 잡아서 어디론가 데려갈 거에요!{nl}제발요!

Centinela: I don't want them to take me.{nl}I miss my mother...
column3: 잡혀가고 싶지 않아요.{nl}어머니가 보고싶어요..

Centinela: Did you really get all of them?{nl}I can still feel them glaring at me from between the trees...
column3: 정말 녀석들을 없애버리신 건가요?{nl}아직도 녀석들이 수풀 사이에서 절 노려보고 있는 게 느껴져요..

Centinela: Herbalist Talas
column3: 약초 탈라스

Centinela: It's useless.{nl}The demons won't let me collect the herbs I need from Badoca Hill.{nl}
column3: 난감하게 됐소.{nl}마족 때문에 바도카 언덕에서 채집해야할 약초를 못 캘 것 같소.{nl}

Centinela: Without those herbs I can't make medicine for the refugees.{nl}It would be great if you could help...
column3: 그게 없으면 피난 중인 사람들에게 약을 만들어주는 일에 차질이 생기오.{nl}당신이 좀 도와줬으면 좋겠는데..

Centinela: There's not much I can do with my legs like this...
column3: 이런 다리를 하고 그것들을 캐러갈 수 있을리가..

Centinela: Thank you!{nl}I should tend to my legs now.
column3: 정말 고맙소!{nl}우선 내 다리에 좀 써야겠소.

Centinela: The village priest asked me to collect some antidote from the Merog Stingers.{nl}I thought the villagers could help but, as you can see... it's hopeless...{nl}
column3: 마을 사제님께서 메로그 독침술사가 가지고 다니는 해독제를 좀 구해달라고 부탁하셨어요.{nl}저는 마을 사람들이 좀 도와주실 줄 알았는데, 보시다시피.. 참 난감하죠..{nl}

Centinela: If you see any Merog Stingers, would you collect some antidote samples from them?{nl}
column3: 메로그 독침술사를 보시면 해독제 표본을 구해다 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}

Centinela: For some time now the people coming to the shrine ruins are being chased away by Merog Stingers.{nl}They even stung and almost killed a few villagers...
column3: 신전터를 오가는 사람들이 얼마 전부터 메로그 독침술사들에게 쫓기기 시작했어요.{nl}마을 사람들 몇몇도 독에 당해서 사경을 헤매고 있고요..

Centinela: Thank you!{nl}We should collect as much as we can until everyone has recovered.
column3: 감사합니다!{nl}다른 분들이 기운을 차리실 때까지 최대한 많이 모아봐야겠어요.

Centinela: Help!{nl}My spirits were taken away by monsters...{nl}
column3: 도와주세요!{nl}제가 인도해줘야하는 영혼들이 몬스터들에게 잡아먹혀 버렸어요..{nl}

Centinela: Please save them!
column3: 제발 그들을 구해주세요!

Centinela: You need to observe the monsters carefully to find them...
column3: 몬스터들을 잘 관찰해야 찾으실 수 있을 거에요..

Centinela: Thank you.{nl}I pray that they rest in peace with the goddess...
column3: 정말 고맙습니다.{nl}여신의 품에서 편히 쉴 수 있길 빌어야겠어요..

Centinela: I'm sorry... I'm so sorry...
column3: 미안해요.. 정말 미안해요..

Centinela: Frail Owl Sculpture
column3: 미약한 부엉이 조각상

Centinela: I wish I could do something for the spirits, like you...
column3: 저도 당신처럼 영혼들을 위해 뭔가 할 수 있으면 좋겠어요..

Centinela: The spirits I need to collect are all scattered, in fear of the monsters.{nl}Would you find these frightened spirits and bring them back to me?
column3: 몬스터들 때문에 제게 모여야할 영혼들이 모두 겁을 먹고 흩어져버렸어요.{nl}겁에 질린 그들을 찾아서 제게 데려와 주실 수 있나요?

Centinela: I miss the old, peaceful times...
column3: 고요했던 그 시절이 그리워요..

Centinela: If I wasn't hidden among the trees like this, who knows if the monsters wouldn't have taken me too.{nl}But I will guide the spirits for as long as I can.{nl}Thank you for helping.
column3: 이렇게 나무 사이에 숨어있지 않으면 저도 언젠가 마족들에게 없어질지도 몰라요.{nl}그래도 힘닿는 데까진 영혼들을 인도해 볼게요.{nl}도와주셔서 감사합니다.

Centinela: Could you please... Help a bit more?{nl}The reason I am being chased by them is because I am getting rid of the defiling aura from the forest.{nl}
column3: 아직.. 조금만 더 도와주실 수 있을까요?{nl}제가 녀석들에게 쫓기고 있는 건 숲을 더럽히고 있는 기운을 없애고 있기 때문이예요.{nl}

Centinela: I think you'd be able to deal with them more effectively...{nl}Could you help me?
column3: 당신이라면 좀 더 쉽게 그걸 처리할 수 있을 것 같은데..{nl}도와주실 수 있나요?

Centinela: I want to finish them off as soon as possible and return.
column3: 어서 녀석들을 끝장내고 돌아가고 싶어요.

Centinela: Thank you!{nl}We should finish the rest of them off as well.
column3: 감사합니다!{nl}최선을 다해 나머지도 처리해야겠어요.

Centinela: Historian Grenus
column3: 사학자 그리누스

Centinela: Hey there. Could you help me out?{nl}There are a lot of relics in this area that are important to my research, but I can't gather them on my own.{nl}
column3: 이보게. 나 좀 도와줄 수 있겠나?{nl}이 지역엔 내 연구에 필요한 유물이 많이 묻혀있는데, 나 혼자 찾아내기엔 너무나 많구먼.{nl}

Centinela: So here's my proposition... {nl}Why don't you go to the exploration sites that I've marked and dig the relics up.
column3: 그래서 말인데.. {nl}내가 땅에 표시해 둔 탐사지점을 자네가 파내서 유물을 찾아주었으면 좋겠어.

Centinela: I assure you that you will be mentioned in my papers if my research sees the light of day.
column3: 내 연구가 성공적으로 끝나면 보고서에 꼭 자네 이름도 넣어주겠네.

Centinela: Well look at that, a kind traveler helping me more than any of my apprentices.{nl}Your name will be on my research papers when they're finished in a few years.{nl}Thank you!{nl}
column3: 제자들은 한 녀석도 도와주질 않고 친절한 나그네에게 도움을 받았구만.{nl}몇 년 걸리겠지만 연구 보고서에 꼭 자네 이름을 넣어주겠네.{nl}고맙네!

Centinela: Maybe I should look for another line of work before I get any older...{nl}I think I'll do some serious thinking once I finish this research..
column3: 더 나이를 먹기 전에 다른 일을 알아봐야하나..{nl}일단 이번 연구만 잘 끝나면 쉬면서 생각을 해봐야겠어..

Centinela: What to do..{nl}I was planning on waiting at the gravekeeper's hut until the professor was well, but there are just too many monsters here.
column3: 어떻게 하지..{nl}선생님이 회복되실 때까지 무덤지기 오두막에 가 있으려고 하는데 여긴 몬스터가 너무 많아요.

Centinela: {nl}Could you please deal with some of the monsters in the surrounding area?{nl}I beg of you.
column3: {nl}저와 선생님을 위해 주변 몬스터를 처치해 주실 수 있나요?{nl}부탁 드려요.

Centinela: I think I'll be leaving any strange things alone in the future...{nl}I never thought that something like this would happen.
column3: 앞으론 이상한 걸 발견해도 건드리지 말아야겠어요..{nl}이런 일이 될 거라곤 생각도 못 했어요..

Centinela: Thank you.{nl}I hope that the professor will get better soon...
column3: 감사합니다.{nl}선생님이 빨리 회복되셔야 할 탠데..

Centinela: Settler Rodonas
column3: 개척민 로도나스

Centinela: I've heard that you've been helping people around here..{nl}I was wondering if you could help me as well?{nl}I have to reclaim some land that Gytis asked me, but I haven't been able to go anywhere near it because of the monsters...{nl}I'd be grateful if you could deal with some of them..
column3: 사람들을 도와 주고 다닌다는 소문을 들었네..{nl}혹시 나도 좀 도와 줄 수 있겠나?{nl}기티스님이 부탁한 개간 작업을 시작해야 하는데 몬스터들 때문에 발도 못 들이고 있다네..{nl}자네가 좀 나서서 처리해 준다면 고맙겠네만..

Centinela: It's so sad that we have to be developing the land around Klaipeda...{nl}I'm worried that some of the monsters will come running towards us since they've lost their habitats.
column3: 클라페다 주변을 개척할 수 밖에 없는 상황이라니..{nl}집을 잃은 몬스터들이 클라페다로 뛰쳐 들어오지 않을까 걱정이구만.

Centinela: Thank you!{nl}You've scared a lot of the monsters away..{nl}I think we'll be able to start working in just a bit.
column3: 고맙네!{nl}자네 덕에 몬스터들이 겁먹고 도망가겠지..{nl}조금 더 기다렸다가 작업을 시작해야겠네.

Centinela: What the settlement area needs is mercenaries to protect us... not more farmers...{nl}I can't see a single mercenary.
column3: 개척지에 필요한 건 농부가 아니라 우릴 지켜 줄 용병인데..{nl}한 녀석도 보이질 않는구만.

Centinela: I'm sorry, but could you help me out a bit?{nl}I wasn't able to gather more than half of the materials required for my mission.{nl}Could you please deal with the monsters and get the dirty pouches that they are carrying?{nl}I'd really appreciate it...
column3: 죄송하지만 절 좀 도와 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}몬스터들에게 도망치다 보니 임무에 필요한 물건을 반도 못 모았어요.{nl}몬스터들을 처치하고 녀석들이 들고 다니는 꼬질꼬질한 꾸러미를 가져와 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}부탁 드립니다..

Centinela: I'm pretty sure that anyone asking for these are mages or alchemists...{nl}I'd like to tell them to try gathering this stuff themselves...
column3: 보나마나 이런걸 가져오라고 하는 사람들은 마법사나 연금술사겠죠..{nl}직접 모아 보라고 하고 싶네요..

Centinela: Thank you so much!{nl}I'll be able to make it back much more quickly thanks to you.{nl}Even if this is only the beginning...
column3: 정말 감사합니다!{nl}덕분에 복귀를 빨리 할 수 있겠어요.{nl}아직 한참 모자란 양이지만요..

Centinela: Clear the Royal Mausoleum of the Guardians that overlook sinister presences and are trying to destroy the defense systems.{nl}That is the only way that you will be able to safely achieve your goals here.
column3: 사악한 존재들을 묵인하고 왕릉의 수호 체계를 붕괴시키려 하는 수호자들을 제거하라.{nl}그것만이 그대가 이곳에서 안전하게 목적한 바를 이룰 수 있는 방법일 것이다.

Centinela: The defense system is being destroyed.
column3: 수호 체계가 무너지고 있다.

Centinela: The Guardians are being defiled at an increased rate.{nl}This has only delayed the destruction of the Royal Mausoleum.
column3: 수호자들의 오염이 가속화 되고 있다.{nl}이 것은 잠시 왕릉의 붕괴를 늦췄을 뿐이다.

Centinela: You must retrieve the essence from the Tainted Guardians.{nl}You will be able to interrupt the destruction of the Royal Mausoleum by doing so.
column3: 임무를 망각한 수호자들에게 그들의 정수를 회수 해야 한다.{nl}그들에게 정수를 빼앗으면 왕릉의 붕괴를 막을 수 있다.

Centinela: Deal with all of the Tainted Guardians.{nl}That is the fate of the Royal Mausoleum Guardians.
column3: 임무를 망각한 수호자들을 모두 처리하라.{nl}그것이 왕릉을 수호해야 할 수호자들의 숙명이다.

Centinela: Laterous
column3: 라테루스

Centinela: The people are scared because of all sorts of strange rumors...{nl}I need to find some people to raise a farm but people refuse to venture out because of the rumors and monsters.{nl}I'm getting more anxious by the day.{nl}You seem like a strong adventurer, so could you please deal with some of the monsters nearby?{nl}I'm sure that dealing with the monsters will help out with the rumors as well.
column3: 온갖 흉흉한 소문 때문에 사람들이 무서워 하고 있어..{nl}인부들을 찾아서 농장을 만들어야 하는데, 이상한 소문과 몬스터 때문에 사람들이 통 오질 않아.{nl}내 속이 시커멓게 타들어 가고 있다네.{nl}자네 꽤 강한 여행자 같은데 주변 몬스터들을 좀 처리해 줄 수 있겠나?{nl}몬스터만 줄어들어도 이상한 소문은 사라질 태니 말이야.

Centinela: I am not leaving here no matter what anyone says..{nl}I've come here after ignoring all my family and friends that told be that this was a bad idea, you see.
column3: 누가 뭐라고 해도 난 여길 떠날 수 없네..{nl}가지 말라고 뜯어말리는 가족들과 친구들을 무시하고 왔거든.

Centinela: Thank you so much!{nl}I'm sure that many people will be more eager since the monsters are gone.{nl}We'll be able to get a foothold now!
column3: 정말 고맙네!{nl}몬스터만 사라지면 사람들도 다시 모여들 거야.{nl}그럼 여기에 터전을 잡을 수 있겠지!

Centinela: I thought that this was supposed to be a pleasant place to live instead of being infested with monsters...{nl}I still won't give up though...
column3: 살만한 곳이라고 해서 와 봤더니 사방 천지에 몬스터만 우글거리고..{nl}그래도 포기할 순 없어..

Centinela: Wandering Believer's Soul
column3: 떠도는 신도의 영혼

Centinela: One of the living all the way over here... The goddess must have sent you...{nl}Please help me... Strange figures and monsters are taking the spirits away...
column3: 산 자가 이런 곳까지 오다니.. 여신께서 보내신 게 틀림 없어..{nl}나를 좀 도와주 게.. 여기 이상한 자들과 몬스터들이 떠도는 영혼들을 잡아가고 있어..

Centinela: I'll be taken away as well if something isn't done about it...{nl}Please! Could you deal with some of the monsters in the area?
column3: 이대로 있다간 나도 녀석들에게 잡혀 가고 말거야..{nl}부탁이네! 이 근처 몬스터들을 좀 처치해 줄 수 있겠나?

Centinela: I don't remember anything from when I was alive...{nl}Why did I even die?
column3: 살아 있을 때의 기억이 하나도 나지 않아..{nl}나는 왜 죽은거지?

Centinela: Thank you...{nl}With them gone, I can now leave whenever I wish.
column3: 고맙네..{nl}녀석들이 없으니 언제건 떠날 수 있겠군.

Centinela: Why am I here... and why are they trying to catch me?
column3: 나는 왜 여기 있고.. 저 녀석들은 왜 나를 잡으려 하는 거지?

Centinela: Pilgrim Seronia
column3: 순례자 세로니야

Centinela: I'm relieved to meet a person here.{nl}Could you deal with some of the monsters in the surrounding area?{nl}They're more than a match for me on my own..{nl}I'd greatly appreciate your help.
column3: 이런 곳에서 사람을 만나다니 정말 다행이에요.{nl}괜찮으시다면 주변 몬스터를 좀 처치해 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}저 혼자선 한 마리도 처리하기 힘들어요..{nl}부탁 드립니다.

Centinela: I don't know how I got all the way over here...{nl}I got separated from the people I came with since we were chased by monsters...{nl}I have no idea where any of them might be...{nl}I hope they are alright...
column3: 제가 어쩌다가 여기까지 온건지 모르겠어요..{nl}같이 오셨던 분들은 몬스터에게 좇기면서 해어졌는데..{nl}지금 쯤 다들 어디에 계실지 모르겠어요..{nl}무사해야 할 탠데..

Centinela: Thank you so much..{nl}I think I'll start moving once the monsters have thinned out a bit more.
column3: 정말 감사합니다..{nl}몬스터들이 좀 더 사라지면 움직여야겠어요.

Centinela: This way leads to the cursed city...{nl}Where did we start going wrong?
column3: 이 쪽으로 가면 저주받은 도시인데..{nl}어디부터 잘 못 온 걸까요..

Centinela: Follower Nedluss
column3: 추종자 네들러스

Centinela: I've decided to stay here and help out as repentance to my wrongs against Melchioras.{nl}I've just found several suspicious spell devices on the Garden Watchtower.{nl}However, they're a bit too much for me to deal by myself.{nl}So I was thinking... could you destroy them for me?
column3: 멜히오라스님께 범한 제 어리석은 잘 못을 뉘우치기 위해서 여기 남아서 일을 돕기로 했습니다.{nl}방금 장원 망루에서 수상한 마력장치를 여럿 발견했습니다.{nl}하지만 저 혼자서 처리하기엔 좀 무리가 있더군요.{nl}그래서 말인데, 장원 망루에 설치된 장원 마력장치를 파괴해 주실 수 있겠습니까?

Centinela: I shudder to think of how many of those monsterous devices are still hidden...
column3: 저런 끔찍한 장치들이 얼마나 더 숨어 있을지..

Centinela: Well done.{nl}I'm sure that there will be a few more to destroy if we comb the area but...{nl}I think we can call it a day.
column3: 고생하셨습니다.{nl}구석구석 찾아보면 더 있겠지만..{nl}이번엔 이 정도로 끝내죠.

Centinela: I hope Melchioras gets well soon...
column3: 어서 빨리 멜히오라스님이 쾌차하셔야 할 탠데..

Centinela: We'll need to know about the demons well in order to drive them out of this area.{nl}Defeat the demons and bring back their condensed magic.{nl}Melchioras may be able to do some research in order to find a fatal weakness.
column3: 이 곳에서 마족들을 몰아내려면 아무래도 녀석들을 잘 알아야 할 겁니다.{nl}마족들을 처치하고 녀석들이 품고 있는 응축된 마기를 가져와 주세요.{nl}멜히오라스님이 그걸 연구하면 치명적인 약점을 알아낼 수 있을지도 모릅니다.

Centinela: I'm sure that they'll be easier to handle if we know their weaknesses...
column3: 약점을 알면 대응하기 쉬워지겠죠..

Centinela: I think that this will be enough to find a weakness or two.{nl}Thank you!
column3: 이 정도면 한 두 가지 정보는 알아낼 수 있겠군요.{nl}감사합니다!

Centinela: I am thinking of setting up traps around the Delmore Outskirts but...{nl}I wasn't able to do anything due to the Pag Emitters coming from all over.{nl}Could you deal with some of them if they come near?{nl}I'm sure that setting up any traps will be much easier if you help.
column3: 마족을 저지하기 위해 델무어 외성 곳곳에 함정을 설치하려고 합니다만..{nl}당신이 보셨던 것처럼 사방에서 나타나는 페이그 이미터 때문에 아무것도 할 수가 없습니다.{nl}주변에서 녀석들을 보면 처리해 주실 수 있겠습니까?{nl}당신이 도와 주신다면 함정을 설치하기가 훨씬 수월해질 테니까요.

Centinela: I'll be discussing where the best places would be to set up the traps with my colleagues here.
column3: 저는 여기서 함정을 어디에 배치할 건지 동료들이랑 구상하고 있겠습니다.

Centinela: That's a lot of monsters!{nl}Now all that is left is to set up the traps without them noticing.
column3: 많이도 처리하셨군요!{nl}이제 녀석들의 눈을 피해서 함정을 설치하는 일만 남았습니다.

Centinela: I'd like to stay and help Melchioras.{nl}I'm sure you feel the same, correct?
column3: 여기 남아서 멜히오라스님을 돕고 싶어요.{nl}그건 당신도 마찬가지겠죠?

Centinela: {nl}We should hand out the Maroulu Herbs that we found while searching the area to the people.{nl}Please look for some more from the Fortress Walls since we need much more.{nl}I'm sure we'll be able to help people recover.
column3: {nl}이 곳을 수색하면서 발견한 마롤루 풀을 사람들에게 줘야겠어요.{nl}하지만 소량으론 아무런 효과가 없으니 성채 마루에서 마롤루 풀을 찾아 주세요.{nl}분명 무기력하고 기운 없는 사람들을 회복시킬 수 있을 거에요.

Centinela: An herb that helps people become enthusiastic...{nl}Isn't it incredible?
column3: 의욕을 불러일으키는 풀이라니..{nl}굉장하지 않나요?
